2a1(brgyad stong): dpe'i ga 'a byu ba / sa ga d+hA la chos skyes pa saspyong/ na ni nyi su su smon 'i sa kyi nas spyon nga du sa du kyi
2a2(brgyad stong): su ga
2a3(brgyad stong): sa / 'i sa sa
2a4(brgyad stong): rgyal gyir cig/ de'i tshi srid khribs par sbyangs pa'i ma ri/ yul ma pa yang rdzogs pa zhes byu / ma rigs dbyung dang ste/ pachen rlor kye nga / spyo du drug tshul khrims bya sa med/ snangs tu chung sa gas
2a5(brgyad stong): dge sbyong mgon po yom na d+hA ni/ dge slong ku dgra' chos bzang su mang gnas la bus pas 'ang sa ra sa sbyi pa'i po le grags pa'i sgra ngas rgya sun
2a6(brgyad stong): shAs sa sa nga zhe su / yo sa sgyu sa sastong 'du rnas kyi
2a7(brgyad stong): lci ba / ye samam ma sgra 'a sa sa
2a8(brgyad stong): oM la Ni pad mi
2b1(brgyad stong): sa pa shes ra ba kI la rol de ni na po pa rba dA sa
8a1(brgyad stong): dang bral bA ma lags pa yang ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ltar ming de dog nas pa ma lakas shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags pa/ gnas pa
8a2(brgyad stong): bral bri ma lags shing gan pa dang bral bu ma lugs pa yang ma leg so// bcom ldan 'das gal te di ltar shwa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob mo bshad pa dang / bstan pa da tri khAr bstan pa la ba
8a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'gong kun du mi zhum bag mi rje bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yo phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi/ 
8a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing / lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa da
8a5(brgyad stong): ma brel bar rig par bya'o// byir mi ldogro po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyi sau legs par gnas pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gzhon yang
8a6(brgyad stong): dpe' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo sgo pos gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba l+r-i mo lags/ 'du shes la mra lag/ 'dra byed rnaM sel ma lags/ rna ba
8a7(brgyad stong): par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i snod du zhe na/ gol te gzugs la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'dra byed pa la skrod ki/ shes rab kyi pha rol du ben pa li skrod pa ma lagaso// de bzhin dag
8a8(brgyad stong): 'du she dang / 'du byed rnaMs dang / gal te rna par shes pa la gnas na rna bar shes pa mngon par 'od byed pa la spyod kyi/ shwe rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma logaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na ma
8b1(brgyad stong): pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa yang ma legaso// shes ra
8b2(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyod pa yang ma legs so/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pA yongasu rdzogs par mi gyur na/ yongs su mi bzung ba yongasu gzu/ 
8b3(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bur mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du ni ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa le gzugs yongs su mi gzung ba mi
8b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du shasau rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lI tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam po shes pa yongs su ngo bzung ba ma mchisogazugs yi// 
8b5(brgyad stong): gzung ba mi mchis po gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ de bzhin du tsho ba gang lags pa dang / 'du shes gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags
8b6(brgyad stong): rna rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang yongs su bzung ba mi
8b7(brgyad stong): mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub semasu dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi phu rol du phyin pa 'di la spyad par bgyi'o// 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini te/ yungs pa 'dun du bgyis pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang rang
9a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan mar gzung ba ma lagaso gal te mtshan
9a2(brgyad stong): mar bzung bar gyur na kun du rgyu phreng ba can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ dkun du rgyo phreng ba can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing phyogs
9a3(brgyad stong): gcig tu ba'i ye shes kyi so zhugs so/ de bzhugs nas kyang gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin to// de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags/ 'du shes ma lags/ 'du byed rnams ma legasate rnam
9a4(brgyad stong): par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to/ de la shes pa dga' ba dang / bde bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / 
9a5(brgyad stong): shes pa dri phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang yang
9a6(brgyad stong): dgra par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dri bzhin du shes pa de nang gi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'do byed rnams kyi mi yin/ shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes pa yin par rig par yang dag par rjes su mi mtho
9a7(brgyad stong): shes pa de phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa yin par yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan
9b1(brgyad stong): du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun rgya phreng ba can mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rje su 'brang zhing chos nyi
9b2(brgyad stong): tshad mar bgyis te 'di ltar mos pa zhes bgyi'o// des chos gang yang yongs ma bzung ngo // gang bzung ba'am/ btang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs so/ de mya ngan las
9b3(brgyad stong): 'das par yang rlom semasu mi bgyid do/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rig par bgyi ste/ gang gzugs
9b4(brgyad stong): yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du tsho ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang // 
9b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyo chos mu 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongasu mya ngan las mi 'ang
9b6(brgyad stong): ba ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rig par bgyi'o/ bcom
9b7(brgyad stong): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shos rabi kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pas 'di
10a1(brgyad stong): brtag cing 'di ltar nges par bsam par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang gi yin
10a2(brgyad stong): ci chos gang med pa dang mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gol te de ltar nye bar brtags de ltar nges par bsam par bya sems na mi
10a3(brgyad stong): 'god kun du mi zhum/ bag mi chi bag 'khums pa ro mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dra ngang kun du mi
10a4(brgyad stong): skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// de nas
10a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bus che dang ldan pa rab 'byo rol 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gang gi tshe gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang
10a6(brgyad stong): bral ba/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe cher ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / de bzhin du tshe 'di ltar gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
10a7(brgyad stong): de'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa
10b1(brgyad stong): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par
10b2(brgyad stong): bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ljon po shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin to/ shA ri'i
10b3(brgyad stong): gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang brel ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa
10b4(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang
10b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral/ 
10b6(brgyad stong): ba'o// mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi bozhi'i ngo bo nyid dang yang bral bya'o// ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang
10b7(brgyad stong): bral ba'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo rol 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' sems
11a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po grang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges pa rgya 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nA ri'i bu de de bzhin
11a2(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'dri lo sgrub par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
11a3(brgyad stong): bu chos thams cad ni nges par gang 'di 'byung ba med cing ma skyes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
11a4(brgyad stong): la nye bar 'gyur ro// ci lta ci ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can yong su smin pa'i phyir lus dang sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yong su dag pa dang
11a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang sangs rgyas dang nye bar yang 'gyur pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lde re shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgo
11a6(brgyad stong): ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar yin/ gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las brtsams te 'di skad ces smros// gal to gzug
11a7(brgyad stong): kyi skye ba la skye ba lo spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ gal te gzugs kyi mtshan ma la spyod na mtshon me la spyod// gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan mo la spyod/ gal te gzugs kyi skye ba 'o/ 
11b1(brgyad stong): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ gal te gzugs kyi 'gog pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// gzugs kyi 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ gal te gzugs stong pa'o snyam du spyod na
11b2(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la spyod do/ bdag spyod snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o// snyam du spyod ni mtshan la skyed do// go byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na dzod dmigs
11b3(brgyad stong): nyid la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
11b4(brgyad stong): mA la spyod na mtshan ma spyad do/ gal te rnam par shes pa mtshan mo'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i skye bo la spyod na mtshan me la spyod// ma
11b5(brgyad stong): te rnam par shes pa'i 'ogag pa la spyod na mtshan mo la spyo dad/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'jig la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ gal te rnam par shes
11b6(brgyad stong): pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdage spyod do snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o/ snyam du spyod na mtshan
11b7(brgyad stong): ma la spyod de/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i snyam na de dmigs po ny-i ni la spyod do// gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa
12a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du sems na de mtshan ma nyid lo spyod pa ste// byang chub sems dpa'
12a2(brgyad stong): 'di ni thabs mi mkhasau par rig por bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa rabo 'byor la 'di skad ces smras/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
12a3(brgyad stong): ni chen po ci ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smos// tshe dang ldan pa shA rili
12a4(brgyad stong): dbu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po gzugs la la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs kyi skye ba la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa la mi spyod// 
12a5(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi 'jig pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa la mi spyod/ stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag spyod do snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ byang chub so sa/ 
12a6(brgyad stong): dpe'o snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod/ de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod/ rnam pa shes pa'i
12a7(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la mi spyod// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la mi skyed/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la mi spyod
12a8(brgyad stong): rna bar shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ ba dag spyad do snyam du mi spyod/ bdag bang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmig pa la mi spyod cing gas
12b1(brgyad stong): te yang 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no// snyam du mi sems pa ste/ de lder
12b2(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ mi spyod do snyam du nye bar ma rtog
12b3(brgyad stong): spyod kyang skyod la mi skyod kyang mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtog go// skyod po yang ma yin la mi spyod pa yang ma yin no snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya
12b4(brgyad stong): snyom dA yang nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya ba yang yin la spyad par bya ba yin la/ pa nyid do snyam du nye bar mi rtag go// de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nye b.ri ma rtog so shing / a zin pas so/ 'di ni byang
12b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad len pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ yangs pa can gyi 'dun du byas pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
12b6(brgyad stong): dang thun mong ma yin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal
12b7(brgyad stong): de nas sangs rgyas kyi 'thus gnas rten tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dis grang ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b8(brgyad stong): chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan pa lag so/ de ni/ 
13a1(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin de yang yang dag par rjes mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par gnag pa ste/ bdag ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go// 
13a2(brgyad stong): dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhag pa'o// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o// sngam du de lta bu de la thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma mchis pa
13a3(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsal bapa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas na byang chub sems dpa'
13a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yo de dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'i/ 
13a5(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin de bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu des ni ti 'odzi na de yi mi shes ya
13a6(brgyad stong): dag par mi shes/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor me shes yung dgra par mi shes zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
13a7(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes so/ zhes zer ro/ de ci'i phyir no no/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na mi shes yang dag par mi sheso/ ting nge'idzin de yang mi shes yang
13a8(brgyad stong): dge bar mi she so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so// zhes bya ba byin te/ ji ltar yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'thus spobs pa dang / de
13b1(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa ni rab 'byor leg so leg so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de
13b2(brgyad stong): bzhin du 'di la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
13b3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skrod ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slobo na shes raba~M kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa legs sam/ de
13b4(brgyad stong): skad ces go sel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA r-i bA la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab
13b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin no/ de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
13b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na chos gang la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bke'u bstsal pa/ shA ri rib
13b7(brgyad stong): la bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni chos gang yang mi slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de dag ni byis pa so so
13b8(brgyad stong): skye bo thos pa dang / mi ldan pa so ci ltar mngon par chags pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de dag ji ltar 'chis
14a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de bzhin du yang dag par yad de/ de lta re med pa de'i phyi tsa mu rig pa zhes bya'o/ de dag byis pa so so'i skye
14a2(brgyad stong): bo thos pa dang / mi ldan pa rnam sa mngon par chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad me pa la rtags so// de dag gis de la brtags nas mtha' gnyi sa la zhen pas chos de dag mi she
14a3(brgyad stong): mi mthong ste/ de'i phyir de dag med bzhin du chos thams cad la rtag go/ de dag gis brtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon por chag so// mngon par chags nas de'i gzhis dmigs pa la
14a4(brgyad stong): gnas nas/ 'das pa'i chos la rtag go// de ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go// de dag gis brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen to// de dag gis med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la
14a5(brgyad stong): brtags pas lam yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum las nges par mi 'byung / yang dag pa'i 'tha' khong/ 
14a6(brgyad stong): du ma chud de/ de'i phyir de dag bris pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// de dag chos bden pa la yid mi chis/ shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos gang la yang mang
14a7(brgyad stong): par zhen par mi byed do/ de skad ces bka'o bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14a8(brgyad stong): de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar slob na thams cad
14b1(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la slob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na chos thams cad la slobo// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ 
14b2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de nges par 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ la tshe dang ldan pa
14b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ro/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
14b4(brgyad stong): la nye bor 'gyur ru/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ zhes de skad du yongasu 'dri na bcom ldan 'das dri lo ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
14b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces rab 'byore de bas na 'dir khyod nyid la bri ba re ba yis/ khyod kyis ci nas pa de bzhin du sto ni cag ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
14b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'ad si l-ig so zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltor mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du
14b7(brgyad stong): sems/ sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan nam/ de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan nam/ 'ad bad rnams de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma de gzhan
14b8(brgyad stong): larnam pa ri shes pa de gzhan ni/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags te/ sgyu mo de gzhan la gzugs de gzhon mo legs te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs
15a1(brgyad stong): nyid sgyu ma lag so// sgyu ma nyid gzugs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sgyu ma de ge zhon la tshor ba de gzhan dang 'du shes de gzhan dang / 'du byed rnams de gzhan yang ma
15a2(brgyad stong): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams nyid sgyu ma logaso// sgyu ma nyid tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan
15a3(brgyad stong): la rnam par shes pa de gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma lag so// sgyu ma nyid rnam pa shes pa lagoso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor
15a4(brgyad stong): 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po 'di rnaMs la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa nye ba'i 'du shes dang / kun shes pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang tha snyad 'di yin no/ de skad
15a5(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das
15a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa des ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
15a7(brgyad stong): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dus 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po de dag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur bzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs ni/ 
15a8(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dong phung po lnga po de dag lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshi rab dang / 'du shes dang
15b1(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams sgyu ma lta bur gsungs shing / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa re shes pa gang
15b2(brgyad stong): lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang / phung po lnga po de dag la gso/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan po 'di thos
15b3(brgyad stong): na dngang zhing skrag la kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal po/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
15b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnam sa sdi go pa'i gogs pa'i lag tu sang bar gyu ra na ni dang nge zhing kAn du skrag la kun du skrag pa dang ljon par 'gyu ro/ rab 'byor gau laM te theg pa l-i gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
15b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes go nyen gyi lag du song bar gyur na ni/ mau dngang kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyu ro// de skad ces bkra'o stsal pa dang / 
15b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ga
15b7(brgyad stong): rnams lags par rig pa ra bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gang de dag la pha rol du phyin pa rnams 'doms shing / ston pa rnams dang / gang de dag la bdud kyi nyes
15b8(brgyad stong): pa ni 'di lnga bar rig par bgyi/ bodad kyi lasi ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ ba dad kyi nyes pa ni 'di dag yon/ ba dad kyi las ni 'di dag yin par rig par bya/ ba da da ki la sa 'di
16a1(brgyad stong): dug khyed kyis rtogs nas spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi tshe chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag por zhug
16a2(brgyad stong): pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnamasu rig par bya'o// de skad ces gsol bkra' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
16a3(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang
16a4(brgyad stong): dag par zhugs pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam su rig par bya'o/ zhes bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka'
16a5(brgyad stong): stsal pa de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i bzhi'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gselnga pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kI sau tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 8
16a6(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni bzhi'i don med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa la
16a7(brgyad stong): slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cod rjesu rtogs po'i don du chags pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
16a8(brgyad stong): bar 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub don du gnyer bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang 'di
16b1(brgyad stong): skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' bstsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan
16b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris chen po'i mtshig nyid du bye'o// snyam pa ste/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
16b3(brgyad stong): zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dis bdag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
16b4(brgyad stong): zhes bau gyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baspel pa/ shA ri'i bu da de'i dus la babya par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang / ga
16b5(brgyad stong): zlag tu cha lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / chad pa ra lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang ba'i slad du chos
16b6(brgyad stong): bstan to snyam ste don des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nasu bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa
16b7(brgyad stong): kyang don gang ni slad du byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar slob so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na/ spobs par gyis
16b8(brgyad stong): shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'ad so de byang chub kyi sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa/ 
19a1(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol bzhis ze re ra mu/ tshe nga ldan bya rab 'byor 'on te gzugs kang
19a2(brgyad stong): ma bcings mo grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yini/ de bzhin du tshor ba de gang yin/ 'du shes de gang yin/ 'du byed rnams de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par
19a3(brgyad stong): pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhini nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhini
19a4(brgyad stong): nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer po'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
19a5(brgyad stong): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dra bye do rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par
19a6(brgyad stong): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang yini/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams
19a7(brgyad stong): gang gi tshe/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ de bzhin gshegs du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'dra shes pa/ 
19a8(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'odu byed rnams gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skye sa dbu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bci ngas ma grol byol/ tshed/ 
19b1(brgyad stong): ldan pa glang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'dun
19b2(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'o bye de rnamaso kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mra bcings ma grol/ 
19b3(brgyad stong): bo'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yong dag pa mo yin pas na mu bcings ma grol ba'o/ dben pas na mi bcing sa ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pas na ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'di dag ni byang
19b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i go cha chen po'i go cha med pa'o
19b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/ 
19b6(brgyad stong): 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas par
19b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i thog po chen po de ni gang lags/ theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ 
19b8(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ theg pa chen po des gang dag nas par 'gyur ba 'am
20a1(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po des gang zhig/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' ba stsol to/ rab 'byor theg
20a2(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dgras so// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du theg po chen po/ de la ji ltar yang dag par
20a3(brgyad stong): zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gan+da
20a4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ phyi rol du phyin pa rnams kyi sgo nas yang dag por zhugs nas khams gsum nas nges par
20a5(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / mi dmigs pa gang yin pas yang dag par zhugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges par
20a6(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gang nas kyang nges par 'byung ba med/ gang gis kyang yang dag par ma zhugs/ gang du yang gnos par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ gnas pa med pa'i tshul/ 
20a7(brgyad stong): gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba/ theg pa chen po des gang yang nges par ma byung nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ nges par byung ba yang medade/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
20a8(brgyad stong): gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs la chos grong gi
20b1(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' ba stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po
20b2(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la brjod do/ na mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid
20b3(brgyad stong): kyi phyir theg pa chen po'o// ji ltar na mkha' la sems can gzhal du ma mchis gangs pa'am mchis pa'i go skabs mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang
20b4(brgyad stong): can gzhal du ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la
20b5(brgyad stong): 'ong ba yang mi mthong / 'di la 'gro ba yang ma mthong zhing 'di la gnas pa yang ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar theg pa chen po 'di la sngon gyi mtha'o mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha
20b6(brgyad stong): mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni dus gsum du mnyam pa'o/ de bas na theg pa chen po theg po zhes bri gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
20b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor le gso zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor le gso la go so// rab 'byor de de bzhin de de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
20b8(brgyad stong): ki theg pa chen po yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi so 'di la bslabs pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjesu thob par gyur to/ rjes tho bo rjes
21a1(brgyad stong): thob par 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas rten rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
21a2(brgyad stong): slad du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni theg pa chen po bshad par bya bar sems log so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
21a3(brgyad stong): 'das byi dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'gal ba ro theg pa chen po ston par ma gyur lags gleng / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bo stsal pa/ rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
21a4(brgyad stong): gsol to// rab 'byor khyod ni shes rabo kyi pha rol du phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su 'thun par ston to// de skad ces bka' bstsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 
21a5(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus leg so/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar ma rtogs/ bya'o
21a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye bar ma rtogs/ byang chub sems dpa' dbu su yang nye bar ma rtag so/ nye ba rom rtogs pa de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs mu me mchise pas
21a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' yang mu mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'di shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu mi mchis pa na/ byang chub sems nga/ 
21a8(brgyad stong): yang mu mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpe'o zhes nye b.ri mi rtogs te 'odi yang ma mchis mi dmigaso/ de bzhin du cher ba dang / 'od shwe dang / 
21b1(brgyad stong): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te/ 'di yang ma mchis mi dmig so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ba dag gis byang chub sems pa'i tshe
21b2(brgyad stong): thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di grong la yod pa'i chos de yang
21b3(brgyad stong): dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong mi dmigs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan
21b4(brgyad stong): 'das bdag gis chos de thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjesu ma mthong zhing ma namigaso na/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis chos gang la gdams shing rjesu bstam
21b5(brgyad stong): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das songs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsa mo/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
21b6(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo/ ming de yang mngon par ma grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag ces brjod kyang / bco ldan 'das bdag shin du mngon par ma grub
21b7(brgyad stong): pa bzhin no// de ltar chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la gang zhig gzung du ma mchis shing / mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
21b8(brgyad stong): rnams de gang lags/ gang zhig zung da ma mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa gang lagasol/ 
22a1(brgyad stong): de ni mngon par ma grub pa lags la/ gang chos thams cad kyi mngon par ma grub pa gang lags pa de yang chos ma lagos te/ de ci shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par
22a2(brgyad stong): ma grub pas mngon par ma grub pa la ci zhig gdams shing rjesu bstan por bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gzhan chos thams cad gzhan dmo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
22a3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ gang byang chub tu spyod pa yang mi dmig so/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bshad cing de ltar bstan te/ de ltar nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa'
22a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'gong / kun du mi zhom pogo mi tshe/ bgra' khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi do ngang kun mi skrag kun du
22a5(brgyad stong): skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
22a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa la sgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nye bar rtog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi na pa/ 
22a7(brgyad stong): la nges par sems pa'o// zhes de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo chos 'di dag
22a8(brgyad stong): nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs nye bar mi rtog/ gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba'i
22b1(brgyad stong): ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong rnam par
22b2(brgyad stong): shes pa 'gag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang legs pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags
22b3(brgyad stong): pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gni su ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchis/ des ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi
22b4(brgyad stong): ba 'di yang gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grang su gtog so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba gang lags pa
22b5(brgyad stong): dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang legs pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa
22b6(brgyad stong): 'jig pa me mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyi su rje ma mchis shing bgyir ma mchis
22b7(brgyad stong): des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'dri ni gnyi sa
22b8(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i gang su gtog so/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chos thams cad du nye bar rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs nye bar mi rtog gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/ gzug
23a1(brgyad stong): skye bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par rjesu mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye ba ma rtog na
23a2(brgyad stong): dri rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rje su mi mthong // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs
23a3(brgyad stong): kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma logs/ gzugs kyu 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang gzugs zhes/ 
23a4(brgyad stong): ba gyi ba 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis/ des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchis te/ 
23a5(brgyad stong): gang yang 'di skad du gzugs zhes bgyi bo 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis pa'i grangs gtog so/ de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang legs pa dang / 'du byed
23a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de nyid rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa
23a7(brgyad stong): de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchiso/ des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang
23a8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs
23b1(brgyad stong): gtog so// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa// bam po gnyis pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
23b2(brgyad stong): de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ji skad smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang ga la
23b3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa'i don bdag gi spyod pa 'am/ sems can rnams kyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yin po de dag nyamasu myong ba'i
23b4(brgyad stong): don du spro ba yang ci zhig yod/ de skad ces smras po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras/ tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpe'i sems
23b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do// gang zhig dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yang mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dka' ba'i
23b6(brgyad stong): 'du shes bskyed nas ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa'i di ni bya bar mi nus/ 'on kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du byas nas sems can thams cad la ma ra du shes pa dang pa
23b7(brgyad stong): 'du shes pa dang / dbur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'di shes bskyed par rngo byas shing / de bzhin du skyes pa dang bud med dag la 'dra shes de dag byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
23b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ni pos sems can thams cad la mar 'di shes pa dang / phar 'du shes dang / 
24a1(brgyad stong): bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang / bdag gi nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par byas te/ ji ltar bdag ni thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams
24a2(brgyad stong): cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya'o zhes de ltar sems
24a3(brgyad stong): can thams cad la yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongasu mi btung ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med
24a4(brgyad stong): pa las thar bar bya'o/ bdag gi lus brgya rob tu bas kyang chung ngun 'di dag la bdag gi gnod sems kyang mi skyed do snyam du/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems poskyed
24a5(brgyad stong): par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar gan sun dka' ba byed po'i 'du shes su spyod pa ma yin no// dka' ba byed pa'i sems can 'du shesu gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
24a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci nas kyang bdag thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing ma dmigs pa de bzhin du chos thams cad na sa thams cad rnam pa
24a7(brgyad stong): thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de ltar sems bskyed par bzhing de ltar nang dang phyi'i chos thams cad la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ gal te sems de ltar spyod na dka' bya'i 'dra/ 
24a8(brgyad stong): su spyod pa ma yin/ dka' ba'i 'du shesu gnas pa ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gang yang 'od skad du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin// zhes smras pa de ni de de bzhin// 
24b1(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni skye ba med pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' nyid skye ba med dam/ 'on te byang chub sems
24b2(brgyad stong): dpe'i cho sa rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
24b3(brgyad stong): smras pa/ yang ci byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kho na skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
24b4(brgyad stong): kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na skye bo med dom/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor
24b5(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba me/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kho na
24b6(brgyad stong): skye ba med dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo yang skye ba medo/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
24b7(brgyad stong): yang ci so so'i skye bo nyid kyang skye bo med dmo/ 'on te so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang
24b8(brgyad stong): skye ba med do/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor lo'i do skad ces smra so/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'/ 
25a1(brgyad stong): yang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med
25a2(brgyad stong): so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye bo me pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen
25a3(brgyad stong): nyid rjes su thob pa yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'odadi skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni ma skyes pa'i chos/ 
25a4(brgyad stong): la thob par mi 'dod la mngon par rtogs pa yang ma yin te/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa'am skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur/ shi ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor/ 
25a5(brgyad stong): ya ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyes po'i chos kyis tho bo pas ma skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur ba 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i buM
25a6(brgyad stong): yang ci mo skyes pa'i chos skyes pa dang yin nam/ 'on te ma skyes pa'i mchos mo skyes pa nyid yino/ shA ri'i bus smos pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci skye bu'i chos nyid mi skye ba yin
25a7(brgyad stong): 'on te mi skye ba'i chos mi skye ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pA shA ri'i bu skyo ba'i chos mi skye bo'i chos zhes smra bar mi slob sa/ shA ri'i blos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
25a8(brgyad stong): kyis skye ba med pa yang smra bar mi spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid brjod pa yin laM/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid so
25b1(brgyad stong): snang ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa yang sa nyid spobs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de kho na bzhin du so sor snang ba nyid de/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa na
25b2(brgyad stong): ri'i bus te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston pa'i na ngon mchog tu bzhig par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas rten tshe dang ldan
25b3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang nyid la yongasu dri ba byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos nyid 'gal ba yang mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa
25b4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma gnas pa'i chos can rnams kyi chos nyid las kyang
25b5(brgyad stong): 'di yin te/ de dag ni gang dang gang nyid la yongasu dri bo byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid dang 'ogal bar yang mi byed la chos nyid las kyang mi 'dra'o// de ci
25b6(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang chos thams cad myi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so/ tshe dang ldan pa
25b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ldeg so leg so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang / 
25b8(brgyad stong): ldan po shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid ni theg pa thams cad pa chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de ltar
26a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa za bro mo 'di ltar ba shad cing 'dri ltar ba ston pa dang 'di ltar nye bu ra bstan pa la sems zhum/ 
26a2(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur ba dang / nem nur mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / soms gzhan du mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
26a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i gnas pas ga nas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// zhes rig par bya'o/ de nas tshe dang lnga nai pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
26a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ci ltar yid lo byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur
26a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi dol byed pa dang ma bral ba yin no/ de ltar na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i gnas pa dang ma bral
26a6(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sem so dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba de ltar na ni yid la byed pa
26a7(brgyad stong): de dang bral bar 'gyuraro/ tshe dang ldan pa rlob 'byor ga le tau yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi la byed pa mau bral bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa dang / 
26a8(brgyad stong): ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur na de lta yin du bzin no/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas dong ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zho na/ sems can thams / 
26b1(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa dang me bral bar gan so/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu leg so// leg so 'on
26b2(brgyad stong): kyang khyod la yang kAn kar 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sa ni don 'di nyid yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod par yongasu gzung ba yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems
26b3(brgyad stong): can ngo bo nyid med pas na/ yid la byed pa dben ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa ri shA ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pas ni yod la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya
26b4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pas na yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can bsam gyis ma khyab pos na/ yi la byed pa bsam byis
26b5(brgyad stong): mi khyag par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pas na yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
26b6(brgyad stong): ba soms can yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ya di la byed po yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par
26b7(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yid la byed pa 'di dang gnas pa 'dis/ gnas par 'dod/ 'phags pa shes
26b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong po la so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya s+ho dang po'o// // de'i tshe yang lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum
27a1(brgyad stong): bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi khri dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te'i khod par gyur to/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lnga'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa
27a2(brgyad stong): dang / mi ma byed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs kyi lha'i bu khri re bcas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lho'i bu lnga stong yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// lha rnams rang gi las
27a3(brgyad stong): kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'bru dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi zil gyis mnan to/ 
27a4(brgyad stong): de na sa lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so/ 'phrogs pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'das te 'khod pa 'di rnams 'phags
27a5(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nye bar bstan pa dang / gdams pa dang / rjesu bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang
27a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin la gnas par bya/ ci ltar bslab par bya rnal 'byor du bya/ gnas rten rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u sha~M ka de'i
27a7(brgyad stong): phyir sangs rgyas kyi 'bru dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis nye bar bstan par bya ste/ lho'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
27a8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis sems bskyed par bya'o/ gang dag yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed
27b1(brgyad stong): skyed pa'i skal ba med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun las 'tshams bcad pas de dag yang dang yang du 'khor zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
27b2(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do/ 'on kyang gal te de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la yang rje su yid rang bar bya'o// kho bo ni de dag
27b3(brgyad stong): gi dge ba la bar chad mi byed do// khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che
27b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la bko' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor legaso leg so// khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba bskyed po gang yin pa ni rab 'byor yang khyo do leg so/ 
27b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'odas lnga tshe dang ldan pa rab byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cog gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gzo
27b6(brgyad stong): bar bgyi ste/ bka' don mi bzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
27b7(brgyad stong): drung du bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis badrag cag rnams kyi don du byang chub kyi phyir tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na/ nyan thos gang dag gis pha rol du phyin pa rnas/ 
27b8(brgyad stong): la ga dmas shing rje su bstan te de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag shes bskyed pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ses
28a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongasu gzung bar bgyi zhing rjes su yongasu bskor bar bgyir/ yang dag par yong su bzung bar bgyi zhing yang dag par yongasu bskor bar yang
28a2(brgyad stong): bgyi'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rje su yongasu bzung zhing rje su yongasu bskor ba dang / yang
28a3(brgyad stong): dad par yongasu bzung zhing yang dag par yengasu bskor bas myu rA du blo ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
28a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir lcags par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
28a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya bA ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la gnas pas shes rab kyi pha rol
28a6(brgyad stong): du phyin pa la gnas por bya ste/ kau shi ka de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur bya'o/ gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o// tsher
28a7(brgyad stong): le ma yin/ 'du shes lo ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig la gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o/ mig
28a8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'ongs te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rnab
28b1(brgyad stong): sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bya'o/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos rnams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / yid kyi 'dus
28b2(brgyad stong): te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o/ sa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / na mkha'i khams
28b3(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas par mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang
28b4(brgyad stong): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam la gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas paro mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / lan cig phyiraro'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong/ 
28b5(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas por mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid lo gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o/ de ltar na gzugaso zhes gnas par
28b6(brgyad stong): mi byal/ de ltar na tshor ba'o/ zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnamaso zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnos par mi bya'o// de ltar na mig go zhes bya
28b7(brgyad stong): ba nos yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gnos par mi bya'o// de ltar na si'i kham so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i khom so zhes bya ba'i bar du gan
28b8(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ de ltar na yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan la/ 
29a1(brgyad stong): rnams zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na lam gyi yan lag go zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na lan cig phyir 'o / 
29a2(brgyad stong): 'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rang sangs rgyas zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ 
29a3(brgyad stong): de ltar na sangs rgyaso zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
29a4(brgyad stong): rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnos par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
29a5(brgyad stong): bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas pa ri mo bya'o// gzugs stong pa dang mi stong po'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong
29a6(brgyad stong): pa dang mi sto pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes bya ba dag
29a7(brgyad stong): dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor rab dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug pa
29a8(brgyad stong): dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa
29b1(brgyad stong): stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba
29b2(brgyad stong): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'i dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye bo'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba
29b3(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa nyid sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya ba rig nas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhug
29b4(brgyad stong): pa ri ltar thogs ni srid pa lan bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba sbyin po'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongasu mthar mi phyin pa'i
29b5(brgyad stong): phyir 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mothar byed par 'gyur zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gan so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig
29b6(brgyad stong): rkyen 'dir phyir ma 'ong bar de nyid du yongasu mya ngan las 'di'o zhes gnos par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin po'i gan so zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa 'di nyid du du
29b7(brgyad stong): po lhag mu ma~M lus par mya ngan la sa 'da' bo'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'dras par 'gyu ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gan so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgya
29b8(brgyad stong): ni ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi so ma thob par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gnas par/ 
30a1(brgyad stong): mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/ gnal du med grangs med/ pa'i sems can rnas
30a2(brgyad stong): kyi don mdzad/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig yongasu mya ngan las bzlas// gzhal du med gangs med pa'i sems can nyon thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag pa
30a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par 'dzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi sa le bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i sems can mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu
30a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi yongasu mya dran las 'da' bar yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas pa ri mo bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te gal
30a5(brgyad stong): te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / nyen thos kyi sa las 'ongs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'odas pa dang nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnaMs
30a6(brgyad stong): kyi don mdzod de/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongasu mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang
30a7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges par 'dzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi sau lo ba zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lkog ma med pa'i mya
30a8(brgyad stong): las 'das pa'i dbyingasu sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs mya ngan las 'da' byor 'gyuraro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya na/ des yang dri ltar 'di la gnas
30b1(brgyad stong): bya/ ci ltar bslab par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan
30b2(brgyad stong): pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i buM de ji snyam du sems/ de bi zhon gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas
30b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin/ de ci'i phyir
30b4(brgyad stong): zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi thuse ni shin du mi gnas pa ste/ de ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas
30b5(brgyad stong): kyi khamra sa la yang mi gnas te/ de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i buM la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
30b6(brgyad stong): dri bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'di lta bu nyid du gnas par bye zhing 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ tsIltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ying dag pa
30b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin zhing mi gnas pa yang ma yin la mi 'thun par gnas pa ma yin ning mi 'thun par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa
30b8(brgyad stong): bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o// snyam ning de bzhin du bslab par bya'o snyam pa dang / de ni
31a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas na mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis shes par gnas pa yin na snyam du 'dis dengo ltar bslab par bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems
31a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin du bsrab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gan
31a3(brgyad stong): pa 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lI'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi
31a4(brgyad stong): sgra dang Tha gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang / gnod sbyin gyi ga tam du byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag smras pa ni shes par rung gi/ gnas rten rab 'byor gang 'chad pa dang
31a5(brgyad stong): rab tu brjod pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa 'di ni shes bIr rung ngo snyam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bu
31a6(brgyad stong): sems kyis yongasu shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lho'i bu dag shes par mi rung zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa me de/ 'di la cung zad kyang thos pa med do// de nas
31a7(brgyad stong): lha'i bu de dag yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsol bar byed par 'gyu ro/ e ma'i 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur te/ 
31a8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar du 'jug na/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ni phra ba bsau kang ches phra ba/ zab pa bas kyang ches za bo par 'jug pas s+ho nI tsong 'tshad snyam
31b1(brgyad stong): de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi 'brus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras/ lha'i b+hu dag de lta byas na
31b2(brgyad stong): gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod par 'od dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par ma 'grub/ de bzhin du sbyar te gang lon cig
31b3(brgyad stong): phyiro 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir reng ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
31b4(brgyad stong): la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des/ bzod pa 'di la ma
31b5(brgyad stong): rten par mi 'grub bo/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma
31b6(brgyad stong): brten par mi 'grub bo// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa re bi 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa'i rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig/ btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas
31b7(brgyad stong): kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lho'i bu de dag gi sems rtog pa sems kyis shes nus/ lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lci'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyon pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu dag
31b8(brgyad stong): btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur/ de na se lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mchis
32a1(brgyad stong): can de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i yin gyis de dag sgyu ma ni ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras/ lha'i bu dag
32a2(brgyad stong): sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu lce'i bu dag sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lce'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang sems can dag ni gnyi su med de gnyis byar medo/ de ltari rmel
32a3(brgyad stong): dang sems can dag ni gnyi su med de gnyis su byar myed do// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam lta bu'o/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun
32a4(brgyad stong): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lA mo lta bu'o/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lnga
32a5(brgyad stong): bye'i dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// ring sangs nyid kyang sgyu ma lnga bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i
32a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa nyid kyang sgyu lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gisde tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
32a7(brgyad stong): ces smras/ 'bigs pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmil ma lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu ma
32a8(brgyad stong): lam lta bu'o zhes zer ro/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur smra na chos gzhan lta ci smos/ lha'i de dag gis smis pa'i'aphags
32b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgra ma lta bu me la ma lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag no bdag ni gal to mya ngan las 'das pa 'i m+b+ha
32b2(brgyad stong): du 'bogs de rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa ying m+b+ha mu l+lI bu rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes skye'o/ b+ha'i bu dag da per na sgyum dang mya nganams 'das pa 'di na gnyi su me de gnyis phyi maud
32b3(brgyad stong): sbyar na mal me dang myo na las 'das pa 'dzin gnyi su meng da gnas byang med do// denas mi nga ldan pa shA ro'i buM dang tshe dang ljon pa rab gang po byam sa man tha~M da'i ma ldan pa ra
32b4(brgyad stong): dpa cad nga ldan pag tun chen pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa'i dum padzin pa dang / sbyin zas chen po dang / gnyen dag gis byung chu ba sems dpa' skang zug du ma du na sa rkyen dag
32b5(brgyad stong): gnas nyan dab 'byor la 'dis kyis s+hos// cha deng ldan pa dag phyir mi sdig pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa rnams so// lce babyen su mtshogs pa'i sa d+hiH sa
32b6(brgyad stong): sam/ das panam pa zag pa pad pa gta min pa de dag shes ran kya pa rol du phyin po 'di ltar ba stan pa 'dil yang drug par 'dzin par shAn+d+ha raM/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa'abu 'byor gyis na
32b7(brgyad stong): tan dmyal byad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa dan zhes ra kyi tshol du sbyin 'dun rab byed pa 'dis yang dag par 'dzin pasu myang ba'i gyu dacin phyir zhen/ 'di ltar tshang mchos
32b8(brgyad stong): yangs sgos chos dang yang ming su snang ba sa byas chos gang ba mayin no// debs sbyin 'dil chos gang yang ma suM so chos gsu mang ming su yang nas kyimachis ga
32b9(brgyad stong): na nga ston pa 'a sa stan pa 'dres su ga/ sang da na du 'gyur na mod lda ba tsun ma ldatan de dgas na
33a1(brgyad stong): gzhag pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phag
33a2(brgyad stong): pabarab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi rnam gangs 'di bstan po la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don du 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par sprul nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
33a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to/ de nas gnas bstan tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lo rje su po rjod pa'i phyir me tog 'dri snyom du sems te/ rI yang 'di ltar lha rnaMs
33a4(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsu mi gyi lha'i gnas nA yang yod pa ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar
33a5(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbring pos mngon por gtor ba'i me tog 'di dgra ni shing drang grel ba dang / 'o khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
33a6(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso/ 'phags pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni mo skyes
33a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// yid las skyes pa'i me togI nau grang yang med do// shing dang ge lo ba dang 'a khri shring las skyes pa yang mo yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces smras/ ko'uH
33a8(brgyad stong): khyod 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa ma yin gyi shing dang gel ba dang / 'khri shing la sa skyes po yang ma yi no zhes zer
33b1(brgyad stong): gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no// de nas lce rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor ni shes rab zab ste/ ming dang tshig tu gtogs pa de yang
33b2(brgyad stong): ston la de dang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de nyid kyang gsal bar byed cing de nyid kyang nye ba ra ste nu ta su mo/ de nas lnga rnams kyi drab ngo bo brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
33b3(brgyad stong): smras 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ci skad du me ba na smon pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la ba smra
33b4(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// de skad ces smos pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras/ kai'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
33b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos 'di la bslab par bya'o// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slo bo/ lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i
33b6(brgyad stong): 'bras bu la mi slob phyir mi 'bras bu la mi slob/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mi smra'o/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob/ sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gang su'i 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs
33b7(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slobo/ gang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs me pa la slob pa'o// gang sangs rgyas
33b8(brgyad stong): kyi chos gzhal du med gang sa med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams so/ 
34a1(brgyad stong): la ma yin/ de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang / gang tshor ba la ma
34a2(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ grang rnam be ru shes pa 'phol bar bye ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs yongasu gzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i
34a3(brgyad stong): phyir mi smig de bzhin du tshor ba la mo yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yi no// de rnam par shes pa yongasu gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ chos 'ga' zhig yongasu
34a4(brgyad stong): blozung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ chos 'ga' zhig yongasu bzung ba'i phyir mi slob bo ste/ skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob bo// chos 'ga' zhig yongasu gzung po'i
34a5(brgyad stong): phyi ro mi slob cing skye ba'i phyi ri mo slob nub pa'i phyir mi slo ba pu ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyi ri mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi sro bo/ nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i
34a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bos tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang
34a7(brgyad stong): ljonan po rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'ga' zhig yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu bzung ba'i phyir
34a8(brgyad stong): mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de sems dpa' chen po shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la so bo cing mang nyid
34b1(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin na de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa sems dpa
