34b2(brgyad stong): chen po gleng ches 'ga' zhig yongasu bzung ba'i phyi mo slob cing / skye ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slo ba nub pa
34b3(brgyad stong): phyir mi slob/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob ste/ tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
34b4(brgyad stong): chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing mas cing mkhyen po nyid la nges par 'byung por 'gyuraro/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dong ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
34b5(brgyad stong): dpa'adi skad ces smras/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang las btsa lwa bar bya/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ko'u shaM ka bya
34b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos she sA ri bi kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i rab 'byor gyi le'u la sau btsal bar bya'o/ de skad ces skyes pa dang / lha rnams kyi dri badz+ra
34b7(brgyad stong): bo brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phogs pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'odi su
34b8(brgyad stong): 'bru 'i rig par bya su'i byin gyis brlab su rig par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu se smras pa/ ko'u shi ka tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu rab 'byor she sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chang pa gang
35a1(brgyad stong): yin pa 'ang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
35a2(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smra so// ko'u shi ka gang 'di skad du 'phags pa 'obra 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthu ri rog
35a3(brgyad stong): par bya'o// zhes zer na/ ko'u shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ro rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhini gshegs pa
35a4(brgyad stong): byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gang yang 'di skad du bong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni
35a5(brgyad stong): kau'u shau ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de bzhin
35a6(brgyad stong): du tshor ba liM sA ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams laM sa ma yin/ rnam pAr shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ko 'di ltar gzugs
35a7(brgyad stong): ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs la so gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do// de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam
35a8(brgyad stong): par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gzhon du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/ de skad ces smras pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
35b1(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// 'phrigs pa rab 'byar dri lA ste shes ra
35b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i do ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byoran 'di
35b3(brgyad stong): lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gnos rten rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin to// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
35b4(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa chen po'o// kau& shi ka 'di ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du
35b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o/ ko'u shi kra 'di lta sde shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs phye ba'i phyir ko'u shrI kau 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
35b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o/ 
35b7(brgyad stong): gzugs tshad ma med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa
35b8(brgyad stong): shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir kau'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du/ 
36a1(brgyad stong): 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
36a2(brgyad stong): 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir ko'u shi kau shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
36a3(brgyad stong): bye da rnams dang rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa chen po
36a4(brgyad stong): zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa mi byed do// de bzhin du tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya bo dang / de bzhin du tshad med pa'i pha rolo du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha
36a5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa'o zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par mi byed do/ ko'u shi ka de lta bos na 'di lto ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'i/ 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol
36a6(brgyad stong): du phyin pa'o/ 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kro'u shi ka 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phan pa'o/ ko'u shi kau dmigs pa mtha' yos pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du
36a7(brgyad stong): 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ ko'u shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste pha rol du phyin pa
36a8(brgyad stong): yang ci ltar na dmigs pa mtha yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin zhe na/ ko'u shi kau 'di ltar chos thams cad thog
36b1(brgyad stong): dbus dang tha ma mi dmigs te/ de bas na ko'u shI ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs paM mtha' mas na
36b2(brgyad stong): phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// ko'u shrI ka gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad mtha' yas mu me/ de rnams kyi thog
36b3(brgyad stong): ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ de bas na ko'u shi ka'i do lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa k+Sh+ya kro'u shi ka gzugs kyi thog
36b4(brgyad stong): mya dang dbu sa sam tha ma yang mi dmigaso// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rna par shes pa'i thog ma'o mau dbus so/ tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ 
36b5(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sems
36b6(brgyad stong): can mtha' ya ste mu med pa'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigaso/ ko'u ni ka de bas na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste sh+le
36b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' ya sau pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so/ 'phags pa rab 'byor
36b8(brgyad stong): ji ltar na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'dri lta ste shos rab kyi pha rol dri phan pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin/ gnas rten rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka
37a1(brgyad stong): bgrang ba dang mi ldan pa'am/ bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa// 
37a2(brgyad stong): yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa 'phags pa rab 'byora'o na ci ltar sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta sde shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yos pa'i
37a3(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lnga s+ho sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgra
37a4(brgyad stong): yin/ bo rgya byin gyis smos pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la sde sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang
37a5(brgyad stong): mA yin te/ mring du btegs pa 'di ni blo bar du byung ba'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o/ ming du bau tags pa 'di ni bdag gi med pa'o// 'di lta ste sems can
37a6(brgyad stong): sems can zhes ming du btags pa 'di ni dmig su med po'o// gnas rten rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam de sems/ 'di la sems can du yongasu sngan
37a7(brgyad stong): par bya ba gang yang yod damr-i/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang la sems can yongasu bstan par byas pa
37a8(brgyad stong): 'go' zhig med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ ko'u shi ko gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa bskol ba gang
37b1(brgyad stong): gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bzhugs te/ mtha' yas 'das po rnam par rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang gsung dbyas zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig tu ba dro'i
37b2(brgyad stong): de la sems can gang yang skyes pa'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 'gog par 'gyur ba 'om/ 'gag pa yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'bikris pa
37b3(brgyad stong): 'byor de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang thog ma nus yongasasu dge ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang
37b4(brgyad stong): sems can mtha' bo yas pa'i 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka de lhor yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab
37b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya/ de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bca
37b6(brgyad stong): pA dang du skye dogu pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod de/ e ma'o chos e ma'o// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung bya gas
37b7(brgyad stong): yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis legs par smras pas brjodo cing bstan la rab tu bzhago/ bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad bdag cag ni byang chub se sa
37b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
38a1(brgyad stong): gnas pa 'dris gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dang / bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs
38a2(brgyad stong): pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' bstsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 
38a3(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mar me can zhes bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus su mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dring na nga shes rab kyi
38a4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe ma re mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i des na bskal pa
38a5(brgyad stong): grangs med pa na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang por ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i
38a6(brgyad stong): khe lo sgyur ba/ bla ni med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasu 'gyur zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i
38a7(brgyad stong): bu de deg gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub par byed pa
38a8(brgyad stong): dang / rje su yongasu 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar to/ bde bar gshegs pa shin du ngo 'tshar to zhes gsol to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po brgyad stong pa la so brgya bi na gyi
38b1(brgyad stong): le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong // // bam po gsum pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor d+hi r-I lho'i tu ga
38b2(brgyad stong): dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong mo dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang lha'i bu de rnams 'dus te 'khor
38b3(brgyad stong): gyur par mkhyen cing 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang mkhyen nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'od
38b4(brgyad stong): glo sal dang dge chung dang 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs
38b5(brgyad stong): ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' ba stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klag
38b6(brgyad stong): gama?/ kun chub par byed dam/ rab tu 'don na/ de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lte ba dang glags tshil ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
38b7(brgyad stong): bu mo de la mi'am mi ma yin pa glags lta bA dang glags tshol ba rnams kyi so glags rnyed pa ri me'i gyur/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de yang yang ma spangs par 'chi bo'i dus byed par ma
38b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ lha'i bu gang dag gzhan yang lha'i bu dge bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag por zhugs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
39a1(brgyad stong): 'di ma bzung ba dang bcangs pa dang / ma klags pa dang / kun chub bar ma byas pa dang / rab tu mi 'dron pa'i lha'i bu de dgra rigs kyi bu de'i drung du 'ong 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi
39a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'din pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur 'ching bar/ 
39a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyura'ani ra ba zhi 'don pa ro 'gyuraro/ lha'i bu dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
39a4(brgyad stong): dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kAn chub par byed pa dang / rabra tu 'dren pa de dgon par song yang rang / de dang der 'gro ba shing drang du song yaung rang / khyim spong du so nga yaudra rung / bla gab meng
39a5(brgyad stong): par song rung / lam gol b.raraM seng ying rung / 'brog dgon par song yang rung / rgya mtsho rgya chen po ri srong rung / de dang deri 'gro ba'i/ 'chag pa'am/ 'dag pa 'am/ nyal na yang rung ste/ 
39a6(brgyad stong): 'jigs par 'gyur bya'am/ rengs pa rI 'gyur ba 'am/ nyid du mi 'byung mi skye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
39a7(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo glang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa drang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang de rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de ni theg phra gsum gyis seMs
39a8(brgyad stong): can rnams 'dalo bai ra bgyid cing / sems can gyi 'od shes kang mi bskyed pa ni ngo 'tshar to// bcoM kro ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kwi ba 'am rigs kyo ba mo/ gra nga? shes rab kI pha
39b1(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sgo byor bgyi'o// de nas ma com pa la
39b2(brgyad stong): la lha rnams kyi dbang phye brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cig gri bkyong rigs kyi bu 'om rigs kyi bu mo gang des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa di 'a
39b3(brgyad stong): ba dang 'chang po dang / klog+sa pa d+mong rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dge bskyab pa dang ska bar bgyor/ bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mi mjed kyi ba drag go/ tshong spyi ris kyi lha'i
39b4(brgyad stong): narnams dang / bcas pas kyang 'di skadade ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cog gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang
39b5(brgyad stong): dadang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur bya de la srung ba dang bskyab pa drong sba bar bgyi'o// de nis bcom ldan 'das lo lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di
39b6(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'i mi rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin po dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub por bgyid pa dang / rab tu
39b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / ston pa dang tshe 'dri la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 'di la yon tan 'di dag nges par thob cing yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo 'tshar to/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol du bya
39b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di bzung na pha rol de phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung por 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sa lha rdzas kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sa la 'di skad ces bka
40a1(brgyad stong): bsngal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung bas pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur/ ko'u shi ka gzhan yang
40a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed na ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan gang

40a4(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'adi skad ces bka' bstsal to// ko'u shri kau de la gang zhig chos 'di rtsod pa drod pa dang rgol bar
40a5(brgyad stong): byed 'dod na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang 'ogal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa skyes shing skye ba rnams slar nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi
40a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa dang de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ki de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu

40b8(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pa de dog shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang stobs dang mthu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas myur du de nyid nas med par 'gyur/ nye bar zhi zhi
41a1(brgyad stong): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas 'gag cing nub par 'gyur la gnas par mi 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'dod chag

44a1(brgyad stong): dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug du mar me'i phreng
44a2(brgyad stong): dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir bgyis pa dang rjed pa dang mchod pa dang / ro ma bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na rigs
44a3(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gnyi ga bsod nams ches mdu du grangs skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bya/ 
44a4(brgyad stong): stsal to// ko'u shi ka de'i phyir 'di khyod nyid la dri bar bya ste/ khyod kyis ci ltar nus pa de bzhin du lang ston cig/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
44a5(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bdag gi dngos po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa des lam grang zhig la bslabs pas de bzhin
44a6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ro rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs
44a7(brgyad stong): rgyas/ de ska de cis bka' stsal pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcomo ldani 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas bcom
44a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes
44b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs rgya so// bcom ldan 'das kis bka' bstsal pa/ ko'u shi kra de lta bas na 'o na ni bdag gi dngos pa'i sku 'di brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs
44b2(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'i/ thams cad mkhyen po nyid brnyes pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gangs 'gro'o// ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dag
44b3(brgyad stong): bcom po yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba yin zhing / ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag
44b4(brgyad stong): gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba yin zhing / ko'u shI ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
44b5(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa las byung ba yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pa yin no/ rten 'di la rten nas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur/ chos
44b6(brgyad stong): kyi sku 'byed par 'gyur/ dge 'dun gyi sku rab tu 'byed par 'gyuraro// de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu bdag gis dngos po'i sku brnyes pa gang yin po de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i
44b7(brgyad stong): yi shos kyi rten du gyur pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar gyur pa yon la
44b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin dang yongs mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang sgo de dag la yang mchod por 'gyuraro// de bas na kauru shi ka/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
45a1(brgyad stong): 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par byas te/ bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i phye ma
45a2(brgyad stong): dang / lha'i na bza' dang / lI'i gdugs dang / lho'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i dril buM dang / lha'i ba dun dang / kho ra yug du lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa
45a3(brgyad stong): mang po dag gis mchod par byed/ bai ku ra ba stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed pa byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ rIgs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams ches
45a4(brgyad stong): mang du grang skyed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kau bu'i rigs kyi bu mo des thams cad mkhon pa'i ye shos la mchod pa bas par 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shwe
45a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i do 'dri ba nu glegs bum+ba du chud pra 'di la bkur bstir byed/ bla mar pyod/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag byed 'di nyid de
45a6(brgyad stong): las bsod na mos ches mang de bskyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo mchod pa byed pa de su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa byis par 'gyur
45a7(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'dres lnga lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha
45a8(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi bgyid 'dzin par mi bgyid 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog por mi bgyid/ kun chub par mi bgyid/ reb tu 'don par mi bgyid/ ston por mi gyid/ nye ba
45b1(brgyad stong): ston par mi bgyid/ lung 'bogs par mi bgyid/ kha ton du mi bgyid/ shes rab kyi phra rol du phyin pa 'di la me tog dang bdug pa dang / di dang phreng ba dang / byeg pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
45b2(brgyad stong): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng po dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par mi bgyi de/ bkur bsti ra mi bgyid
45b3(brgyad stong): bla mar mi bgyid/ rjed par mi bgyid/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid pa de dag gi so bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bgyid pa
45b4(brgyad stong): de ltar don chen po can du ma 'tshal ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mchod par bgyis pa de ltar phan
45b5(brgyad stong): yon chen po dang ldan par rtogs par ma gyur lags sam/ de ltar 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smin pa che bar des rig par ma gyur logs sam/ 'on te 'tshal cing rtogs la rig kyang
45b6(brgyad stong): slar zhing drad pa rim gyur pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bocom ldan 'das kyis lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' ba srul pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sos/ 
45b7(brgyad stong): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang mi ljon pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas ded pa dang lda na pa ci snyed cig yod/ de
45b8(brgyad stong): skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzem bu'i gling gi mi de dag pa
46a1(brgyad stong): gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang / ldan pa dang chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // de skad
46a2(brgyad stong): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' ba stsal to/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ 'dzum pa'i gling gi mi de dag las gang
46a3(brgyad stong): dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldano pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo / ko'u shi ka gang
46a4(brgyad stong): dag dag 'dun la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / gang dag lan cig phyire 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i/ 
46a5(brgyad stong): 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang che sa nyung ngo / gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag rang byang chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba de dag
46a6(brgyad stong): pas kyang ches nyung / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni nyung ba de dag kyang ches nyung ngo / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
46a7(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas por byed po de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
46a8(brgyad stong): bo skyed nas sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas par byed pa de na nyung ba de dag pas ches nyung ngo / gang dog bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa rgyas par byas
46b1(brgyad stong): nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pos kyang ches nyung
46b2(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyung ba de dag pos kyang chos nyung ngo / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing 'o ba de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
46b3(brgyad stong): sa la gnas pa ni nyung ba de dag pos kyang chos nyung ngo // gang dag shes rob kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par 'tshe
46b4(brgyad stong): rgya bar 'gyur ba ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
46b5(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya bo de dag ni nyung ba de dag pasau kyang ches nyung ngo / ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub soms dpa'i sa la gnas te/ bla
46b6(brgyad stong): nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog so paro sangs rgyas nas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag pa'i bas po phun sum tshogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol du/ 
46b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa la slob cing 'ab pa gzhan rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nye bar ston cing 'bogs pa dang / de dag li yang 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / 'chang du 'jug pa dang / klog tu 'dzun
46b8(brgyad stong): po dang / kan du chub par byed du 'jug pa dang / rab tu 'don du 'jog pa dang / ston du 'jug pa dang / nye bar ston du 'dzag pa dang / long 'bogs 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed da
47a1(brgyad stong): 'jug pa de dang de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la lha'i me tog dang / lha'i bdug pa dang / lha'i dri dri lha'i brang ba dag lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lcen
47a2(brgyad stong): bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshon dang / lho'i dril bu dang / lha'i ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mngo bo dag gis mcho
47a3(brgyad stong): par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ brjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ bsnyen bkar byed/ pa dag ni yin no/ kro'u shi kra yang gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub
47a4(brgyad stong): kyi sems rgyas par byed cing / byang chub kyo sems rab tu rgyas par byas te/ byang chub tu spyod pa'i sems can dag ni gzhal du med pa grangs me pa yid mod kyi/ ko& shi ka yang sems/ 
47a5(brgyad stong): can gzhal dad med pa gangs med pa bong tshob ki phyir sred pa de dag las gal te no gtsog ga ma gnyis shig par mi log pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
47a6(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub ni brtson 'grus zhan pa/ lo la can dang sems pa dman pa dang / 'dra shes dman pa dang / myos pa dman pa dang / shes rab doman pa
47a7(brgyad stong): rnams kyis sgrub par dka'o/ ko'u shi kra de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'cha
47a8(brgyad stong): rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chad por shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di nyid mnyan pa ri bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// ku ni chub par bya'o// rab tu 'don
47b1(brgyad stong): bya'o/ bstan par bya'o// nye bar bstan par bya'o// lung 'bogs par bya'o// kha don du bya'o/ yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'om rigs
47b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegaso pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
47b3(brgyad stong): rol da phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas bdag cog gis kyang 'di la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bidag cag gi ston pa'o zhes shes te/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs
47b4(brgyad stong): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rang mo ngan las 'das kyang rang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa/ 
47b5(brgyad stong): 'di nyid la brten par bya'o// kro'u shi kA de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu'i mi rigs kyi bu mo gang lo la zhig gos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongasu
47b6(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rteno de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ma pa du ma byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des de la
47b7(brgyad stong): nam 'tsho'i bar du lnga'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang / lho'i dri dang / lho'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye me dang / lha'i na bzo' dang / lho'i gi dregs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / 
47b8(brgyad stong): lha'i dril ba dang / lce'i ba dan dang / kho ra yig tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dge dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkrar bisIr byed/ bla mar med/ rjed par
48a1(brgyad stong): mchod par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mdadu bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gso
48a2(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mong ngo / bde bar gi shogs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ko'u shrI ki de lta bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di bsod namaso mang dra ba skyed
48a3(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la sems dong bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
48a4(brgyad stong): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang // rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs p+ta dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid
48a5(brgyad stong): kyi rje su rtogs pa dang / ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i
48a6(brgyad stong): chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang mo bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngan glegs bam du chud par
48a7(brgyad stong): byas te/ 'chang ngam bya zhag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa del mo tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan drang dril
48a8(brgyad stong): dang ba dan dag dang / kho r+ya dag tu mar mo'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa ming po dag gis mchod par byed/ bkur bsngo byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen pa tu
48b1(brgyad stong): byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma 'di nyid bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyed do// kro'u shi ka rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi
48b2(brgyad stong): snying po can gyis yongasu gang bar byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang de dag la nam mtsho'i bir du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i gdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i
48b3(brgyad stong): na bza' dang / lha'i phye ma dang lci'i na bza' dang / lho'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i ba danra dag dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod
48b4(brgyad stong): pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mched par byedade/ bkur ba sti ri byid bla mar byed/ brjed par byed mchod par bye de/ ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi
48b5(brgyad stong): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bzhi las bsod nams mang de bo skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gosol pa bcomo ldan 'das maung ngo bde bar gshogs pa mang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
48b6(brgyad stong): bstsal pa/ ko'u shri ka rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de 'dis bsod nams ches mang du bskyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mo sa la sems dang
48b7(brgyad stong): bas byang chub tu sems bskyod nas lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'ching ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa
48b8(brgyad stong): dang / ro lang 'bogs pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam por 'brel pa dang / yid kyis rjesu rtog pa dang / ci lta bur grub
49a1(brgyad stong): pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyad par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces drim pa'i chos yun ring du gan
49a2(brgyad stong): par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la pha ni gdugs pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu ni glegs pa ma du chud par byas te 'chang
49a3(brgyad stong): bzhago la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang dri dang breng bu dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / dril bri dang / bo dan dang / khor yug
49a4(brgyad stong): tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa ma rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod per byed de/ bkur bstor byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed
49a5(brgyad stong): ni/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod namos mang du bskyed/ ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir na po sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gnyis
49a6(brgyad stong): pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams kyis yongasu gang ba lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka/ yang gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las
49a7(brgyad stong): sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i bdug pa dang
49a8(brgyad stong): lha'i dri dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshon dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug tu
49b1(brgyad stong): lha'i mar me'i phreng ba drag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed/ 
49b2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i bzhi lngas bsod noms mngo bskyed dmo/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngang / bde bor
49b3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kro'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bso da nam sa ches mang du bskyed de/ gong
49b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mngon por dad de rtog cing myos la sems dang bsu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lha ge pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'cha
49b5(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang / nyo ba ra ston pa dang lung 'o bogs pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang
49b6(brgyad stong): dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'brel ba dang / yid kyis rje su rtog cing pa dang / ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod par byed pa dang / 
49b7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bso byang chub sems das
49b8(brgyad stong): sa mos dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs pa mi du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
50a1(brgyad stong): de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba don dag dang / kho ra yug/ 
50a2(brgyad stong): me'i phreng ba dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed/ bkur bsti ri byed/ bla mur byed rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ro mo byed bsnyen bkur byed/ na ke'u shi ka
50a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i bzhi las bsod nams ches mung du bo skyed de/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kha mos kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ 
50a4(brgyad stong): ko'u shI ka yung stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi mo chud rten de bzhin gshegs pa
50a5(brgyad stong): pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po tsan re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la na mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i di dang / lci'i phreng ba dang / lce'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma
50a6(brgyad stong): drang lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugos drang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i bo dan dag dang / khor yug tu ma re me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag
50a7(brgyad stong): gis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir byed bla mar byi de/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed bsnyen bkur bA da na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag
50a8(brgyad stong): thams cad de rig ni las bsod nams mdun skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das meng ngo / bode par gshegs pa mdza / bcom ldan 'das kyis dri na
50b1(brgyad stong): pra stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mchod par dad de rtog cing mos la
50b2(brgyad stong): sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyod nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang
50b3(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sa gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjesu rtog pa dang / 
50b4(brgyad stong): ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yu na ring dag n+da
50b5(brgyad stong): par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub semos dpa'o sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur ba chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngem
50b6(brgyad stong): bzhagro la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdogs dang rgyal mchin dang / dril bu dang / bya dan dog dang / khor yug tu
50b7(brgyad stong): ma ra me'i phreng ba dag dang / mcho pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed do/ bkur bstir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ na/ ko'u shi ka ri
50b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu' mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams tshos mang du bskyed/ ko'u shi ka sto spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhogau/ ko'u shi ka yang stong
51a1(brgyad stong): gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can+da re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rjen de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring smen
51a2(brgyad stong): gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar dri lha'i me tog dang / lha'i budug pa dang / lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang lha
51a3(brgyad stong): gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril bu dang lnga'i ba dan drug dang khor yug tu mur mo'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod po mang po dag gis mchod par byed/ 
51a4(brgyad stong): bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ri mor byed/ bsnyen bai ku ra byed na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i bzhi las bsod nams mngo du
51a5(brgyad stong): skye dam/ brgya byin gyi so gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo badri bar gshegs pa mong ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
51a6(brgyad stong): 'dis bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ldog pa'i bsam pas nyan
51a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'tshang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par ji byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / ro lung 'obigs pa dang / kha don byed pa dang gzhan dag la ya
51a8(brgyad stong): rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'brel ba dang yid kyis rjesu rdog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod par byed po dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshu
51b1(brgyad stong): rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring dgranas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
51b2(brgyad stong): rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub par byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang nga mo bzhug la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang
51b3(brgyad stong): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dngon bzu' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dong ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
51b4(brgyad stong): mi chodra par byed de/ bla ma re br-i rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed ba stene byed/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 'di nyid de'i bzhi lngas bsodra nams mang du
51b5(brgyad stong): da do/ kro'u shri ka stong gnyis pa bo ra ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kau sems tsan thams cad lta shog/ kau'e shi kra ya stong ge sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
51b6(brgyad stong): sems can ji snyed de yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can de dag ro ris rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed
51b7(brgyad stong): du bcug ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar dwa lha'i me tog drang lha'i bdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugos
51b8(brgyad stong): dang lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i ba dan dang / khi ra yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par bye de/ bkur bstir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed
52a1(brgyad stong): mchod par byed/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag thams cad de'i bzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
52a2(brgyad stong): 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom lnga 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 'dis bsod nams ches mang du bskyed de// 
52a3(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyod nis/ lhag po'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
52a4(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogos pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 
52a5(brgyad stong): 'di'i don rnam par 'grel ba dang / yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongasu dpyod pa byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i
52a6(brgyad stong): chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la pho na gdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu ni glegs bam du chud
52a7(brgyad stong): par byas te 'chang ngam bzhig la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phyi ma dang / nu bo za' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / de
52a8(brgyad stong): bu dang ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa mang po dag gis mchod per byed de/ bkur bsti ri byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ri mor byed// 
52b1(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur byed/ na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i bzhi las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ kro'u shaM ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po
52b2(brgyad stong): 'jig rte ni blo khams kyi sems can rnams re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam mtsho
52b3(brgyad stong): bar du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i gdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang / lce'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril bu dang lha'i bi dan thams cad dang khor
52b4(brgyad stong): yug tu me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam po mang po dag gis mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka yong gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen
52b5(brgyad stong): bre'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad yongasu brtag paro bzung ste/ snga phyi mod par mi'i lus thob par 'gyur la de dag las kyang sems can ra ras
52b6(brgyad stong): rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can ri re byed du bcug ste/ byed du bcug nas kyang sems can re res kyang mchod rten de dag thams cad bzhag
52b7(brgyad stong): ste/ bskal pa'i ma skal pas lhag pa silnga snyan thams cad dang klu dbyangs thams cad dang / grar thams cad dang rol mo dang / pheg rdob pa thams cad dang / lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug
52b8(brgyad stong): pa dang / lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang kho ra yug tu
53a1(brgyad stong): lha'i mur me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag thams cad kyis mchod par byed de/ bku re bstir byed/ bla mar byed rjed par bya/ 
53a2(brgyad stong): mchod par byed/ ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsod nams bye ba des mcho rten gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag
53a3(brgyad stong): du bcug la de lta ba'i ngo bo'i mchod pa dag klong byed du bcug na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snya mdod sems/ ci sems can de dag tha maso cad de'i bzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ brgya
53a4(brgyad stong): byin gyi sra gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo badre bor gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bas
53a5(brgyad stong): nimams ches mang du bskyed dam/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems po skye de nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas
53a6(brgyad stong): nyan pa dang 'dzin po dngo 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub por byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye b.ru ston pa dang l+r-ing 'i bo kris pa dang / kha dron byed pa dang gzhan dag la
53a7(brgyad stong): rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / de'i don rnam par 'grol ba dang yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ci lta bu ra grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
53a8(brgyad stong): tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yin ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po rnams la phan gdags pa
53b1(brgyad stong): sgrub pa byas par 'gyur ba ra chu dun glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam gzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang / de dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / byem
53b2(brgyad stong): drang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang ba dan dgra dang kho ra yug tu ma ra me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gi se mchod par byed/ bkur bsti
53b3(brgyad stong): bye da bla mar byed rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ nA/ ko'u shrI ki rigs kyi bre'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i bzhi las bsod nams mdo du bskyed/ de skad
53b4(brgyad stong): tsos bka' bo stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyo byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das shes ra
53b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bkur bsti rI bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / rjod par bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu laM/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'dra
53b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / mo byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis yongasu mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnam so lo shin du ba
53b7(brgyad stong): ba sti ra bgyis pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang / rjed par bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam
53b8(brgyad stong): grangs 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ bcom ldan 'das yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas gang ga'i
54a1(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring sreg
54a2(brgyad stong): gyi snying po ca ni re re bo gyid du bstsal la/ bgyid du bstsal nas kyang sems can de dag re ris mchod brten de dag thams cad brdeg ste/ bskal pa'am bskal pa bas lhag par samra snyan tha~Mng
54a3(brgyad stong): da klu dbyangs thams cad dang / gar thams cad dang rol mo dang pheg rdob pa thams cad dang / lha'i me tog thams cad dang / lnga'i bdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang /

54a5(brgyad stong): mang po dag thams cad kyis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir ba gyid bla mar bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ brjed par bgyid/ mchod par ba gyid/ ri mor bgyid/ bsnyen bkur ba byid kha bas
54a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mo sa la sems dang byas
54a7(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lhag pa'i bo sim pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'i tshang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa
54a8(brgyad stong): dong lung 'i bogs pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel ba dang / yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ji lta bu
54b1(brgyad stong): grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma tsI ga/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa
54b2(brgyad stong): bgyi ba dang / tshul dang mu bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub par bgyis par 'gyur bar chung ni glegs bam du chud pa rab gyis/ 
54b3(brgyad stong): te 'chang ngam po zhag la shes rab kyi po rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mchi ni dang dril bu dang / 
54b4(brgyad stong): ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu ma rau me'i phreng po dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dge gis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rjed par bgyid/ mchod par bgyin
54b5(brgyad stong): ri mo rabagyid bsnyen bkur bgyid/ na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ma du bskyed do// dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang
54b6(brgyad stong): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin ni/ de de bzhin te/ ko'u shI ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo da ni de'i bzhi las bsod nam so mang po bskyed/ ko'un
54b7(brgyad stong): kA rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi lngas bsod nams mang po bskyed do/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bzhi las bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed de/ 
54b8(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bzhi las bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa bskyed do/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de de'i bzhi las bsod nam
55a1(brgyad stong): mnyam pa med pa skye do/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i tshe bzhi las bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shI ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
55a2(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las skyes shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mchod pa yang thams cad
55a3(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid las skye sa/ ko'u shi ka de lta bA sa na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par drad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas
55a4(brgyad stong): byabyabya chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dring 'dzin pa dang 'tshong ba dang / klog po dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / 
55a5(brgyad stong): lung 'o bgos pa dang / 'don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grol ba dang / yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i
55a6(brgyad stong): rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang
55a7(brgyad stong): tshul drang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar mun glegs bam du chud par byas te 'tshong nga bzhag la shes
55a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdag pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / no bza' dang gdags dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang ba dan dang / khor yug
55b1(brgyad stong): tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/ blo mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ 
55b2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can bku ra~M bsIr byas pa'i bsode nams mngon
55b3(brgyad stong): pA ra 'du byas pa snga ma des brgya'i cha ra yong nye brar mi 'gro/ snying gi cha ro yang brgya stong gi chur yang / bye ba'i char yang bye ba bri rgya'i char yang bye bo stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong
55b4(brgyad stong): gi char yo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// char yang bgrang bar yong dper yang / drapes bstan par bya bar yang rten du yang
55b5(brgyad stong): rgyur yang mi bzod de/ de nas lha'i bu bzhi khri gang dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang bcas pa 'khor der 'dres te/ 'khod par gyur pa de dag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
55b6(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces gsol te/ grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po zung shig/ grogos po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zung bar bya ba yin no// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa klon
55b7(brgyad stong): par bya ba yin no// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ku ni chub par bya ba yin ni/ grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rab tu 'don par bya ba yin no// grog so po shes rab kyi pha rol
55b8(brgyad stong): dad pi ni pa bstan par bya ba yin no// gogos po shes rob kyi pho rol du phyin pa nye bar bstan par bya ba yin/ gogs po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lung 'bogs par bya ba yin no// gogs so
56a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa kha don du bya ba yin no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// kro'u she ka khyod kyis
56a2(brgyad stong): shes rab ki pha rol du phyin pa zung shig/ ko'u shi ko kho da kis shes ra ba ki pha rol dad phan pa kha don du ba ba tshongs shog/ kau'o shi ka kho de ki sa shes rab ki pha rol phen pa lcogs shig/ 
56a3(brgyad stong): klo'u shi ka khyod kyis shaus rab kyi pha rol dri phyin pa/ kun chub par gyis shog/ ko'u shi ka khod kis sho sau rAb kyi pha rol du phyin po rab tu thon cig/ ko'u shi kau khyod kyis shaus rab kyi pha rol du
56a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa ston cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nye bar ston cig/ ko'u shi kau khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin paM lung phog shig/ ko'u shi kau khyod kyis shes rab kyi the
56a5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa kha don du byos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shau ka gang gi tshe lha min rnams 'di lta burA sems kyi rgyu bo byung ste/ 'di snyam du sum bcu rtsa gsum po'i lho rnaMs dang 'thab par
56a6(brgyad stong): bya'o/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed par bya'o// snyam na de'i tshe ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi po ril du phyin pa 'di dran par byos shig/ kha don du
56a7(brgyad stong): byos shig dang / lha ma yin de dag gi sems kyi rgyu ba de lta bu de dag kyang nub par 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' bo stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi/ 
56a8(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi'i rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'i/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di/ 
56b1(brgyad stong): tshad med pa'i rig sngo gso/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gong na med pa'i rig sngagaso/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni man
56b2(brgyad stong): pa med pa'i rig sdig so/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
56b3(brgyad stong): bka' bstsal to/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste de de bzhin nu de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
56b4(brgyad stong): ni tshad ma med pa'i rig sdogaso/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sdig so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gong na med pa'i rig sngags
56b5(brgyad stong): ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni blo na med pa'i rig sngag so// ko'u shi kA 'dri lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i do ni mnyamo pa med pa'i rig sdug so// ko'u ni
56b6(brgyad stong): sI ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di no mi mnyam pa'i dang mnyam pa'i rIg sngagaso/ de ci'i phyir ni nu/ ko'u shau ka 'di lta s+t+r-i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri ni rig sngags/ 'di
56b7(brgyad stong): rten cing sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
56b8(brgyad stong): shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
57a1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ci snyed pa de snyed kyang / klo'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rig sngags/ 'di nyid la rten nas bla na med pa yang dag par
57a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ko'u shi ka da ltar stong gsum gyi sto ngo chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa na// 
57a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grang su dag bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pA'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag kyang / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du
57a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la rten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas// ko'u shi ka nga yang 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
57a5(brgyad stong): rig sngags 'di nyid la rten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mongon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso/ ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di nyid la rten nas dge bcu'i las kyi la
57a6(brgyad stong): rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed de/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bani 'dzeg rten du rab tu 'byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten
57a7(brgyad stong): du rab tu 'byed do/ byang chub ky-i yan lago dang ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa
57a8(brgyad stong): drug rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed/ shos rib kyi pha rol mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ba'i
57b1(brgyad stong): stong yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// shes rab kyi
57b2(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa'i rgyu 'bru brgyad stong pa// bam po bzhi pa// / ko'u shi ka gang gi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas rnams
57b3(brgyad stong): 'jig rten du mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
57b4(brgyad stong): chen po rnam so shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa sngon thos pas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ byang chub kyi yan lag dong mi ljon po'i bsam gtan bzhi 'jig
57b5(brgyad stong): rten du rab tu 'byed// byang chub tu yin lag dang mi ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed de/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten
57b6(brgyad stong): du rab tu 'byid/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jig pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i
57b7(brgyad stong): mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du rab tu'i byed do// kau'u shI ka 'di lta ste dper na zla bo'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas smon dang skor ma thams cad stobs ci lta ba dang
57b8(brgyad stong): kun du snang bar byed/ rgyu skar rnams kyangango stobs tso lta ba dang mthu ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du de byi zhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par
58a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das nas dam pa'i chos 'jig par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog

58a8(brgyad stong): gyis bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu mo rnams de'i bi na las de dag yang tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang / ldan par 'gyur/

58b8(brgyad stong): dri phyin pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi drang na byams pa'i sems kyis byams pa nye bar slob pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis snying rje nye bar sgrub pa si/ nye bar gnas par

60a3(brgyad stong): bodag nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas ba ded sdig can gyis yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'des gal ba der nye bar 'ongaso/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po

60b4(brgyad stong): rag tu ga tor te/ 'di skad du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yun ring mo zhig na 'dzam pa'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nang du 'byung ngo / zhes ched du brjod pa ched de brjod nas/ yang lha'i

60b6(brgyad stong): dang sgom pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag la ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

61a1(brgyad stong): kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bgyib bgyis pa lags na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston /

61a3(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu 'byed cing / 'di las thams
61a4(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper ni rin po che chen po gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po rab tu bye bo lags/ de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po la/ 
61a5(brgyad stong): btsal bar bgyi ba lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab kyi
61a6(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// 
61a7(brgyad stong): bzhin nod de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che chen po ni 'di lta ste
61a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'di las skyoso/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
61b1(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i bsngags pa mi gsung zhing ming yongasu mi bsgrogs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mu lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ma
61b2(brgyad stong): logs/ bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin po'i sngags pa mi gsungo zhing ming yongasu mi bsgrogs kyi 'on ka ngo bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po cig pa nyid
61b3(brgyad stong): kyi bsngags pa yongasu bzung ba dang / ming yongasu bsgogs par 'dzad do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i bstsal pa/ de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
61b4(brgyad stong): ba kho na'i sngags pa smra ba dang ming yongasasu bsgrags par 'gyi/ pha rol du phyin pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' be shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni pha rol du phyin pa ni pha rol tu
61b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa lnga pi rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ des na pha rol du phyin pa'i ming thob pa/ kun dga' bro de ji snyam du semaso/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu ma sngos pa'i sbyin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
61b6(brgyad stong): po zhes bya ba'i mying 'thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskyil pa ti kun dga'o de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin
61b7(brgyad stong): yong su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang / yong su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / yeng su mA bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus dang / yongasu ma bsdus pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang / kun dga' bo 'di ji snyan
61b8(brgyad stong): du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu ma bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur rami/ dkun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
62a1(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pas yongasu bsngo bar byed pa shes rab gang lags yin pa de bsam gyis
62a2(brgyad stong): khyab pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bas yongasu bsngo bar byed
62a3(brgyad stong): po'i shes rab gang legs pa de ni she bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mchog tu bsam gyis mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kun dge'o
62a4(brgyad stong): de lta ba sa na?/ de ltar dam pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur te gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa rnas/ 
62a5(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa'i ming thob bo// kun dga'o de lta bas na dge ba'i rtse ba rnams thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid du songasu bsngos pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga'i sprin du 'gro zhing / 
62a6(brgyad stong): 'dren pa yongasu 'dren pa'o// tshul 'dis pha rol du phyin pa lnga ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa kho na'i nang du 'dras// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba ni pha
62a7(brgyad stong): du phyin pa drug yings rdzogs po'i tshigra bla dag so// kun dga' bo de lta bso na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu bsgrags na pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu bsgrags par
62a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ kun dgare bo 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab ma tshogs pa dang phrad na skye bor 'gyur te/ sa chen po ni sa bon de dog gi bzhi yin pas sa chen po la bortan nas sa
62b1(brgyad stong): bon de dag skye bar 'gyur// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa lnga ni shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pas yang dag par gzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa yin
62b2(brgyad stong): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brten nas pha rol du phyin pa lnga skye bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yong dag par su gzung ba'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob
62b3(brgyad stong): par 'gyuraro// kun dga'i de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid pha rol du phyin pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'dren pa yong su 'dren pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi
62b4(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das re shig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzung zhing bcangs pa dang / glegs pa dang kun chub par bgyis pa dang / rab tu
62b5(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don du bgyis pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos yon tan gang dag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba shes ra
62b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bsgrags pa ma lags te/ 'on kyang gang zhin
62b7(brgyad stong): bro dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa 'dri'i phyogs gcig bzung zhing rab tu bton pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa ko'u shi ka
62b8(brgyad stong): leg so lig so/ ko'u shi ka yang gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston
63a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don byed pa de dag nyid 'ba' shig la yon tan 'di shig de ni ma zad kyi/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi rigs bu mo gang gis sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad
63a2(brgyad stong): par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
63a3(brgyad stong): phan bdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam do chud par byas te 'chang nge ma bzhog li/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdag
63a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ni bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dog dang / kha ro yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gi
63a5(brgyad stong): mchod par byed/ bkur byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ na/ ko'u shi ki rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i yang tshe 'di nyid
63a6(brgyad stong): yon tan nges bshad pa yin no// de skad ces bka'o basprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'odas la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
63a7(brgyad stong): gis kyang grang zhig sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du ga nas par bgyi ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas
63a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' semaso dpe' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa bgyis par 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud pa rabagyis
63b1(brgyad stong): te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdogs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu
63b2(brgyad stong): kha dran dag dang / kho ra yug tu ma ri mo'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed do/ bkur stir po skyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rjed por bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ ri ma
63b3(brgyad stong): bgyid/ bsnyen bkur bgyi de/ pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / spro ba bgyid par 'gyur na/ ging shes rab kyi pha rol dri phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa
63b4(brgyad stong): dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub por bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston po dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don dri bgyid po dang / me tog dang ba drug pa dang

63b8(brgyad stong): phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po rnams chos nyan po'i phyir nye bar bong por 'gyur/ lha'i bu de dag chos nyan pa na chos smra ba de'i spobs pa nye bar sgrubo snyam du sems par 'gyur
64a1(brgyad stong): gang gi tshe yang chos smra ba de mi smra bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang lha'i bu de dag gis chos la gus pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ji snyam du ltar smra ba de
64a2(brgyad stong): nyid du 'dun pa de ltar spobs pa nye bar ston pa dang / sgrub par sems/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba dang klon
64a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / la ngo 'bogs pa dang kha don byed par 'gyur po de dag tshe 'odi la yon tan 'di la dag kyang yongs / 
64a4(brgyad stong): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi ba 'am rigs ki ba mo de shes rab ki pha rol dad phyin pa 'di 'chad pa na nga la kAn ka tshol ba'i bsam pras 'ga' zhig rgol na mi rang
64a5(brgyad stong): snyam du 'khor gyi 'dun du sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsrung ba dang skyab pa dang / sba ba byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la/ 
64a6(brgyad stong): gnas pa des ni kAn ko tshil ba yang yang dag pa re rjesu mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la gnas pas nA ko na ka tshol por byed pa yang yong dag par rjesu mi mthong / ge la klan
64a7(brgyad stong): kwa ba tsal bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu gzung ba'i rigs
64a8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigasa~M kya ba mo la rnam grangs 'dis rgol ba gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de yang mi dngang kan du mi skrag kun du sgeg pa dang ldan par mi byed do// ko'u shi ki rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo

67a1(brgyad stong): kha don byed par 'gyur/ bltas shing phyag byas nas 'dud pa byas/ bzung ba byas bcang ba byas klag pa byas/ kun chub par byas/ rab tu 'don par byas rab tu 'don//
