100a3(brgyad stong): nom grangs kyi le'o sde lnga pa'o// // / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas rten tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras/ 'phags pA rab 'byor gzhan yi/ 
100a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems drapa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjesu yi dri rang ba yongasu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / gang yang sems can+da thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i/ 
100a5(brgyad stong): bsro nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las bying bri'i bsod na mis bye ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag lus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rje su yid rang ba yongasu bsngo ba dang ldan
100a6(brgyad stong): pa'i bsodra na mos bya ba'i dngos po 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces po'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ bla ma zhes bya'o/ bla na med pa zhes pa'o// grong na med pa zhes po/ 
100a7(brgyad stong): mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas rten tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gang gisra thams cad ni/ 
100a8(brgyad stong): thams cad du song ba'i phyogs btsa'i 'jig rten ni stong gsom gyi slong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa/ gang so med pa'i yang grangs med pa/ tshad med pa'i yang tshad med pa/ bas mi
100b1(brgyad stong): gyis mi khyab pa'i bra sim gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha' yas mu med pa yod pa rnams kyi phyogs re re'i stang gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer/ 'das pa'i dus na gzhal du med pa'i gzhal du
100b2(brgyad stong): med pa'i gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa'i grangs med pa/ tshad med pa'i tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
100b3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ma chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ skyes pa dang srid pa dang / 'dren par cha dropa/ mchi ma zad pa/ tshe rom bcom pa/ khur bo re be shin du bor ba/ bdag gi den rjesu thob pa srid par skye
100b4(brgyad stong): ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i de byingasu yongasu mya ngon
100b5(brgyad stong): las 'das pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das po'i
100b6(brgyad stong): dbyingasu yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub paru ma gyur gyi bar de/ de dag gi bor gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi phung po tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / 
100b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes grozigs pa'i phung po dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bri gang dag yin po dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan phun su
100b8(brgyad stong): tshogaso pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / yongasu shes pa'i pha rol tu
101a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / yongasu shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
101a2(brgyad stong): pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / phan par zhed po gang yin pa dang / bams pa chen pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sde pa yon tan
101a3(brgyad stong): gzhal de med pa grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso ba'i byang chub gang yin pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba gang yin pa dang / chos
101a4(brgyad stong): thams cad la dbang phyug gri pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang / zil gyis granon pa dpagau tu med pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rngo 'brel mngon par 'du bya ba'i mchog
101a5(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / sgrib pa med pa mtshogs pa thogs pa med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa med pa dpag tu med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa ji lto bo'i ye shes
101a6(brgyad stong): kyi stobs gang yin pa dang / stobs kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa gang
101a7(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mchog tu yongasasu rdzogs par khong du chud pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad don dam par mngon par sgrub pas chos khong du chud pa gang yin pa de // chos kyi
101a8(brgyad stong): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma thags pa dang / chos kyi rnga brdung ba dang / chos kyi rdung 'byed pa dang / chos kyi ral gri 'debs pa dang / chos kyi char 'debs pa dang / 
101b1(brgyad stong): chos kyi mchog sbyin byin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par 'dzad cing yang dag par rdzogs pa dang / gang yang chos bstan pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas
101b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyi ches rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ gang dag brtul ba dang / bslab pa dang / mos par 'gyur ba dang / nges par 'gyur ba dang / 
101b3(brgyad stong): rdzogasngo ba'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ba gang dag gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras de dag gis byang chub sems
101b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de dag gi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa rnams drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams
101b5(brgyad stong): drang gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag thams cad ko dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnas
101b6(brgyad stong): kyi sbyin pa las bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung po'i bri sod de nims bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i gang
101b7(brgyad stong): zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i theg pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i gang zag ches de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams dang / sa
101b8(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge snyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / 
102a1(brgyad stong): tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / yin pa rnams dang / der sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das chos ston pa de
102a2(brgyad stong): dag la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha mo yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang de
102a3(brgyad stong): dag thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas tha mas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs ma ngan las 'da' ba gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bco
102a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten pa dang / chos le rten pa dang / dge 'dun la brten pa dang / yid kyis
102a5(brgyad stong): sgom par bya ba'i gang zag la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag thams ca de lus shing / lus pa med par gcig ta mngon par bslus te/ bsgoms shing gzhal nas rjes yid rang po'i mchog gis rjes yid rang
102a6(brgyad stong): ba ste/ dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / ra ba dang / mchog rab ri dang / gya nom pa dang / bla mI dang / bla ni med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjesu yid rang bas rje su yi de reng la/ 
102a7(brgyad stong): de ltar rjes yid rang las/ rjes yid rang ba dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub
102a8(brgyad stong): par gyur cig snyam pas ngag tu brjod par bya ste/ de la gang zag bang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag dngos po gang dag dang / dmigs pa gang dag dang / rnam pa gang dag gis yongasu bsdu zhing / som sa de bskyed
102b1(brgyad stong): ni gcig dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / rnam pa de dag ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas
102b2(brgyad stong): rtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras/ btsun pa rab 'byor dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / rnam pa de dag ji ltar mtshan mar byaso pa de bzhin du dmig so// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan
102b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras// gral te dngos po med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la dmigs par byed cing mtshan mar byed na/ ci ltar 'di 'du shes
102b4(brgyad stong): phyin ci log po dang / soms phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log por mi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags kyang dngos po med bzhin du mi rtog pa la rtog pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde ba dang / bdag med
102b5(brgyad stong): l-i bdag dang / mi sdug pa la sgrog par rna par brtags shing / kun du rtags nas 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin pa ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'byung ngo / gzhan yang dngos po ci lta ba dang / dmigs
102b6(brgyad stong): ba ci lta ba dang / rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhi ni/ sems kyang de bzhini yon na/ de lta na chos thas cad dang khams tsa thams cad kyong de bzhin/ gral te yang dngos po ci lta ba dang / dmigs pa ci lta ba dang
102b7(brgyad stong): rna ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyang de bzhi ni/ sems kyang de bzhin yin na/ des na dngos po gang dag dang / dmigs pa gang dag dang / rnam pa gang dag gis sems gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
102b8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo be ri byed pa'am/ rjes su yid rang ba dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang du yongasu bsngo bar byed/ de nas byang chub
103a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
103a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i 'dun du bshad par mi bya/ bstan pra ra mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la gang dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / gus pa tsam dag yod po de dag thams cad kang / 'jig rten par
103a3(brgyad stong): 'gyuraro/ 'phags pa rab 'byor phyir mi ldog po'i byang chub semaso dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dun du 'di bshad par bya'o/ dga' ba tsam dang nye bar bsnyen par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
103a4(brgyad stong): gang dge ba'i bshes gnye ni gos nye bar bsten par gyur pa de yang 'di la ma 'grong / kun du mi zhum/ bag mi tshwa bag 'khams par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs por mi bde/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ 
103a5(brgyad stong): mi dngang kan du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos rje su yi rang bar byas nas rjesu yi ring po dang ldan pa'i bsod nas bya ba'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
103a6(brgyad stong): nyid du yengasu po sde bar po'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad sbed pa// // bam po bdun pa// / de nas gnas rtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
103a7(brgyad stong): byams pa sems gang gis rjesu yid rung nas gong yongasu rdzobasngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang zad cing 'gags par gyur la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa yin te/ des na gong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
103a8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa'i sems de gang zhig yin/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa'i seMs/ 
103b1(brgyad stong): de yang gang yin la/ brgya byin gyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa rab 'byor theg pa la gas rang zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
103b2(brgyad stong): gis bstan pa 'di thos nas dang zhing kun du skrag pa/ kun du skrag po dang ldan par gyur na mi rung ngo // 'phags pa rabri 'byor yang ci ltar byang chub som sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bstan pA la
103b3(brgyad stong): rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams byi ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bor bya/ rjes su yod ring ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongasu 'dzinapa/ 
103b4(brgyad stong): dang / rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i semaso yongasu bsngo bar byed pas/ ji ltar rjes su yi ring ba dang ldan pa'i sems de legs par yongs gzung zhing / legs pa yongasu sngos par 'gyur// de nas granas rten
103b5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa'i soms de pa'i chen po byams pra waM brtsams shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po byams pa bzhir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103b6(brgyad stong): chen po byams pa la smras pa/ byom skye pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa yod pa'i
103b7(brgyad stong): phyogaso re re yang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchid pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pe/ 'chi ma zad pa che
103b8(brgyad stong): mi bcom pa/ khur shin du bir ba/ bdag gi don rjes thob po/ srid par sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du/ 
104a1(brgyad stong): son pa/ gzhal du med cing grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa gzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung / 
104a2(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lkog ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs
104a3(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa
104a4(brgyad stong): gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par gal ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i
104a5(brgyad stong): phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par gzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang
104a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de la gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs
104a7(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol du
104a8(brgyad stong): duphyin pa drag dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bsten pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnaMs
104b1(brgyad stong): dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i skye ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i zag/ 
104b2(brgyad stong): med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsi bya gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang
104b3(brgyad stong): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos te/ thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bya/ 
104b4(brgyad stong): seng gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos te/ thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yo ngasu mya ngan las
104b5(brgyad stong): 'da' ba dang / yongs mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gzhal
104b6(brgyad stong): nas ma lus par byas te/ rjes su yid rung bar byas bu byas ma lus pa la rjesu yi rang nas rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
104b7(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ yo ngas bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnas brtan rab tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso/ 'phags pa
104b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang gis gang yongasu bsngo bo'i sems de la sem su 'du shes par ma gyur na/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
105a1(brgyad stong): chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bsngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de 'di yin no// 
105a2(brgyad stong): zhes yang dag par mi shes par de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci ldog par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba
105a3(brgyad stong): byin ci ldog par mi 'gyuraro// de ste sems gang gis gang yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la sems kyis de ni 'di yin no// zhes yang dag par shes shing / yongasu 'du shes par 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems
105a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta bu phyin ci log par 'gyuraro// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen pos
105a5(brgyad stong): sems gang yang su bsngo ba'i sems de la 'di ltar yang dag par shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems de la sems pa na 'di ltar thod po zad pa'o// zhes de ltar yang zad par shes la/ 'gags pa dang / 
105a6(brgyad stong): bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa yin no// zhes de lngar shes te/ gang zag pa de yang yongasu bsngo bar mi nus la/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongasu
105a7(brgyad stong): byisngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag tu yongasu bsngo ba'i tshesde de dag gi chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ zhes gal te de ltar yongasu bsngon yang dag par yongasu bsngo ba yin
105a8(brgyad stong): log par yongasu bsngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// brags pa ba 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
105b1(brgyad stong): pos 'das pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du/ mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ma chad pa/ 'jug pa ched po/ smos pa dang srid pa rong 'dren par chad pa/ gzhal du med cing grangs med pa/ de dag gi sas
105b2(brgyad stong): dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i bor dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'dres pa'i dbyingasu yong su ma
105b3(brgyad stong): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ba'i bur te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnam
105b4(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / tingange 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i
105b5(brgyad stong): bang po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / bams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yon tan gzhal du med cing / grangs
105b6(brgyad stong): med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge bo'i rtsa ba chos gang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams dang / chos de la slob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa rnams dang / lhag par mos par 'gyur ba
105b7(brgyad stong): rnams dang / gnas par 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
105b8(brgyad stong): tu lung sbyin par 'gyur ba de dag gi pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang min pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi thig pa can dag ra
106a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston par 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
106a2(brgyad stong): dngos po dang / tshul khrimos las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnaMs
106a3(brgyad stong): dang / ma srab pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la sa so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge bo'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / gang yang wa dang / klu dang tu gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
106a4(brgyad stong): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ma 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin gang dag gis chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / gang yang
106a5(brgyad stong): byol song byol song gi skye gan sa song ba'i sems can ga dag gis chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas
106a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yongs su ma ngan 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun por 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad
106a7(brgyad stong): gcig tu bslus shIti bsdam so shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas nas/ rjes yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjes yi rang nas/ rjes su yid rang bar ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med
106a8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta 'i phyin/ 
106b1(brgyad stong): ci log tu mi 'gyur/ zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis gang longs bsngo ba'i sems su 'du shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dang
106b2(brgyad stong): chen pos rjesu yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bstis pa yin na/ ji ltar sems de la sems de 'di yin// zhes
106b3(brgyad stong): dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes phyin ci ldog par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur// lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur// de ste sems
106b4(brgyad stong): gang gis gang yangasu bsngo ba'i sems de la sems de ni 'di yin no// zhes yang dag par shes shing sems 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes
106b5(brgyad stong): phyin ci lag pa dang / sems phyin ci ldog pa dang / lta ba byin ci log par 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po semaso gang yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la 'di ltar shes shing
106b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar sems te/ sems de la sems pa ni de ltar zad pa la zang po'o zhes de ltar yang dag par shes shing 'gags pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa yin zhes de ltar shes te/ gang zad pa
106b7(brgyad stong): de yang yongasu bsngo bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin// chos gang dag gis yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang
106b8(brgyad stong): dag tu yong su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin ni/ zhes gal te de ltar yongasu po sngon/ yang dag par yong su bsngo ba yin gyi/ log par yong su bsngob mo yin te/ de ltar byang chu/ 
107a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
107a2(brgyad stong): gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa rnams na/ de ltar byung bro'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ma chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren par chad pa/ gzhal du med cing grangs
107a3(brgyad stong): med pa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing be zhes pa rnams kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag
107a4(brgyad stong): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongs ma ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa'i bar te/ de dag go bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa
107a5(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grang yin po rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol po'i phung
107a6(brgyad stong): po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sa ngas
107a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi yon tan ge zhal du med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi cho so gang bshad pa dang / chos de la gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa
107a8(brgyad stong): dang // gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtse ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
107b1(brgyad stong): byang chub tu lung ston pa de dag gi rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa nas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rlung sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag/ 
107b2(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung sngon po de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bye ba'i dngos po
107b3(brgyad stong): tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos pa dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ga / 
107b4(brgyad stong): yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i zag po med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrin pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang khri
107b5(brgyad stong): dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos te/ thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa bang bskrun pa dang / byol song
107b6(brgyad stong): gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / gang zag gis spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongasu ma ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongasu/ 
107b7(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa lnga dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang yin pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing zhal nas ma lus
107b8(brgyad stong): par byas te/ rjesu yid rang ba dang / bya bo la ma lus pa la rje su li rang nas/ rje su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ 
108a1(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ zhe na/ gal te byang chub
108a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po de sems gang gis gang yongs bsro ba'i sems de la sems 'di shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
108a3(brgyad stong): namams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yi no// ci ltar sems de la semasu de ni 'di yon// zhes yang dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
108a4(brgyad stong): po 'di shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lci ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ de ste sems gang gis gang yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la/ sems de ni 'di yin zhes yang dag par shes shing
108a5(brgyad stong): sems su 'od shes par 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur/ yang gal te byang chub sems dpa'
108a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po sems gang yongs bsngo bo'i sems la 'du shes 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems de la sems pa ni/ de ltar zad pa la zad pa'/ zhes de ltar yang dag par shes shing 'gags pa dang
108a7(brgyad stong): bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa yin zhes de ltar shes te/ gang zad pa de yang yongasu bsro bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos/ nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongasu bsngo ba'i chos
108a8(brgyad stong): de dag gi chos nyid ka nge de yin/ chos gang dag tu yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes gal te de ltar yongasu bsngo na/ yang dag par yongasu bso ba yin gyi/ log par yongasu sngo ba ma yin te
108b1(brgyad stong): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu' chen pos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / dkar gyi sangs rgyas
108b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren par chad pa/ gzhal du med cing grangs med pa dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
108b3(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dang / bong po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su yongasu
108b4(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / rlob par ma gyur gyi bar to// de dag gi bar
108b5(brgyad stong): gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
108b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po
108b7(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ge zhal du med cing gangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / 'chad pa dang / chos de dag
108b8(brgyad stong): lagang gis bslabs pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba dang / slob pa dang / mos pa dang / mos par 'gyur ba dang / mos par byed pa dang / gnas pa dang / gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas par byed pa de dag gi dge
109a1(brgyad stong): rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston pa
109a2(brgyad stong): dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtse ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan tho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi so gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can
109a3(brgyad stong): gang dag rang byang chub la lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnaMs dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin po las byung ba'i
109a4(brgyad stong): bsod nams dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / mi/ 
109a5(brgyad stong): slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang drag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa dang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
109a6(brgyad stong): lce ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi drong mi ma yin pa gang dag gis kyang chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos par dang tho so nas kyang dge ba'i
109a7(brgyad stong): rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / byol seng gi skye gnas skyes pa'i sems can gang dag gis dam pa'i de thos par gyur pa dang / thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskrun
109a8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa dang // sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs ma ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs ma ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / yongasu ma ngan las 'da' ba
109b1(brgyad stong): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa de rnams thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cang ga cig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gnal nas ma lus par byas te
109b2(brgyad stong): rjes yid rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjesu yid rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yid rang dang / dam pa dang gtso bo dang / rab dang mchog rab dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam/ 
109b3(brgyad stong): pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam de'i rjesu yi rang ba nas da ltar rjes su yi rang la/ ji ltar rjesu yid rang nas rje su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub
109b4(brgyad stong): tu yongasu bsdu'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu sgrub par gyur cig snyam pas ngag tu brjid na/ byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po de ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi
109b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci logo tu mi 'gyur/ zhe na/ gal te yongasu bsngo bar byed pa 'di snyam de chos de dag ni zad pa/ 'gags pa bral ba rnam par 'gyur ba yin
109b6(brgyad stong): byas/ gdung chos de zad par mi 'gyur bar yongasu bsngo bar bya'o zhes sems pa de ltar na bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin no// gal te yang 'di ltar
109b7(brgyad stong): chos kyis ni chos yongasu mi bsngo'i snyam du nye bar rtog pa de lto na yung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar yongasu bsngo bA
109b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi'i gyur/ lta bi byin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ldir di na
110a1(brgyad stong): yongasasu bsngo ba de la mngon par zhen pa med do// gal te yang 'dri snyam du sems kyis sems mi shes shing / chos kyis chos mi shes so zhes yang dag par shes pa de ltar na yang
110a2(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongasu bsngo ba bla na med pa'o// gal te yang byang chub
110a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bas de na mes mngon par 'du byed pa de shes ni bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba me yin gyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
110a4(brgyad stong): de ni yongs bsro ba de la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir/ gal te yang de 'di ji snyam du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o zhes rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nas bya ba'i
110a5(brgyad stong): dngos po gang yin pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o zhes sems de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngos pa yin/ gal te 'du byed thams cad ni dben pa'i zhi bo'i snyam du
110a6(brgyad stong): de ltar yang mi shes pa de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol dri phyin pa yin/ gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa
110a7(brgyad stong): de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci 'dra ba ltar yongasu bsngo ba de dang / de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang de 'dra ba nyid de/ gang gis de yongs su bsngo ba de yang de'i rigs can/ de'i mtshan nyid ce na de'i rigasu rtogs
110a8(brgyad stong): pa de'i rang bzhin can yin par gal te de ltar shes na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngos po ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
110b1(brgyad stong): mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongasu bsdu ba gnang bar mi mdzad do/ gang 'das pa de ni zad pa'am 'gags pa brel ba rnam par gyur pa'o// grong mi 'ongs pa de yang ma thob pa'o// de ltar byung ba de la mi
110b2(brgyad stong): gnas pa mi dmigs la/ gang dmigs pa de ni mtshan ma ma yin zhing yul ma yin par gal te de ltar mtshan mar byed cing mi ldems nobla na meng po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa ma
110b3(brgyad stong): yin no// de ste ngan pa dang bral bas mtshan mar mi byed cing sems pa dang / dran pa dang bral ba'o// khong du ma chud pas yid la mi bad na/ de ltar na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsdu
110b4(brgyad stong): ba ma yin no// dri sde mtshan me de la sems shing / mtshan mar mi byed na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos
110b5(brgyad stong): pa yin no/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la bslab par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i thabasu mkhas par rig par po'o// gang bribs mkhas
110b6(brgyad stong): pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa bo yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin/ thobs mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
110b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid rgyun mi 'chud par minyan par bya/ gzung bar bya bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu 'dron par bya/ ba ston par bya/ nye bar bstan par bya/ lung 'breg par bya/ kha don du bya yong su
110b8(brgyad stong): bri bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mabo rten par bros pa dang mi ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongasu bsngo ba'i bya ba di la 'jug mi nus/ de la gang 'di skad du/ 
111a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la ma rten kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar naso zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad ma zer cig ces
111a2(brgyad stong): brjod par bya ba yin no/ de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/ bdag gi dngos po de dag 'gagos pa dang / 'du byed de dag kyang 'gags pa ste/ zhi ba dben pa demigs pa dang / bral ba yin no/ 'on kyang gang zag de ni yang dag pa ji lta ba
111a3(brgyad stong): nyid la mtshon mar byas shing rnam par brtags nas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa la yang dag pa ji lta bar 'du shes pas dmigs pa la mi dmigs par yongs bsro bar byed pa yin te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de
111a4(brgyad stong): ltar bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mi mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs ma ngan las 'dra ba
111a5(brgyad stong): la mtshan mar byed cing rnam par rtog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mtshan mar byed cing rnam par dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par
111a6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yongs bsngo ba don chen po byed pa'o// zhes mi gsungango // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongasu bsngo ba de ni ngag dang bcas shing zug rngu dang bcas pa yin no/ 
111a7(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na/ kha zas bzang po dag can zhig yod la/ de bzhin de de'i kha dog dang / dri dong ro dang / reg pa'i sgo nas 'dod paro bya ba yang yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dag dang bcas pa yin pas natamakhas pa rnaMs
111a8(brgyad stong): kis yongs spang bar bya ba yin gyi/ yongs long spod par bya ba ma yin gyi/ de nyid skyes pa byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal po'i rang bzhin can gyis yongasu long smod par bsams te/ des zas de za
111b1(brgyad stong): bo na de'i kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg pa'i sgo nas mangs pa na bde bar byed la zhu ba'i tshe de la rnam par smin pa skyug po spel ba gyur te/ de de'i gzho las shi ba'am shi bo tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur/ 'phags pa
111b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du 'dril kha cig ldog par zin cing ldog par rig po dang / leg par kha dron byas pas legs par smras pa'i don mi shes shing / den yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du khong du ma chud ba dag 'di skad du/ 
111b3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod tshur sheg/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med tsong grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi thugs dang la
111b4(brgyad stong): bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / rgya ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu
111b5(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'di 'dra'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi nub pa'i bar te/ ba ro de'i 'das pa dang mabyin pa dpyid
111b6(brgyad stong): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba
111b7(brgyad stong): ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dis de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzos
111b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu lung bsten pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa bo rgan pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / gang dag
112a1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / 
112a2(brgyad stong): bskrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / 
112a3(brgyad stong): ba sbyiskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / so so'i skye bo gang dag gis der dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin/ 
112a4(brgyad stong): pa rnams te/ de rnams thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te gzhil nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes yid rang nas/ rjesu yi rang ba dang
112a5(brgyad stong): ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yangs bsngo bar gyis shig ces 'doms shing rjes sngon por 'gyur te/ de ltar yongasu bsngo ba'i ba de ni man
112a6(brgyad stong): ma'i tshul yongasu bsngo bso dag nyid du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na kha zas de dug dang bcas pa yin no/ de ltar na dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongasu bsngo ba medo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa ni dag dang bcas
112a7(brgyad stong): po'o// de bas na gang zag pang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis de ltar bslab par mi bya'o/ yang des ji ltar bslab par bya zhing ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
112a8(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu gzung bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongasu gzung ni legs par yongasu bzung bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar yongasu bsngo bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongasu bsngos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
112b1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongasu bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi gtab par 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtsa
112b2(brgyad stong): bu de dag thams cad 'di ltar rje su yi rang ba rab zhing 'dri ltar yang su bsngo bar bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar dri ba nin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
112b3(brgyad stong): kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rigs gang yin pa dang / ris gar rtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang
112b4(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / mtshon nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gis yod pa de bzhin du yid rang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
112b5(brgyad stong): bsngos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rje su gnang ba de bzhin du bdag gis d+d+he suM gnang ba yi rang bar bya'o snyam po'o// de ltar rjesu
112b6(brgyad stong): yi ring zhing de ltar yongasu bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / sangs yang dag par rjesu yi ring bar byas
112b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dri bla ni med po yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongasu bsngos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i songs
112b8(brgyad stong): rgyas de dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bas mo ba sems pa yongasu bsngos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
113a1(brgyad stong): de dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mos pa yongasu bsngo bar byed pa de'i yongasu bsngo ba de ltar bu ni dug med pa'i yongasu bsngo ba yin/ yongasu bsngo ba
113a2(brgyad stong): chen po yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yongasu rdzogs shing shin du yongasu rdzogs pa yin// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rkyen gyis tshul khrims gang
113a3(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / tinge 'dzin gong yin pa dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol bI'i ye she so gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i kha sum
113a4(brgyad stong): rtogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i kham su ma rtogs pa dang / 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ltar yongasasu bsdu bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus gisuM
113a5(brgyad stong): dang / khams gsum du ma rtogs pa'i phyi re de bzhin du yongasu bsngo ba yang ma gtogs pa'o// gang du yongasu bsngo ba des yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de yang ma gtogs po'o// gal te de ltar
113a6(brgyad stong): mos shing de ltar yongasu bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongasu bsngo bar byed pa'i yongasu bsngo ba ni chud mi zos pa yin te/ ma gtogs pa'i yongasu bsngo/

113a8(brgyad stong): par chags shing mtshan mar byed na log par yongasu bsngo ba yon/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs bsdu ba gang zhig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar sangs rgyas btso
113b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing ci ltar rje su gnang ba de ltar chos kyi dbyings yongasu bsdu ba 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa de lta na/ de legs par/

113b6(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / ris garo gtogs po dang / ci 'dre ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de ltar rjesu yi rang ba dang / ci ltar rjesu gnas
113b7(brgyad stong): ba de ltar bdag gis yongasu bsngo'o snyam pa 'dri'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dang / stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni sems
113b8(brgyad stong): can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bkod cing bzhag pa'i bsod na mos mngon par 'du byed pa
114a1(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid mchog ces bya/

114a8(brgyad stong): dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi rdzogs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'od byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sos

114b7(brgyad stong): par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yong stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bi mra snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'di byed
114b8(brgyad stong): lta zhig/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgon sems can ji sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur po dang /

115b7(brgyad stong): 'das zhal dri ma mchis/ bde bar gshegs pa gzhal du ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni grangasu bgyi bar yang sleb ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams
115b8(brgyad stong): kyi phung po ni bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang / gzhir yang rgyur yang bgyi bror srib ma yigs/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams kyi phung po de gzugs ca
116a1(brgyad stong): zhig lags na ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang mi shong bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas/

116a4(brgyad stong): phyir bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyingos kyi yongasu bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la ni dmigs pa'i 'od shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems

116a6(brgyad stong): phrag brgya'i char yang / bye ba phrag stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi tshor yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangasu yang nye bar ma 'gro'o/ bgrang bar yang dpe
116a7(brgyad stong): yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang / bzhir yang rgyur yang mi zad do/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ 'di ltar sde ma dmigs pa'i 'du shes sngon gyi byang chub sems dripa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sbyin
116a8(brgyad stong): pa ni shin du mang po byin ni yang / shin du mang por yang grangasu yang de 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal cheni bzhi'i ris+yai kyi lha'i bu snod khrig ny+dzi sha no mos thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das

116b2(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni yongasu bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang dang migos pa dang pocas pa'i badzirje gyi sems dpa'o dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par

116b7(brgyad stong): kyi yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni sngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmigs pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bgyid pa'i phung po chen po

127b1(brgyad stong): bu gzugs mngon par mi sgrub par de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'dre shes dang 'du byed rnaMs dang / rno bar shes pa mngon por mi sgrub par blta'o// shA l-i rdzi bu phung po lnga rnams mngon par mi sgrub
127b2(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par sgrub pa zhes brjod do// de ltar mngon byer 'du mi byed pas phung po lnga rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa ni shes rab kyi pha
127b3(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes brjod do// de skrod ces bka' bskul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
127b4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa de ltar ma ngon par bsgrubs pas chos gang zhig gtong bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar mngon par
127b5(brgyad stong): bsgrubaso pos ni chos gang yang gtong bar mi byed do/ shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe chos gang yang gting bar mi byed pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grongasu 'gro'o// de nas
127b6(brgyad stong): bci ldan 'das la shi lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad so shes rab kyi pha rol du phan pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gtod par mi
127b7(brgyad stong): bgyid lpags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkr-i'u bskul pa/ kau 'u shri ka 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dris thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gtod par lags so zhes
127b8(brgyad stong): zer ba ni/ ci ltar dmigs pa de ltar gtod par mi byed/ ming ci lta bo de ltar gtod par mi byedo/ mngon par 'od byed pa de ltar gtod par mi bi do/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcoM/ 
128a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'o na ci ltar gtod par bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kro'u shi ka 'dri ltar gtod par byed do/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci srid du gang
128a2(brgyad stong): gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dris chos gang yang mi skye mi 'gog pa dang / chos thams cad skye bo 'am mchis pa dang 'grog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas la/ gnas pa yang mu lags
128a3(brgyad stong): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar lagaso/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs
128a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar yang 'di shes par bgyid na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gsog tudu bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gsob du bgyir/ 
128a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi bgyid pa lag so// dri skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bkra' bstsol to/ de de bzhin/ rab 'byi re de
128a6(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rgyang ring du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ga sog du bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ang/ 
128a7(brgyad stong): gsob du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs 'di ni yod/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongasu gsal b.ro byas na
128a8(brgyad stong): gzugs yongasu gsal bar byos pa ma yino// tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'dre byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongasu gsal byer byas pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
128b1(brgyad stong): bu yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu gsal ba rabs pa ma yin/ rlug pa nim pa nyid yongs gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas nyid / 
128b2(brgyad stong): gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas nyid yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin no// gonasra brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni
128b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i bskul pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam gongs gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di pha rol du phyin pa chen po yin/ gan
128b4(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs chen po ro mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid/ gzugs bskyed par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid// de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags
128b5(brgyad stong): 'du shes ma log so/ 'du byed ma lugs/ bcom ldan 'dres rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ skud par mi bgyid/ g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa
128b6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i stobs gang lags pa de bzhin dag kyang stobs dang ldan par yang mi bgyid/ stobs ma mchis par yang mi bgyid/ sdud par mi bgyi dri g.yengs par mi
128b7(brgyad stong): bgyid/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa de yang che bar mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ sdud par mi bgyid/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma
128b8(brgyad stong): bskus ma g.yengs pa logs/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po gal te de ltar 'tshal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags na/ bdag ni thams ca/ 
129a1(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// 'di ltar sems can 'di dag yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du 'tshal ba
129a2(brgyad stong): smosu ci mchisau/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongasu mya ngan la sa bzla'o snyam pa gang lags pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa mo lags te/ se sa tsA/ 
129a3(brgyad stong): du dmigs pa 'di nyid de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyuraro/ de ci'i phyi ro zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis po dang skye bo ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin du rig pa
129a4(brgyad stong): bigyi ste/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas ni shes rab kyi pho rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na shes rab kI pha rol du phan pa dpe ni
129a5(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi'o// sems can bsam gyis myi khyab pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o// sems can mi 'jig pa'i tshe so nyid lags
129a6(brgyad stong): pas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par rdzogs
129a7(brgyad stong): par 'tshang mi rgya bor rig par bgyi'o// sems can yang dag par don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag pa'i don ci lce
129a8(brgyad stong): bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can stobs yang dag par sgrub pas na shrI bye ba de bzhin gshegs po'i stobs yang dag par smra
129b1(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
129b2(brgyad stong): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de gang nas byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpo'i chen po gleng shes rats+tsha kyi phyi rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri la mos shing nem nur mi bgyi
129b3(brgyad stong): the tsom mi 'tshal rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'odas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i don nyid
129b4(brgyad stong): dang don gyi tshul dang / chos nyid kyi tshul gyis rje su 'chil bar 'gyur zhing / rjesu rtogs par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yun ring po ji snyed cig
129b5(brgyad stong): tu spyad cing tshul bskyangs par rig par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan po shA rI'i bu lnga 'di skad ces bka' bskul to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sas
129b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs la bsnyen bkur byes shing yongasu dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dgra nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par rig
129b7(brgyad stong): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongasu dris nas
129b8(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na so shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di chang pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs
130a1(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / la mguso// ma gus pas legs par mi nyan to// legs par mi nyan pas bsnyen bkur mi byed// bsnyen bkur mi byed pas yongasu mi 'dri'o// yong sum dris pas mngon par ma da/ 
130a2(brgyad stong): mngon par ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'jol te/ de dag gzhi de las chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i las byos shing bsngags la kun nas gsags shing nye bar bsags pas mngon par da ltar
130a3(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa na ma gus pas 'byol zhing ma dang lo mos par mi byed pas/ lus dang sems kyis tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed/ tshogs
130a4(brgyad stong): pu sgrub par mi byed pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi shes mi mthong khong du mi chu di reg par mi byed de/ de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol dri phyin pa la ma drad par 'gyuraro// ma dad pas no mu nyin to// mi
130a5(brgyad stong): nyan pas mi shes so/ mu shes pas ni mi mthong nga ma mthong bas ni khong du mi chud do// khong du ma chud pos ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las byed/ yang dag par sogs par byed/ kun du
130a6(brgyad stong): sogs par byed nye bar sogs par byed do/ de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i lis byas pa dang / bsags pa dang kun nas ba sogs pa dang nyo bar bsags pa des shes rabo 'chal bar
130a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyuraro// de dag shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las mngon pa ro 'dus byas pa dang / bsags pa dang kun nas bsags pa dang / nye ba
130a8(brgyad stong): bsogs pa des shes rab kyi pha rol de phan po 'di 'chad pa dang / smon pa dang nye bar ston pa na slong bar 'gyur bskur bar 'gyur mi snyan pa ro brjod par 'gyur te/ skar na sa kyang 'byol bar 'gyu ronyarab
130b1(brgyad stong): 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di spong bar dang skur ba dang / mi snyan pa brjod pas ni 'das pa dang ma khyen pa dadung ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ning spangs par
130b2(brgyad stong): skur bar 'gyur/ mi snyan pa brjod par 'gyur/ de dag gi nang gi rgyud bcim ning bsregs nas blo chung ba shos rang chung ba'i sid na mos chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i grang zag dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dga' btsam
130b3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa dang ba tsam dang ldan pa las dang po pa/ skal ba med pa'i rang ba nin can gzhan rnams kyi yang dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang / dang btsam dang 'dun pa tsam de yang phyir zlog cing bral bar byed ldog par

130b7(brgyad stong): de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba ri nye bar gcod por byed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnamasu smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'thun po'i las nye bar sogs par 'gyur/ de dag de lta bu'i las

131a1(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyuraro// de dag slar sems can dmal ba chen po rnam su sems can dmel ba'i skrag bsngal chen po de dag myeng bar 'gyuraro// ji srid du mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar

131b1(brgyad stong): brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang po dang / le bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

132a1(brgyad stong): nyan te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la ston par 'du shes bskyed do/ bdag gi ston pa mngon sum du gyur te/ bdag gi ston

132b7(brgyad stong): dpa'i rnams sangs rgyas brgya brag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag myong ba dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dgu mi thing nas de dag gi drung du tshungs par spyod pa skyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
132b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di la ma dad ma mos par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol duphyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang / ston// 
133a1(brgyad stong): yang brlag par byed par 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mA ma shes ma rtogs la gzhan dag kyang 'dri la bslab par mi bya'o zhes 'dzin du 'jug pa'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag
133a2(brgyad stong): de lta bu'i rang bzhin ce na ni bolta bar ya ngas ma gnang na de dag dang 'grogs pa lta ci smos/ brnyed pa dang bkur bsti lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i po gang zag de lta bu de dag ni nag po'i rang bzhin gyi
133a3(brgyad stong): gang zag de dag ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya ba yin no/ shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag ni lo 'dib rul pa lto bur gyur pa rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni nag
133a4(brgyad stong): bo'i rang bzhin can nag po nye bor ba skyed par rig par bya'o/ shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag las gang dag mnyan pa dang / dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin pos brlag par
133a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sun 'byin pa de dag ni shA ri'i bu chos la sun 'byin pa'i gang zag tu rig por bya'o// shA ri'i bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag der
133a6(brgyad stong): skyes shing sems can dmyal ba chen po ni mchis po de'i lus kyi tshad mo bstan to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang zag sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad lnga zhog
133a7(brgyad stong): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi tshad thos nas khrag drin mo kho nas skyug cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi ba tsam 'am sdug bsngal mi zad pa dang / nad kyis reg
133a8(brgyad stong): cing tshig pa'am/ de la mya ngan gyi zug rngu zhugs pa 'am go yongs chen por lhung ba'i'am skam pa la ma snying bar 'gyur ni/ mi rung bas na gang la nyes pa de dge yod pa'i lus de'i tshod 'jig
133b1(brgyad stong): chen po de lta bu thos par ma gyur ces/ bcom ldan 'das lus de'i tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la go skabs ma phye'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das
133b2(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ gang zag de'i lus kyi tsha da kyis phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur bso/ ngag dang yid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dang / kun
133b3(brgyad stong): du bsags pa dang / nye bar bsags pa 'dis sems can dmyal po chen po'i lu sa 'di lta bu chen po yongasu 'dzin par 'gyu ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bdog la bshad du gsol/ bcom
133b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang dag dang yid kyi senyes par spyod pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa mngon par 'das byas pa bsogs shing / kun nas bsogs la nye ba
133b5(brgyad stong): bsogs pa 'dis yun ring po 'di tsam+ba du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar byas par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sdug bsngal de nyid la gzhal du med pa dang
133b6(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal mang po bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dkar po'i skal ba can rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing de nas de'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang
133b7(brgyad stong): 'thun pa'i las de dag las rnam par 'phel bar bsod nams mngon par byed pa kho na byed de/ bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal dang phrad par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir srog gi phyir dam pa'i
133b8(brgyad stong): spong bar mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las shin du
134a1(brgyad stong): bsdom par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngag gis nongs par smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po 'di skyes pa lag sotebacom ldan 'dra
134a2(brgyad stong): yang las gang gis bsod nams ma legs pa'i phung po chen po skyes par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor ngag gis nyes par smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma
134a3(brgyad stong): yin pa'i phung po chen po 'di tsam skye so// rab 'byor gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di sun dbyung bar sems par 'gyur skur bar sems par 'gyur/ phyi re gzhil bar sems par
134a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i skyes pa gti mug can de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul po 'di nyid du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di phyir bcil ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'du
134a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi byang chub phyir bci la bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bcil na 'das pa dang / mi 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub thams cad mkhyen
134a6(brgyad stong): pa nyid phyir btsil bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ra bitsal na dam pa'i chos phyir bcil bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos phyir bcil bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
134a7(brgyad stong): phyir bar 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil ba de lta na ni dkon mchog gsum las thams cad na so thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad phyi rol du 'gyur ba
134a8(brgyad stong): yin pas chos gzhal du med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'di byed pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
134b1(brgyad stong): 'byer gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la phyi ri gzhil bar sems par de'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bca
134b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ shes rab 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i ngagra gi las kyis 'di
134b3(brgyad stong): chos zab mo dag la mi dad cing rab tu dang bas mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sdig po'i chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol de phyin pa 'di la phyir 'dzel bar
134b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa na phyi ro gzhil bar semos par 'gyur ba gang yin po de ni rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag dang
134b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa'i 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu son par 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par mi brtson par 'gyur ba 'am/ phung po la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba 'am
134b6(brgyad stong): bdag la bstod cing gzhan lo smod de nyes pa'i skabs tshol bar 'gyur ba'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ dmyal bi'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun po'o// bam po dag
134b7(brgyad stong): pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa ni mngon paro mi brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
134b8(brgyad stong): ba dang bral ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu song ba se mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no rab 'byoro de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
135a1(brgyad stong): du phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang blo zhan pa dang don du gnyer ba dang / thos pa nyung ba dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos nye bar brtan pa dang legs
135a2(brgyad stong): par mi nyan po dang / mi 'di ba'i rang bzhin can dang dge ba'i chos la mi brtson pas mos par dka'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kye me shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mos par
135a3(brgyad stong): dka' ba'i slad du 'di ci tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i
135a4(brgyad stong): phyir gzugs mi bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma gol ba'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa
135a5(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ de ci'i phyi re zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la sngon gyi mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha'
135a6(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la phyi ma'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyiraro ro/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi da ltar ma bcings mo grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
135a7(brgyad stong): gzugs la da ltar ma bcings byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthu' mo bcings ma grol po'o// 
135a8(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rna bar shes pa la sngon gyi mthi'i ngo bo nyid med po'i phyi ro// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa phyi me'i mtha'i ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byir rnaM par sheb
135b1(brgyad stong): phyi ma'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i da ltar byung ba ma bcings ma grom pa ra/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa lA da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med
135b2(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa bo tham sags pa dong sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba dang / bdud
135b3(brgyad stong): kyi dbang du gyur pa dang / lu lo can dang brtson 'grus gzhan pa dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / shes rab 'chal pas mos par dka' zhing mchog tu mos par dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'a
135b4(brgyad stong): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi brtson par dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsogs pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu
135b5(brgyad stong): song ba drang bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa dang / le lo can dang brtson 'grus zhen pa dang / drin pa nyams pa dang shes rab 'chal pas mos par dka' ba yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du
135b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni mchog tu mos par dka' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni
135b7(brgyad stong): gzugs rnam par ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyisu me de gnyis byar me de tha mi dad cing mched pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na 'bras
135b8(brgyad stong): shu rnam par dag pas na gzugasorna par dag pa/ gzugs rnam par dag pas na 'bras bu rna par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhon du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rna pa
136a1(brgyad stong): shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par
136a2(brgyad stong): dag pa dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis me de gnyis byar me de tha mi dad cing 'chad pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na 'bras bu rnam par dag pos na rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa
136a3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas 'bras bu rnam par dge ba'i/ rab 'byor gzhan ya gzugs rnam po ra dag pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin
136a4(brgyad stong): pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'di la gnyis
136a5(brgyad stong): med de gnyisu byar med cing tha mi dad dri 'chad po'o// rab 'byor de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag ni gzugs rnam par dag pa gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o
136a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byo de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes po rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa ning
136a7(brgyad stong): de ni rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na rnam por shes pa rnam par dag pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med cing ma chad pa'o/ 
136a8(brgyad stong): 'byor de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas na rnam par shes pa rnam par dag po/ rnam par shes parna bar dag pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ 
136b1(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa shA ri'i bu
136b2(brgyad stong): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gsal bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam par dag po'i
136b3(brgyad stong): phyiro// shA ri'i bu so gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni snang bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsrel pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam par dgu pa'i phyir/ shA ri'i bus gso
136b4(brgyad stong): po/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'tshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam par dge ba'i phyir/ shA ri'i bu so gsol pa/ bcom

136b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni thob pa mu ma tshos pa mngon par rdzogs ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pararo dag pa'i phyir/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom

136b8(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang / gzegs mod pa'i khams shin du skye bo ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha
137a1(brgyad stong): rnam par drag pa'i phyi ro shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni ma 'tshal/ yang dag par ma 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ shA ri'i bu
137a2(brgyad stong): rnam par dag pa'i phyi ro/ shA ri'i buse gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi phyin pa ni ci zhig ma 'tshal yang dag par mu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sau bku' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
137a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzugs mi shes yang dag par mi shes so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu rnam par drag pa'i phyir ro/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
137a4(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnam sa dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes yang dag par mi sheso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni thams

137a8(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas tshe ra ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed na ma bye dag dri'o// bcom ldan 'das bdog rnam pa ri dag byas rnam por shes
137b1(brgyad stong): war dag pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam por dag pa'i / kha ma'o byung gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas 'bras

137b7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol gyi bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i de ltar rtogs pa gang lags
137b8(brgyad stong): pa de ni 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba sum pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol
138a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshu rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas pha rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas gnyi ka'i bar rgyang ring ra po na yang mi gnas btso//
