138a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di 'dor bar 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du bgyid par 'gyuraro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor
138a4(brgyad stong): leg so legaso/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming las kong chags par 'gyur/ mtshan ma las kyang chags par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka'
138a5(brgyad stong): bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dong ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du chags pa 'di dag kyang bshad pas
138a6(brgyad stong): ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di legs par bo sha do cing legs par bstan te/ shin du mther gtugs pa ni ngo mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
138a7(brgyad stong): lo 'di skad ces smos// tshe dang ljoldan pa rab 'byor tshugs tsha ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe drang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs skyong po'o// skem po ni chags pa'o// de bzhin
138a8(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i burna par shes po stong pa'i/ snyam pa ni chags pa'o/ 'dis pa'i chos rnam so zhes yang dag par shes pa
138b1(brgyad stong): chags pa'o// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnamaso zhes yang dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la de ltar byung ba'i chos
138b2(brgyad stong): rnams so zhes yang dag shis pa ni chags pa'o// gang zug byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can sems dang po bskyed pas/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di tsam bskyed do zhes yang dge bar shes pa
138b3(brgyad stong): ni chags pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phagasro pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gris chags par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa
138b4(brgyad stong): ku'u shi ka gal te 'di ni byang chubo ki sems dang po'o zhes byang chub kyi semos de yang dag par shes shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bsngo'o zhes yo nges bsngo bar
138b5(brgyad stong): byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu'im rigos kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa des sems kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar ni mi nus/ ko'u shi kaM de bas ni gzhan la yang dag pa re ston pa dang
138b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par 'god pa dang / yang dag par gzeng stod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid rjesu rtogs pas
138b7(brgyad stong): yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'god par bya/ yang dag par 'god par bya/ yang dog par gzing bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar no rigs kyi ba
138b8(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid la yang gnod pa'i mi byed cing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'god pas gzhan 'god par byed par yang 'gyur la cha gos pa'i mtha' 'di dag thaM de
139a1(brgyad stong): kyang rnam par spangs pa 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
139a2(brgyad stong): la chags pa'i mtha' 'di dag khong du chud par byed pa legaso// legaso/ rab 'byor de'i phyir tshogs par rab tu phro ba gzhan dag kang brjod par bya ste/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ 
139a3(brgyad stong): dang ngas kho da la bshad do/ bcom ldan 'das logaso zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ljon pa rabo 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis lar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bsngal te/ rab
139a4(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na yang / rab 'byor mtshan ma ji srid pa de srid du
139a5(brgyad stong): tshogs pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe no/ rab 'byor mtshan ma las ni chags par 'gyuraro// de ltar na de 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
139a6(brgyad stong): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi chos gang yin pa de dag la rjes yid rang / de ltar rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su sngon
139a7(brgyad stong): zhezhes yongasasu bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa dri ni 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da ltar byeng ba'i ma yin te/ gang 'das pa dang ma 'odres pa da de

139b1(brgyad stong): mthong ba dang thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang rnam par shes pa yang ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni zabo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
139b2(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor dben pa'i phyi ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rang bzhin zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
139b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rang bzhon rnam pa'i dgo ba'i phyir dang / rab 'byor rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ba wA rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
139b4(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin du bon pa nyid dang / rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin da ben pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
139b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ rab 'byor gyis

139b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis chos de dag gang yang medado// rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa/ rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
139b8(brgyad stong): rang bzhin yin te/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir na mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de lta ba sa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
140a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgya so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyisu me de/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi ra

140a8(brgyad stong): dmigs pa'i shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma bas pa'o/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
140b1(brgyad stong): phyin pa la ci ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzug
140b2(brgyad stong): la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/ de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la mo yin/ 'di shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes

144a1(brgyad stong): bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba ba bya bar semaso// kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi brag cha la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar byed par nus so/ brgya byin gyis smras

144a3(brgyad stong): gnanas pa chos thams cad brag cha lta bur yongasu sheso/ de bas na de la rlom sems su mi byed yang dog pa re rjesu mi mthong / mi shes yang dag par mi shes chos de dag kyang med cing yang dag par med cing/

144a7(brgyad stong): rgyal po chen po de dag dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang // tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po mi mdzod kyi bdog pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi/ 
144a8(brgyad stong): byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas stong dang de dag gis ming 'di nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / rab 'byor tsos bya ba'i dge slong 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
144b1(brgyad stong): byin pa 'dind dang / shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di ni du bstan cing / drer yang ltarna mus kyi dbang po brgya rkyen rnams nyid kyis yongasu dris shing yongasu nus te/ sa phyogs 'di ni du/ 
144b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'odi nyid bshod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sna
144b3(brgyad stong): rgyas nas phyogs 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur shes par gyur to/ 'bugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rnam par+ya shes bya ba'i mi
144b4(brgyad stong): sde brgyad ngo'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming
144b5(brgyad stong): tsamo/ mid+hA de yang 'di'o zhes de mi dmigs teng gi dngos po 'di nyid ming zhes bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang ma mchis mI dmigs te// ming ci lta ba bzhin du shes
144b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ci lta bar ming yang de bzhin to// chos 'di gnyis ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad
144b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byan smra ba blun mong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pas sangs rgyas nas/ mang 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di / 
144b8(brgyad stong): nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldanapa
145a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' ba stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni gzugs rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin
145a2(brgyad stong): gzugs bcings pa ma yin/ grol ba ma yin/ pas mthu' los 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o/ zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin// 
145a3(brgyad stong): 'di shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam shes pa rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa bcings pa ma yin/ grol ba ma yin pas mtha' las 'ang
145a4(brgyad stong): shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
145a5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'odi dag nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
145a6(brgyad stong): 'di nyid 'tshed par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' bskul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma'o shes rab kyi pha rol
145a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni yong su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu drag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin
145a8(brgyad stong): tu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag po'o// rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa/ 'gog pa med
145b1(brgyad stong): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par shes dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
145b2(brgyad stong): nga byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa meng pa dang kun nas rten mongs pa ming ba da rnam par byung ba med pa rnam par drug pas zhes rab pa
145b3(brgyad stong): tu byin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha' rnam par dag pus shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs gros pa med cing yong su 'dzin pa med
145b4(brgyad stong): bros shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa glos pa med cing yong su 'dzin
145b5(brgyad stong): med pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs dag pa'o// rab 'byor nu mkha'i dang brag tu slar med cing brjod du mod la da mig su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag na
145b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nye bar gos pa dang / gos pa med pa'i chos kyi thams cod kyis gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang
145b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rogs kyi bu mi gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
145b8(brgyad stong): 'di brag par gyur pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa legs na gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa deng
146a1(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / lang 'bogs pa dang / kha don bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag lu mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ sna'i nad ma yin/ lce'i nad ma
146a2(brgyad stong): yin nga lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rmongs pa nyid du mi 'gyuraro/ dri dag ni nya mang ba mi slong bas 'chi ba'i dus mi bgyid do// de dag la lnga'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ches
146a3(brgyad stong): brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bcwo lnga la chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag der bsod nams ches mang du bo skyed par 'gyu ro/ de skad ces
146a4(brgyad stong): gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces gsol to// de de bzhin rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi de de'i phyi bzhin
146a5(brgyad stong): du lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur/ lha brgya stong phrag mang po de dag 'ong bar 'gyur/ chos ston pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin bya 'di 'chad por byed pa'i chos nyan par 'dod po de dag/ 
146a6(brgyad stong): thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sla bo byed par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni lho dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
146a7(brgyad stong): 'jig rteni g+ho rin po che bla na med pa'o// rab 'byor de'i phyir yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
146a8(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dngo 'chang po dang / klog pa dang kun chub pa ro byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'o bogs pa dang / kha don byed pa la bor chad
146b1(brgyad stong): mang du 'byung bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta rin po'i chen po ni dgra mang ba yin te/ ci tsam du gces par 'gyur ba bzhin du dgra ches lci bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab
146b2(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa rin po che chen po 'odri ni 'jig rten na med pa'i rin po che chen po ste/ 'jig rte nus phan pa dang bya po'i phyir zhugs pa chos thams cad mo skye ba dang mi 'gog par bya ba'i phyir dbu kun nas nis
146b3(brgyad stong): myongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir mi jigs pa'i rgyal gyis nye bar gnas bu'o// rlub 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du 'on pa ni chos gang la yang mi gnas chos gangs yang ma sbyor gang mo yang mangs mi'i
146b4(brgyad stong): to/ de ci'i phyir non/ rabo 'byor 'drin chos de dag thams cad ni med cing mi dmigaso// zab 'byor skyes pa'i byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mgos dra'o// rab 'byor mgos pa zhes bya ba ni shes
146b5(brgyad stong): kyis rol du phyin pa ni/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs myagos pas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mogs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mgos
146b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab kyi ro lu du yin bu 'di migs pa'o// 'dra 'byor tshul te de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po yang dag par mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rlom du phyin pa la spyod// rab 'byor/ 
146b7(brgyad stong): yang shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug por byed pa'am nges par 'jug par byed pa'am/ yang dag par ston par byed pa'am/ nges par ston par byed pa'im/ yongs thob par bya
146b8(brgyad stong): pa'am nges por thob par byid pa med de/ de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mong po dag par snang la tsi tsi dang gon dag byed/ gos dag 'thor zhing 'di skad du/ e ma 'dzem bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lon
147a1(brgyad stong): gnyis byung bar snang ngo // zhes kyang zer/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan
147a2(brgyad stong): gnyis bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang bskor ba'am log pa medo/ rab 'byor de ltar 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no// de skad ces bka'
147a3(brgyad stong): bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang zhig chos thams cad la chags pa ma mchis po dang / gang bla na med pa yang dag
147a4(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par mi 'chang mi rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor chos gang yang yang nga
147a5(brgyad stong): par mi sngon po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i pha rol du phyin pa chen po lagaso/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang zhig dmigs par bya ba 'am/ chos grang zhig bstan
147a6(brgyad stong): par bya ba de ni me dro la 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig bskor bar bya ba yang med do/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dus chos thams cad ni shin du mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang
147a7(brgyad stong): yang ldog par mi 'gyur rab tu bskor bar mi 'gyur/ de ci'i skad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grib pa ste/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
147a8(brgyad stong): gyis dben pa'i phyiraro/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te
147b1(brgyad stong): 'bru 'byor ba da ni rab tu 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa yang 'ag pa'am smra pa thod / ba smon pa med pa yang lartag pa'am ldan pa/ 
147b2(brgyad stong): med/ rab 'byor gang 'di ltar bsten pa 'di na ches thams cad bstan pa yin te/ sus kyang bstan pa med la sus kyang thos pa yang med/ sus kyang mnos pa yang med/ sus
147b3(brgyad stong): mngon sum du byas pa yang med/ sus byeng mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin/ sras kyang mngon su ma du byed par khring ma 'gyur// chos bstan po 'a ngos ni su yang mya ngan las mi 'dus
147b4(brgyad stong): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur/ yongasu mya ngan las mi mda' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnasu byas pa yang mdo/ de snyed ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
147b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldani 'das na mkha'i ma mchis pa'i slad du 'odadi ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
147b6(brgyad stong): 'dus chos thams cad dmyigasu ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin po'o/ bcom ldan 'das shin du spong ba'i slad du
147b7(brgyad stong): dben pa'i ba rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'di bu mi mchis pa'i skad du 'di nong po ma mchis dro'i skad du rIm+bu du phyin pa'o/ m+b+ha ldan 'dus nos thams
147b8(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni brjod du me mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldani 'das phung po lnga dmig sum mchis kyi tshe srid du 'di ni ming mi mchis pa'i bar ma
148a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams ca
148a2(brgyad stong): bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bas pa'i slad du chos dang ldan pa'i slad du 'od ni mi bas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom
148a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du chos thams cad mi skye ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byed pa'o mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin

148a5(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni 'dul ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin po'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis
148a6(brgyad stong): pa rnarnam par shes par bgyid pa'i slad du 'di ni rmi lam dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / mig rgyu dang sgyu ma'i pha rol de phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod tshogs dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ngo bo nyid
148a7(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom
148a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das na mkha'i gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni smos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol dri phyin pa'o// bcom ldan

148b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i pha rol du slad du 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yin tan

148b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtho'i slad du 'di ni sems can mi mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'dzin tshangam mchis pa'i bco
148b6(brgyad stong): du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das cho sa thams cad mngon par ma zhen pa'i slad du 'di ni mtha' gnyis ma rtogs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'ongs chus thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa'i
148b7(brgyad stong): slong du 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan tho ste dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la 'dod po ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu
148b8(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa zhi ba nyid kyi slad du 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni gzham
149a1(brgyad stong): du ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad na mkha' chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
149a2(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol

149a4(brgyad stong): du 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i skad du 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
149a5(brgyad stong): 'dus mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa'i sladad du 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni
149a6(brgyad stong): mtshan nyid byang chub kyi phyogs dri rnams dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni dran po nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi pho ral du phyin pa
149a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnam par thur pa'i sgo gsum mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med po'i pha rol do phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams dmig
149a8(brgyad stong): su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa mi dmigaso pa'i slad du 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i
149b1(brgyad stong): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'dri ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa

149b3(brgyad stong): 'das shin du ma zhum pa'i slad du 'di mi rdzi ba 'jigs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa dang thogs po ma mchis po'i slad du 'di ni so so
149b4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgang bo las yang dag par 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin po'o// bcom
149b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad ma ldog pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i skud
149b6(brgyad stong): du 'di ni rang 'byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rna lam pa thams cad yongasu mkhyen pa'i slad du 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
149b7(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// bam po bcu po/ 
149b8(brgyad stong): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du snang bar 'gyur ba yang / sngon gyi rgya
150a1(brgyad stong): la lhag par bya ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
150a2(brgyad stong): pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par 'gyur/ rab tu 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyur/ long 'bogs par 'gyur/ kha don byed par
150a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhing / bzung ba dang btsongs pa dang klags pa dang / kun chub pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bskrun pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don byas nas de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin
150a4(brgyad stong): nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid de rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam dang / ldan par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
150a5(brgyad stong): de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsngon bkur byas par 'gyur/ gang dgo da lngar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing / mnyan nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur klog par
150a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ ra bo tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyu ro// lung 'bogs par 'gyur/ kha don byed por 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin
150a7(brgyad stong): nyid du sgrub par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

150b1(brgyad stong): dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di bshad pa dang / bsnyen pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la 'gong bar mi 'gyur/ kun du zhum par mi 'gyur/ bag tshwa bar mi 'gyur/ bag 'khums
150b2(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dang kun du mi skrag kun du stug pa dang ldan derje mi 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
150b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya'o// do nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa semos kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan
150b4(brgyad stong): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po zab mo 'di'i tshod pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bor ston pa la mngon par dad de
150b5(brgyad stong): rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'dzin pa dang // 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub pa re bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang stonapa
150b6(brgyad stong): dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'obogs pa dang / kha dron bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni
150b7(brgyad stong): phyir mI ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci lta ba de bzhin du bzung bar ba phyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'dra
150b8(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtse ba chu ngo ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon du ma thos shing yongasu ma dris pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba dang sngon du slad po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni 'di ltar zag
151a1(brgyad stong): ga pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mos par mi 'gyuraro/ bcom ldan 'das yang gang dag 'di lta bu mi mos shing ma rtogs par spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
151a2(brgyad stong): bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mtha' yang 'di ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs por gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung
151a3(brgyad stong): bri'i slad du/ sngon gyi mthar yang ma spyad pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zu bo mo 'dri la ci ltar yang mos par mi nuso/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'chad pa na slong bar 'gyur ba
151a4(brgyad stong): de dag kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de dag gis sngon gyi mtho ro yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs pa logs te/ 'di ltar de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rom du
151a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la dad pa ma mchis bzod pa ma mchis/ sred pa ma mchis 'dun po mo mchis mos pa ma mchi so/ de dag gis ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang

151b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin// deng

151b3(brgyad stong): rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di las skyes te/ kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las skyes pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rab tu phye ba yin no// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
151b4(brgyad stong): du byin po 'di la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gnas por bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor nga bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnas

151b8(brgyad stong): la don 'di yongasu 'dri bo ro bya ba dang / yongasu 'dri bar byed par sems pra ni yang khyed legaso/ kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes pa yin/ ko'u shika
152a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs la mi gnas gzug so zhes mi gnas te/ kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems

155b4(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta skye dper ni/ 'dri na skyes bral lo zhig rgya mtsho chen po bste 'tshul bar gyur te/ de rgyamam chen po ltar mchis bya dang rtsilta ci ltar de ltar rgya ma
155b5(brgyad stong): chen po blta bar mchis pu de lta de ltar gal tedes sdong po 'am sdong po'i min ni ma 'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong nas 'dri snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te phyis slong po 'am sdong po'i ma
155b6(brgyad stong): mtshan ma ma/ rI'u ma ri'i mtshan ma ma mthong na des 'di snyam du 'drinas ni rgya mtsho chen po dang / nyor snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rim gyis dme' bral
155b7(brgyad stong): byas rgyamatsho chen po'i nadun sdong po'am stong ngo'i mtshan ma ma 'i'i ma chen mo gang yang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar yang rgya mtsho chen po mag gis mngon sum du mu mthong ba de sta na
155b8(brgyad stong): chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te/ 'di ltar yangan chad mya mtsho chen po mi ringangos mo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
156a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di nyan pa na 'di snyam du rig par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag mngon sum du ni lung
156a2(brgyad stong): ma bsran po de lta na yang 'di ltar bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung smon pa dang bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o/ de ci'i slad du zhe ni/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
156a3(brgyad stong): za ba mi 'di la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper ni/ dpyi ka'i dus kyi nye bar gnas pa na shing sna tshogs
156a4(brgyad stong): gyi yal ga'i lo ma rnying pa rnams lcogs pa las lo ma sna tshogs byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams nags tshal dag la sngar gyi mtshan ma de dag mthong na
156a5(brgyad stong): da ni me tog dang 'bras bu rnams ring po ma thogs par 'bying ngo // snye ma nas yid dgra' bar 'gyur/ de ci'i srid de zhe na/ de na 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan mo 'di lta bu dag sngar gda'
156a6(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa theb mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen/ 
156a7(brgyad stong): bku ri bgyi ba dang mnyan pa rnyed pa'i slad du nye bar gnas no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol da phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge bo'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa/ 
156a8(brgyad stong): legs par rig pa rabagyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis nye bar stabs pa log so/ de la gang sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i// 
156b1(brgyad stong): lha de dag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i mtshan ma sngar byung ba
156b2(brgyad stong): yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag pur rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung posbyin pa thob par 'gyur te snyam nas rab tu dga'
156b3(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur zhi nga rangs te yid mgu ba skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldani 'das 'di lta ste dper na bud med sgom ma mingal lci bar gyur pa de gang gi tshe/ lus bskyod na cher snyom par 'gyur te/ de
156b4(brgyad stong): 'chag pa la dad pa cher mi 'gyuraro te/ kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rmugs pa dang gnyid chung por 'gyur smra ba nyung ba dang / stobs chung ngur 'gyur/ sgrog bsngal mang bar 'gyur// smra ba
156b5(brgyad stong): shin du mang du mi gnas par 'gyur/ 'grogs pa la dad pa che bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi tshul khrims bzhin ma legs pa yid la bgyid pa sten cing nges par skyen la bsgoms te/ mang du
156b6(brgyad stong): byas pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba las kyis meng ngo // snyam pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'dis ci ltar ster gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba de ltar bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu 'byung ba
156b7(brgyad stong): 'tshal bar bgyi'i/ bcom ldan 'odus de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs smin pa de/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ zab mo
156b8(brgyad stong): 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyon bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa nyan pa na/ de la dga' zhing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la don du don du gnyer ba'i
157a1(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po mi thogs pa lung bstan
157a2(brgyad stong): pa thob par 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'o bstsol to/ shA ri'i bu leg so legs
157a3(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu 'di yang khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod spobs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de
157a4(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dog 'di ltar legs par yongasu bzung ba dang / legs
157a5(brgyad stong): par sbyangs pa dang / logs par yongs gtad pa'i bar 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
157a6(brgyad stong): de dag ni skye bo mang po la phran pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtsi ba dang / skye bo mang pol po che'i don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ lha dang mi rdzas
157a7(brgyad stong): la snying brtsi ba can snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgyu bar 'dod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu man
157a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos ston par 'dod po'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ri
157b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
157b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga spyod pas/ gzugas+ho kyi 'brel ba yang dag par rjes mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/ de bzhin du tshor po'i ma yin
157b3(brgyad stong): 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'od byed rnams kyi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'pheg pa yang dag par rjes mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la spyod/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par
157b4(brgyad stong): rje su ma mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnamos kyi ma yin// rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes
157b5(brgyad stong): mi mthong na shes rab kyi pa rolu du phyin po la spyod/ chos yang dag phyir rjes ma mthong na shes rab kyi bo rom du phyin pa la spyod do// chos ma yin pa yang dag par rjesu ma mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
157b6(brgyad stong): byin pa la spyod do// de ltar na 'di'i zhes rab kyi pa ma du byin pa sgo pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'byor gyis gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis ma khya bcom ldan
157b7(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsom gyis mi khyab ste/ de banin du mor ba dang / 'du she sa dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis ma khyi'o// rab
157b8(brgyad stong): gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ying mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bas
158a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
158a2(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar zab pa dang / la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsrel pA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
158a3(brgyad stong): chen pos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yi spyad par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dil mos par 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang
158a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad por gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das tso wA ra nA spyad par 'a gyur pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsol pa/ 
158a5(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mi rtog mi 'jigs pa rnams las mi rtog sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi rtog/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
158a6(brgyad stong): la yang mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyan
158a7(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar stod bur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po
158a8(brgyad stong): gang la la yang mo spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de ltar spyad par gyur no// zhes bya zhing spyad par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
158b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tho'o/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o// bcom ldan
158b2(brgyad stong): 'dus na mkha' dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dge ba'i phung po'i// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
158b3(brgyad stong): 'dri 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pu ngo kun chub por bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dngag ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'gags pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / yi ga
158b4(brgyad stong): 'dri ba la bur chud bgyid pa mngo po 'di ni ngom tsher to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor
158b5(brgyad stong): bzhin no de de bzhin to// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed po dang
158b6(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa drong nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'obigs pa dang / kha don byeng ba dang / yo gor 'dri bral bar chad byed pa mang du 'byung / de ci'i phyir ni ni/ rab 'byor de ni
158b7(brgyad stong): sbyar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi rom du phyin pa 'dri 'dzin pa dang / 'ardung ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dren pa dang / ston pa
158b8(brgyad stong): nye bar ston po dang / lung 'bogs pa dang kha don byed pa dang / yo gar 'dri ba dag la bdud sdig can dag par chad bya ba brtson par byed do// drer myur du bri ste gal te zla ba
159a1(brgyad stong): zla ba gnyis sam zla ba gsum gyi bar du brin yang bri bar bya ba yin// gal te lo gcig gis sam de phan chad 'dri bar 'gyur ba de lta na yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
159a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bri bar bya'o// dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yin te rin po che chen po gang yin pa de la ni bor chad byed pa mang du 'byung / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
159a3(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang // klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'dron pa dang /

159a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri'o dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar
159a6(brgyad stong): ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton bod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba la bdud sdig tson por chad kyi las bya bar brtson par ni 'gyur mod kyi las/ de ltar yang yid ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems
159a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bar chad byed mi nus/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe rigs kyi blo dang rigs kyi
159a8(brgyad stong): bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'od 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bigs pa dang //

159b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bri gyi ba dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'obogs pa dang / kho don bgyid pa dang / yi ga

159b4(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don bgyod pa rdo yi ge ra 'dri bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
159b5(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to/ shA rI'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
159b6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol de phyin pa 'di 'dzin 'u ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa drong / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nyi byar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs
159b7(brgyad stong): dang / khyo don byed pa dang / ya~M ger 'dri bor 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyuraro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i byA/ 
159b8(brgyad stong): 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du mid gangs med/ bdag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhugs te mtsho zhing ba zhes pa de dag shes rab kyi pha
160a1(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha byed pa dang / yi ger 'dra
160a2(brgyad stong): ba la dgongs par 'gyur/ yongasu bzung bar 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo grang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
160a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / rab tu 'don po dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang kho don byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrib pa dang // 
160a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba de dag lnga yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs par 'gyur/ yongasu bzung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang
160a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyis yongs bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bar chad byed mi nuso/ de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad
160a6(brgyad stong): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dbya'i so sa dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang ku ni chub pa
160a7(brgyad stong): bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / sngon po dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrus
160a8(brgyad stong): pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor de bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis yong su
160b1(brgyad stong): gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'tshong ba dang / klog po dang // kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / 
160b2(brgyad stong): kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa de ni de bzhin nyid don lu 'byor du bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
160b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bstsol to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad
160b4(brgyad stong): nisangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus yongasu bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang
160b5(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dong / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston po dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / yi gor 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa da
160b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du sgrib pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa
160b7(brgyad stong): dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang // rab tu 'don pa dang stonu pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogasu pa dang / khwa dron byed pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang
160b8(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ shA ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab sa/ 
161a1(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzig so// shA ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ thos nas kyang bzung ba dang bcangs
161a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / klags pa dang kun chub par byas pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / bsten pa dang nye bar snyan pa dang / lung phog pa dang kho ton byas pa dang / yi ger bris nas de bzhin nyid du smog pa dang / de/ 
161a3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid do sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang de bzhin nyid
161a4(brgyad stong): la gnas borar 'gyu ro// shA ri'i bu gang dag shwe sau rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris nas 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par
161a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur// lung 'bogs par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur/ yo ger 'dri bar 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du mi slob de bzhin nyid du mi sgrub/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de dag ni/ de
161a6(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid du mi skyob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du mi sgrib pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed pas/ dri bzhin nyid dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par 'gyur
161a7(brgyad stong): mod kyi shA ri'i bu de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs bis mkhyen/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ shA ri'i bu de dag kyang

167a3(brgyad stong): ba~MtsA lu bA ri sems pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gong zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thams cad mkhyen
167a4(brgyad stong): pa'i ye shes kyi rtsa ba 'di bor te/ nyan thos dang rang snangs kyi theg pa yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma lte bu las snying po sangs rgyas nyid btsal por sems por 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
167a5(brgyad stong): 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i de dag gi bdud kyi laM sa rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo chung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yes
167a6(brgyad stong): sgrub pa ro byed par mi shes te/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa spangs shing bor nas/ dri las gzhan pa'i mdo sde gong dag nyan thos kyis mngon par smon pa dang / rang sa
167a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag la lhagu pUr kun chub par bya bur sems par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' di dag nI yal gri dang 'dab ma lnga
167a8(brgyad stong): bul zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe ni// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci ltar gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dge slog
167b1(brgyad stong): de ltar slob par mi bya'o// rab 'byor gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dpe/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can drag ci ltar slob ce na/ rab 'byor de dag 'di snyam du sems/ bdag gcig
167b2(brgyad stong): dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya la bdag gcig pu yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// snam ste bu dag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang / nu ba dang yong su mya ngan las bzla ba
167b3(brgyad stong): phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'od byed pa'i sbyor ba rtsom ste/ rab 'byor ying de lhor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'on/ 
167b4(brgyad stong): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad la phyin gdags pa'i phyi ro/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyang de
167b5(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid la dgod par bya ste/ sems can gyi khams gzhal du med pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes de ltar bsrub par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' so so da
167b6(brgyad stong): chen po dge ba'i rtsub thams cad mngon par 'di byed pa'i sbyor ba deng lter brtsam par bya zhing rlom semasu yang mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper no/ glang po che ma mthong ba'i skyes
167b7(brgyad stong): bulta la zhig blung po che'i kha dog dang dbyi bas tshol te/ des mun khung nas glang po che zhog rnyed nas snang ba ga la bro der brtagaso// drer brtags nas glang po che'i rjes btsal bar sems
167b8(brgyad stong): shing glang po che'i rjes las glang po che'i'o kha dog dang / dbyibs bzung bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sams/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin yin nam/ rab 'byor gyi

168a2(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di mi shes shing mi 'dri bar de spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mdo sde gang dag nyan thosas mngon par ston

168a6(brgyad stong): bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dro ni mA lug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can

168b1(brgyad stong): dang ni bIr 'das pa dang / 'dir mong samya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// zhes bya ba dang / rlung du yang dag 'jog bu dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byo'o/ lan cig gi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / byi

168b3(brgyad stong): drang rang sa nges rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgos pa yin te/ de ltar sems po skyed par mi byi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

172b4(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// bdud kyi las 'di drug thams cad rtogs par bya ba yino// rab 'byor gzhan yang bya/ 
172b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du pinI pa 'dri 'tshod pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang thAnA~M
172b6(brgyad stong): yi ger 'dri ba dag la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / ldan pa'i mdo sde gang dag zab mi zab pa dag yod pade dag bdud sdug can dge slong gi chu byad du 'ongs nas skye
172b7(brgyad stong): bur byed par 'gyur te/ 'di skad du 'di la skyobs shig/ 'di bris shig/ 'di lu nga phog shig/ 'di kha don du gyis shigu dang / 'dri zhes thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'grub pa
172b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhes zer na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de dag dga' ba mi skyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar yang mdo sde
173a1(brgyad stong): de dag las stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag bshad mod kyi yang de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pas bstan to// de la
173a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag mngon par mi shes pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di btang bar sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du

173a5(brgyad stong): chos smra ba snyom las byed par 'gyur te/ chos ston be re mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshogs pa dang / bral bas bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o/

178a3(brgyad stong): nayi ger 'drir mi 'jug par yang sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa lags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa la ba sar du zhugs pa gang
178a4(brgyad stong): lcags pa dang / de dag blo chung ba lags pa dang / bla dman pa legs pa dang / blo zhan po logs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni blo phyin ci log lags shing / de dag gi sems chos rgya chen
178a5(brgyad stong): po rgya chen po dag la mi 'jug par yang rig par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor le 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ 
178a6(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi 'dzin par sems pa dang / mu'i chang ba dang / mi klog pa dang / kun chub par mi byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par mi byed pa dang / mi stom
178a7(brgyad stong): dang nye bar mi ston pa dang / lung 'bogs par mi byed pa dang kha don du mi byed pa dang / yi ge ra ma 'dri ba dang / chung ngu na yi ger 'drir mi 'jug par yang sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de dag
178a8(brgyad stong): ni/ rab 'byor bdad kyi byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag theg pa li gsar du zhugs pa yin/ de dag ni blo chung ba rnams yino// de dag ni blo/ 
178b1(brgyad stong): dman pa rnams yin// de dag ni blo zhan pa rnams yin no// rab 'byor de dag ni blo byin ci log pa rnams yin// de dag ni chos rgya chen po rgya chen po dag las sems mi 'jug par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
178b2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar yang bdud kyil su 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdud kyi nyes pa dang / bar du bcod par byed pa mang du 'byung mod kyi/ de ltar na yang rab 'byor gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i dzin pa
178b3(brgyad stong): sems shing 'tshang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed pa dang // ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs po dang / kha don byed pa dang / yi ge rI 'dri ba dang / chung ngu na
178b4(brgyad stong): yi ger 'drir 'jug par sems na yang / rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bzung bas de dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
178b5(brgyad stong): dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byede pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa drong / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / chung ngu na yi ger 'drir
178b6(brgyad stong): 'jug par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lo bdud sdigo can yang bar chad bya ba'i phyir brtson pa cher byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
178b7(brgyad stong): yongasu gzung ba'i phyir brtson pa tshor mdzad do// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bdud kyi las kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// bam po bcu gnyis pa// 
178b8(brgyad stong): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' bstsal po/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bud medo 'ga' zhig la bu mang du yod de/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ 
179a1(brgyad stong): nyi shu'am sum bcu 'am bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya stong ngam/ brgya stong yod la/ de dag thams cad kyi man par gyur na/ de dag bdag cag gi ma ci nas srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / 
179a2(brgyad stong): bdag cag gi mi ci nas yu ni ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi ma ci nas lus ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi ma ci nas yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi ma tso nas nyam nye
179a3(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi ma ci nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ba dang / 'di la reg par mi gnas pa med pa dang / lus la yid du mi 'ong ba ma 'byung bar 'bad cing rtso lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni/ 
179a4(brgyad stong): bdag cag bskyed/ 'di ni dka' ba byed pa bdag cag gi srog sbyin pa 'jig rten kun du ston pa yin no// snyam pas 'di la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'am/ sdug bsngal gyi reg pa gang yang 'byung nga re zhes bu
179a5(brgyad stong): de dag ma de la baM de bA ra sbyar ba thams cad kyis legs par bzung ba 'dzin/ legs par slebs sbed/ logs par bcos pas 'chos shing / 'di'i mig gam rna ba'am/ sna 'am lce'am/ lus sam yid
179a6(brgyad stong): la rlung ngam/ 'khris pa'am/ badra kan nom 'dus pa'am/ srang bulaM/ sha sbrang ngam/ sdig sbrul lam/ ma'i ma ma mi yin pa'am/ kun du 'bab pa'am/ nyam thag pa'im/ ye 'brog gam/ mi 'dod/ 
179a7(brgyad stong): 'am 'byung ba lus la 'byung ba nga re zhes de lta bu de dag gis ma de la bsams te/ bde bar sbya ra ba thams cad kyis 'di ni bdag cag gi mi skyed pa dka' ba byed pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gi srog sbyin par
179a8(brgyad stong): byed pa'i'ajig rten ston pa'o zhes 'chos shing / bdag gir byed sbed par byed// rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang zhes ra
179b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dgongs te gang dag de dag yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs
179b2(brgyad stong): ba dang / kha ton byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byin gyi brlabs dang / dgongs pa las 'gyu ro// 'jig rten gyi khas
179b3(brgyad stong): gzhan dang gzhon dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse
179b4(brgyad stong): ba dang / skye bo bral po che dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / lha dang mi dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dag/ thugs brtse ba'i phyir da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag thams cad
179b5(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinu pa 'di nyid la dgongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du 'di ni nas kyang ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i ming 'jig par mi
179b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba dang / tsI nas kwing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chad po dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / slob pa la bdu sdig can nam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dge bar chad byed par mi 'jig par mdzad// rab
179b7(brgyad stong): 'bye ra de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri'i chos shing bdag gir mdzod de sbed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
179b8(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kau yul te/ bo snyed pa'o/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom
180a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed par bya'o// ston par byed pa'o// de ltar 'jig rten 'di kun du ston pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pan
180a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'odi la skyeso/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag bla na med
180a3(brgyad stong): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

180a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa gang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang

181a1(brgyad stong): ste/ rab 'byor phung po 'di lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten zhes gsungaso// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol du/

189b7(brgyad stong): rnam par ma grol ba rnams sems rnam par ma grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par ma grol po ngo bo nyid med pa'i rung
189b8(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan du med pa dag gi sems rnam par ma grol ba rnams rnam par ma grol
190a1(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhas
190a2(brgyad stong): du med pa dag gi sems rnam par grol ba rnams sems rnam par grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab ca'i byor ci lta ri de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol
190a3(brgyad stong): duphyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems rnam par grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lci ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor sems ni med pa yin pa'i phyir/ seMs
190a4(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshogs pas 'das par mi dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten nas
190a5(brgyad stong): sre mos can gzhal du myed po dag gi sems rnam par grol ba rnams sems rnam par grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen do// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas
190a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan du med pa brten nas/ sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems lta ro med pa rnams sems ltar med pa'o// zhes yang dag pa/ 
190a7(brgyad stong): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ci de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems ltar med pa rnams ltar
190a8(brgyad stong): med pa'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor med pa'i phyir somos de ltar sems de ltar med pa dang / ma byung ba'i phyir/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang // 
190b1(brgyad stong): yongasu ma grub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin mig lha'i mig gis kyang bzung du med na/ thams cad la mi snang ba'i phyir sha'i mig gis lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs
190b2(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten naso/ sems can gzhal du med pa dge gi sems ltar med pa'o// zhes yong dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi
190b3(brgyad stong): shu ral du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi
190b4(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'dil brten nus/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa rnams phye ba dong btsums phra'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
190b5(brgyad stong): tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byo ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi zhalu du med grangs med pa dag gi phye ba dang btsum
190b6(brgyad stong): po'o// rnams phye ba dung btsu mus pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de dag skye ba thams cad ni gzugs la gnas shing spyi ba zhes yang dag pa ji sgrub ba zhin du rab tu
190b7(brgyad stong): mkhyen to// rib 'byor de bzhin du de dag skye ba thams cad ni tshor ba dang 'du shos dang / 'ad pyod rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing skye bo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
190b8(brgyad stong): to/ rab 'byor de lo ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas phye ba dang btsums pa de rnams gnas lo gnas par rnam par mkhyen par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin du ci ltar phye ba dang btsums pa de rnams
191a1(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang tu 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par rnam par mkhyen par 'gyur zhe na/ de bzhin song ba shi man chad 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten/ 
191a2(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du song ba shi man chad mi 'byung // zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan ched 'byung ba yang yin la mi 'byung ba yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten
191a3(brgyad stong): pa'o/ de bzhin song ba shrI man chad 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba ma yino zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la rten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhini song ba shi phan
191a4(brgyad stong): ched 'byungango zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// de bzhi ni snang ba shi phan chad mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad 'byung ba yang ma yin/ 
191a5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad 'byung ba ya Ting ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig
191a6(brgyad stong): rten rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o/ bdag dang 'jig rten mi rtag pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba
191a7(brgyad stong): 'dri ni gzugs la brten pa'o// badrag dang 'jig rteni rtag pa yang ma yin ma rtag pa yang ma yin no// zhes bya ba 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mugo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang
191a8(brgyad stong): 'jig rten rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin mi rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin// zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mugo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la rten po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
191b1(brgyad stong): rnams dang / bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa ste/ 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mgo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni mi rtag pa ste 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan
191b2(brgyad stong): gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtog pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mugo/ zhes bya ba 'di
191b3(brgyad stong): ni rnam par shes pa lo brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin ma rtag pa nyid kyang ma yini/ zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mu go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten
191b4(brgyad stong): pa'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa// / bam po bcu gsum pa// / bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa'o// zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan
191b5(brgyad stong): gti mugro zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten po'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med pa'o// zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mugo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang
191b6(brgyad stong): 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa yang yin la mtha' med pa yang yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gau ti mu go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten po'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa ni
191b7(brgyad stong): kyang ma yi ni mtha' med pa yang ma yin/ zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhon ni gti mugo/ zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
191b8(brgyad stong): bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa'i nos bya ba 'di nyid bdin gyi gzhan ni gti mug/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam be la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med pa'o// zhes bya ba 'di ni bden gyi
192a1(brgyad stong): gzhani gti mgo/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa yang yin la mthu' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni ga
192a2(brgyad stong): mugo/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa nyid kyang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mgo/ zhes bya ba 'dun

192a7(brgyad stong): med pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa de dag gzugs la brten par rnam par mkhyen par gyur to// de bzhin du phye ba dang btsums pa de dag tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa

193a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pas phung po lnga ni 'jig rten no zhes ming du gsungs te/ rab 'byor de lta bas na phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid/ 'jig rten gyi de bzhin
193a2(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'di bzhin tshang

193a6(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni de bzhin gcig pa dngos po med pa du ma dang bral ba ste/ gcig ma yin pa'i phyir dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / mi zad pa'i phyir dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i

193b1(brgyad stong): na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'di la 'jig rten yang dag par ston pa yin te/ de ltar na yang 'jig rten 'di kun du ston par gyur pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin
