193b4(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid de las sangs rgyas
193b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub tu 'byed cing ra bo tu ston to/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan su zhig 'di la mos par 'gyur te/ 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
193b6(brgyad stong): po 'am dgra bcom pa rnag po yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu mchog tu grub pa'i gnas 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon
193b7(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin de de bzhin
193b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas mchog tu zab pa'i gnas 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad de/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
194a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid 'di ni mi zad pa ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mi zad pa la mi zad pa nyid du bstan to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
194a2(brgyad stong): rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri dag bcom ldan 'das ga la bo dang dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'odas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyog 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig
194a3(brgyad stong): tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na smod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos zab mo dog rab tu bshad na/ bcom ldan 'di la mtsha/ 
194a4(brgyad stong): nyid ji ltar bzhag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong po'o zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag/ lha'i bu dag mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'o zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhog/ 
194a5(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag skye ba med pa'o 'gag pa med po'o/ kun nas nyin mongs pa med pa'o// rnam par byang ba med pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'o chos kyi dbyingaso// de bzhin nyid do zhes 'di la
194a6(brgyad stong): mtshan nyid gzhago/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge mtshan nyid 'di dag ni mi gnas pa/ mtshon nyid 'di dag ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
194a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma bzhag ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni gzugasu bgrang ba ma yinano// tshor ba dang 'dre shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bgrang ba ma yin// mtshan
194a8(brgyad stong): nyid 'di dag ni gzugs la brten pa ma yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnaMs dang / rnam par shes pa la brten pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lha 'am mi 'am mi ma yin pa dag gis ma
194b1(brgyad stong): bzhago/ mtshan nyid 'di dag lha dang klu dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis skyod mi nuso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na yang mtshan nyid 'di dag kho nar
194b2(brgyad stong): zado/ mtshan nyid 'di ni gang gis kyang lag gis bzhag pa ma yino// lha'i bu dag gang zhig 'di skad du na mkha' 'di su sa bzhag ces zer na/ lnga'i bu dag ci de yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin nam/ 
194b3(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' bsngal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ni sus kyang ma bzhag/ 
194b4(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i na 'das ma bgyis pa lags te/ na mkha'i ni sus kyang ma bzhago/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa ni spyod pa dang gzugs no spyod pa'i lha'i
194b5(brgyad stong): bu de dag la bka' bstsal pa tI lha'i bu dag de de bzhin de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung rung / ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni de bzhin du
194b6(brgyad stong): gan so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar 'di dag gnas de ltar yang dag par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad do// de bas ni lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa de
194b7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// dri nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus mtshan nyid zab mo 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas mngon pa
194b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyaso/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha
195a1(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lag so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor
195a2(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston po
195a3(brgyad stong): yi no// rab 'byor ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'di la brten cing gnas pa de kho na bzhin du chos de
195a4(brgyad stong): dag la mi gnos pas rtag tu gnas pa yin zhing / de bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ des na de dag chos kho na la rten cing gnas/ chos la bkur bstir
195a5(brgyad stong): mdzad/ bla mar mdzad brjed par mdzad do// mchod par mdzad do// ri mor mdzad/ bkur bstir mdzad/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin te/ de'i phyir
195a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la bkur bsti mdzad/ bla mar mdzad do/ brjed par mdzad/ mchod par mdzad/ 
195a7(brgyad stong): ri mor mdzad/ bsnyen bkur mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la so de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
195a8(brgyad stong): kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor ba yinod rab/ 
195b1(brgyad stong): 'byor gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang dang gang gis gshegs pa dang / sgrub pa gang dang gang gis bla na med
195b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa de dag nyid dang / sgrub pa de dag nyid byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor ba de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pas
195b3(brgyad stong): rjesu 'dzin cing rjes skyong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas shing byas pa tshor ba yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams
195b4(brgyad stong): cad ma byas pa ma byas po'i/ zhes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso/ 'gyur ba med pa 'gyur ba med pa'o mo zhes mngon par rdzogaso bar sangs rgyaso/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa mngon
195b5(brgyad stong): 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa shing shing byas pa tshor bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
195b6(brgyad stong): dadri phyin pa lo brten nas chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangos 'dis kango shes
195b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa'o// de skad ces bka' bstsol pa dang
195b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe chos thams cad shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa yin pa de'i tshe bco ldan
196a1(brgyad stong): 'das ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa lags de
196a2(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
196a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas la don 'di lta ba zhu bar bya ba dang / 'dri bar bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de ni legs legaso/ rab 'byor khyod gong 'di skad du chos thams cad shes pa po med pa mthong ba po med po'o/ 
196a4(brgyad stong): zhes zer ba ni ta rab 'byor do de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa yin/ rab 'byor ci ltar chos thams cad shes pa po dang mthong ba med pa yin zhe na/ 
196a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na chos thams cad ni shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na
196a6(brgyad stong): chos dri dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brten nas/ de bzhin gshegs byas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso/ rab 'byor de ltar na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
196a7(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag poro rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa yino// gzugs mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang 'di shes dang 'du byed
196a8(brgyad stong): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir yang dag par ston pa'o/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i
196b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar gzugs ma mthong ba lags/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
196b2(brgyad stong): rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das ci ltar rnam par shes pa mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba de ltar na gzugs
196b3(brgyad stong): mi mthong ba yin/ de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor gral te rnam par shes po la dmigs pa'i 'du shes mi bskyed pa de ltar na rna pare shes pa mi mthong ba yin
196b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig
196b5(brgyad stong): rten gzigs pa yin no// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhino gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa'o/ 
196b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor yang ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas 'jig rten yang dag par ston ce na/ de ltar 'jig rten ston pa'o// de ltar 'jig rten brjod pa'o// de ltar 'jig rten shes par byed pa'o// de ltar 'dzin/ 
196b7(brgyad stong): rten mthong bar mdzad pa'o// de ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de ltar 'jig rten zhi ba dang / de ltar 'jig rten dben pa dang / de ltar 'jig rten rnam par dag pa'o zhes 'jig rten brjod de
196b8(brgyad stong): de ltar shes par byed/ de ltar 'jig rten mthong bar mdzad paso// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las 'jig rten yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
197a1(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zabo/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du
197a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma shes rab kyi pha rol dad phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa pa dang / bgyi ba mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / bgyi ba gzhal du ma mchis pa
197a3(brgyad stong): dang / bgyi ba grangs ma mchis pa dang / bgyi ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
197a4(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di ni bye ba chen pos nye bar gnas/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol da phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bya ba gzhal du med pa dang / bya ba grangs med pa dang / bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnya
197a5(brgyad stong): pos nye bar gnos/ rab 'byor ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / 
197a6(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ning bsam gyis mi khyab/ rab 'byor de ltar ni shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bos nye bar gnas te/ 'di ni sems kyis bsam par mi nus// de ci'i phyir rnye
197a7(brgyad stong): 'di la sems sam sems pa'am/ sems las byung ba'i chos mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bya ba mnyam pa med pas nye bar gnas zhe na/ rab 'byoraro de bzhin/ 
197a8(brgyad stong): gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam pa'am snyam par mi nus/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinapa
197b1(brgyad stong): 'di ni bya ba bas mnyam pa med pas nye bar gnaso// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bya ba gnal du med pas nye bar gnas zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang sangs
197b2(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med pa yin te/ rab 'byor de lta ron shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bya ba gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas/ rab 'byor ci ltar na shre
197b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bya ba grangs med pas nye bar gnas zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dong / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grangs med pa yin te ra
197b4(brgyad stong): 'byor de ltar ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bya ba grangs med pas nye bor gnas/ rab 'byor ci ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas zhe na rab
197b5(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnams la mnyam pa yang me na/ lhag pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
197b6(brgyad stong): pa'idi bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gan so/ gnas bairtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags de bzhin gshegs pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa mi mchis pa
197b7(brgyad stong): gzhal du ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin dur dbyung nyid dang / de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyos mi khyab pa mnyam pa ma ma
197b8(brgyad stong): pa gzhal du ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa logs sam/ 'on te gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ bti mnyam pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa grangs ma mtshu
198a1(brgyad stong): mi mnyam pa logs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'on te rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyams

198a5(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems med sems pa med

198b8(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'ang byed rnaMs dang / rnam par shes po yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyem pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mi mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir
199a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ cin mkha' la mnyam pa 'am grangs sam/ tshad ma'am snyom pa 'am/ sems sam sems pa 'am/ sems las byung ba'i chos gang yang yod de/ rab 'byor gyis

199a8(brgyad stong): pa dang mnyam pa dang / bgrang du med pa dang / gzhal du med pa yin// kye mchos 'di dag ni na mkha' dang mnyam pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyi mi 'jug pa yin te/ rab 'byor de bas na
199b1(brgyad stong): chos 'di dag ni mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir chos 'di dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// na mkha' mnyam pa med pa'i phyir chos 'di dag mnyam pa med pa'o//

199b5(brgyad stong): migu rtul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnaM bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khris kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyis

199b7(brgyad stong): 'das kyis lung bstan te/ de dag kyang len pa med pa zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
199b8(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lagaso/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'dre

200a3(brgyad stong): phyirgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang po sgyur ba yul gyi mi la mthu dang brtsin 'grus thob pa'i rgyal po bya ba gang zhig yin pa dang / grong khyer gyi bya ba gang yin pa dang / ljongs kyi bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad
200a4(brgyad stong): ni blon po dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgyal po ni brtson 'grus pa chung zhing khur bor bar gyu ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gong sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos/ nyan thos kyi chos kya
200a5(brgyad stong): rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang yang dag por ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid de la bya ba byed/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
200a6(brgyad stong): ni bya ba chen pos nye bAr gnaso// gzugaso la yongasu mi 'dzin cing zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'dadu byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la yongasu mi 'dzin cing mngon par
200a7(brgyad stong): mazhin par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongasu mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma thun par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin du ldan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyi ro mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
200a8(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa la yongasu mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang / rang byang chub la yongasu mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dong / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongasu mi 'dzin cing
200b1(brgyad stong): mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nye bar gnaso// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongasu mi mdzin cing mngon
200b2(brgyad stong): pa ra ma zhen par bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nye bar gnas pa logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsnyil pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la yongasu 'dzin
200b3(brgyad stong): pa 'am/ mngon par zhen pa byed pa drug bcom pa nyid ci khyod kyis yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dis de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang la
200b4(brgyad stong): yongasu 'dzin pa 'am/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos de lta bu ni bdag gis yang dag par rje su ma mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor dede
200b5(brgyad stong): bzhin tede de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ rab 'byor ngas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de yang dag par rje su mi mthong bas yongasu
200b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin par mi byed mngon par zhen par mi byed/ rab 'byor de lta bas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang yong su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa medo/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba
200b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'ongs theg pa la gra srar du zhugs pa dge bo'i rtsa ba chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen po nyid la yang yongasu
200b8(brgyad stong): mi 'dzin cing mngon par zhen pa medo/ zhes bgyi ba'i bstan pa 'di thos na dngang zhing kun du skrag la kun du skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang byang chub
201a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgyu phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa des yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par gyur pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
201a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mos par 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na skrod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
201a3(brgyad stong): rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'dres shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab tsong blta dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba legs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
201a4(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dri dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa yun ring por dge ba'i ngag rtsa ba bskrun pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te slong gsum
201a5(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams drag ni sems can ji snyed mchis pa dri dag thams cad kyis dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba'i sa la bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par spyad pa dang / gang gis
201a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyi ma gcig tsam yang bzod cing sred de tshol ba dang / sems pa dang 'jal ba dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / nye bar sems par bgyi no/ bcom ldan 'dra
201a7(brgyad stong): 'di nyid de dag pas mchog tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' bstsol pa/ lha'i bu dag gal
201a8(brgyad stong): te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nya non lha'i bu dge des ni ches myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dA re bar bya ste/ dad pas rje su 'brang
201b1(brgyad stong): ba'i sa la bskul pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par spyod pa de dag gis ni ma yin no// de nas 'dod pa na spyod nga'i lha'i bu dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
201b2(brgyad stong): skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'i zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'dres kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
201b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu mye bskor ba byas nis bcom ldan 'dus kyi drung nas mchi'o// zhes gsol te dongong // de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dod pa
201b4(brgyad stong): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni 'dod pa'i kha mos su gnas par gyur te/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du
201b5(brgyad stong): byin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ba rnam ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
201b6(brgyad stong): 'dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thi sa~M bA dang lhan cig kho nar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'ched pa thos shing mi 'god kun du mi zhum/ rnam par mi gnas
201b7(brgyad stong): mi rmongs/ the tsom mi za som nyi myi za bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par dga' na/ bcom ldan 'dres de gang nus shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lpags/ bcom ldan 'das
201b8(brgyad stong): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thos pa dang / lhan cig kho nar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing sgom par 'gyur te/ 
202a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa mi slong zhing / yid phyir phyogs par mi byed/ bzung ba dang bcang ba dang klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / rab tu 'don pa'i phyir 'dun/ 
202a2(brgyad stong): ba bskyed par 'gyur/ rjesu 'brang zhing phyi bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur/ chos smra ba mi gtong bar 'gyur te/ rlob 'byor 'di lnga ste dbyer na/ bi be'u yod po be'u mi gtong ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub
202a3(brgyad stong): semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas ci srid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri lus la theg pa laM/ glegs bam du chud por ma gyur
202a4(brgyad stong): de srid du chos mi gtong bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rab 'byor mi dag gi nang shi 'phros nas mo'i skye ba yi ni/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
202a5(brgyad stong): yon tan 'di dag ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skye bar gyur pa mchis sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
202a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bkur bsnyen bkur byas shing yongasu zhus yongasu dris la/ yongasu dri bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 
202a7(brgyad stong): kyo zhing gzhan de dag nas shi 'phos nas 'drir skyes pa yang yod de/ de yang yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'i ldan/ 
202a8(brgyad stong): gyi lha dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya ste/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bsnyen bkur byas
202b1(brgyad stong): shing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las brtsams te/ yong su zhus shing yongasu dris la/ yongasu bribs pa de yang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub
202b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas sngon gyi mthar yang yongasu ma zhus shing yongasu ma dris yongasu dri ba ma byas pa de ni mi nyid kyi nang du skyes nA yang / shes
202b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di boshad pa la nom nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' do ni sngon gyi mthar yang yongasu ma 'dri ba'i rang bzhin
202b4(brgyad stong): can du gyur pa'i rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la nem nor du gyur/ rmongs par gyur/ sems zhum pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor
202b5(brgyad stong): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam gsum 'am/ bzhi'am lnga tsam du thos par 'gyur to bskye

202b7(brgyad stong): dri ni 'od ltar yin te/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri sngon yongasu ma zhus/ yang dag par yongasu ma dris/ yang dag par yongs dri ba ma byas shing rje sum 'brongs par 'gyur ba don
202b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan par bya ba'i phyir/ res 'ga' ni 'dren pas rje su 'brang bar 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de phyi ri zhing g.yengs pa dang zhum par 'gyur/ de'i rmi
203a1(brgyad stong): rgod par 'gyur zhing ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs nas ring po ma lon zhing / theg pa la gsar du zhugs te 'ongs par
203a2(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de ni dad pa de dang / dang ba de dang / 'dun pa de rab tu gtong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di rjesu 'dzin po re mi 'gyur/ rjesu
203a3(brgyad stong): 'jug por mi 'gyur/ rjes bsten par mi 'gyur te/ de nyan thos kyi sa 'amo rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ de sa gnyis las gang yang rung ba'i so gcig tu re bar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dben
203a4(brgyad stong): na rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i grwa chag pa na gang dag der shing ngam srong leb la mi 'dzin tam/ shi ba'i rol mi 'jun/ rab 'byor de ni chu'i pha rol gyi 'gramadu ma phyin par chu'i nang de 'chi ba'i dus byed
203a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyuraro zhes rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang gang dag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i gru chag pa ni der shing ngam srang lab bya ma shi ba'i ro la 'jun/ rab 'byor de ni chos 'chi bo'i dus byed par mi 'gyur
203a6(brgyad stong): zhing bde bar pha rol du 'grom du phyin par 'gyur te/ ma smyos ma smad par skam sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dad pa ci mo dang / dga' ba

203b1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / sred pa yod pa dang / 'dun pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus yod pa dang / bag byed pa/

207a5(brgyad stong): dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod par gyur kyang / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa so yongasu mo bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pas/ la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par
207a6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la yang dge bar zhug su zin kyang / rab 'byor yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar mdor chud zos shing yi gsod par
207a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste nyan thos su 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe no// don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasum bzung ba
207a8(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu skyes nas lo brgya na nu len par gyur pa ni rgan po nas shing 'khogs pa de nyid kyo lus la rlung las sbyor ba
207b1(brgyad stong): 'khris pa las gyur pa 'am/ badra kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' zhig gis btab ste/ de'i g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnyis nas skyes bu stobs dang
207b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa gnyis kyis legs par brten cing 'dzur bcug cing legs par bzung nas/ de la 'di ska drA dA kye skyes bu khyod gang du 'gro bar bya ba'i gro nas der khyod kyis ma phyin gyi bar du
207b3(brgyad stong): khyed bdag cag gnyis kyis brten pas lAm dri bar ma dror brdeg 'chos bya'i 'jig par mi 'gyor gyis// khyod gong du 'gro 'dod pa der song zhig ces bsgo no// khri de las ldeng nus sde
207b4(brgyad stong): 'gyuraro/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bye ba la dad pa yod
207b5(brgyad stong): dang / sred pa yod pa dang / 'dun po yod pa dang / brtson 'grus yod pa dang / bag byed pa yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / gus par
207b6(brgyad stong): byed pa yod pa dang / dga' ba yod pa dang / mgu ba yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / rab tu dga' ba yod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod par gyur la de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas
207b7(brgyad stong): yongasu bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa drang ma bral bar gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor chud zos par mi 'gyur/ yi bsod par mi 'gyur te/ 
207b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ de'i gon so dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas rjes thob nus par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa
208a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ dpe'i le'u ste zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces/ 
208a2(brgyad stong): gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ci ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces
208a3(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ki sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bsal to/ rab 'bor 'di la bo nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa las dang po pa shes rab
208a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa slob par 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya ba sten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngoms shing
208a5(brgyad stong): rje su ston par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i don 'di la lung 'bog pa de dag ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
208a6(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur sho go// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
208a7(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod sbyin pa gang
208a8(brgyad stong): dang gang nyid byin pa de dag thams cad bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugasu
208b1(brgyad stong): ma snyems shig/ de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shesu ma yin/ 'du byed rnamasu ma yin/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par shes par ma snyems
208b2(brgyad stong): sheg/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi snyoms pa'o// de bzhin du khyod tshu lo khrims gang dang gang bsrung ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te rigs kyi bu khyod bzod pa gang
208b3(brgyad stong): nyid/ sgrub pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod brtson 'grus gong dang gang nyid brtsom pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyo bsam gtan gang dang gang nyid la mnyam par 'jog pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod shes
208b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ gang dang gong nyid yongs sbyong bar byed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na mod pa yang
208b5(brgyad stong): dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzugs ma sems shig/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang mi yin/ 'du shes su ma yin/ 'du byed rnam so ma yin/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na me pa yang dag par rdzogs
208b6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub la rnam por shes par ma snyims shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi snyems pa'o// rigs kyi bu khyod nyan thos kyi so 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod
208b7(brgyad stong): pa me bye de cig ces/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don ltung 'bogs te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po po dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis mthar
208b8(brgyad stong): gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bzhug par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'odes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
209a1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs shing / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i sbyin pa la brten/ de lta bu'i ngo bo'i tshul khrims dang / de lta bu'i ngo ba'i bzod
209a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i brtson 'grus dang / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i bsam gtan dang / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i shes rab la brten nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la rang dbang du gyur pa logs kyang yongasu
209a3(brgyad stong): mya ngan lus 'das pa mi 'tshul gyi/ 'on kyang sems can gyi khams shin du sdug bsngal ba mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'cha
209a4(brgyad stong): te/ 'khor bur skrag pur mi bgyid pa ni dka' bar bgyid pa la groso/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de
209a5(brgyad stong): bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir zhogs pa dang / 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse
209a6(brgyad stong): phyir zhugs pa dang / bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyob par 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur bar bya'o/ 
209a7(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi gan su 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi dpungaganyen du 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi snang por 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi yongs
209a8(brgyad stong): 'dren par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi rton du 'gyur bar bya'o// snyom ste/ de lta bu'i ngo bo'i bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson 'grus ba rtsom pa de dka' ba byed pa yino// 
209b1(brgyad stong): 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyob par 'gyur zhe na/ 
209b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'khor ba ni spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag las de skyob pa re byed cing / sdug bsngal de dag spang ba'i phyir 'bad par byed la/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa
209b3(brgyad stong): ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyos pa 'gyur/

209b5(brgyad stong): sems can gang skye ba'i chos can/ rga ba'i chos can/ na ba'i chos can/ 'chi ba'i chos can/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / ying mi bde bo dang / 'khrug pI chos can
209b6(brgyad stong): gyi sems can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / smyug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yong su thur bar byed pa ste/ 
209b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyabasu 'gyur

210a1(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rab 'byor yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te rab

210a3(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni
210a4(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi sbyor ba med pa'o// gzugs kyi sbyor ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa'o// gzugs kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang

210a7(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i sbyor ba med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i sbyor
210a8(brgyad stong): ba med pa gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o// zhes rnam par shes pas 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa 'di ni rno bar shes pa'i sbyor ba med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar chos
210b1(brgyad stong): thams cad ni sbyor ba med pa 'brel ba med pa'o// zhes rnam par shes pas mthong bsu bskor ba med par 'gyur/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa/

210b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gal te gzugs dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par nos pa'i ci lta ba chos thams cad kyang de bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran/ 
210b7(brgyad stong): gi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid ma logs sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
210b8(brgyad stong): bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin// de de bzhin to// pha rol gang yin pa de la rnam par rtog pa gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ 
211a1(brgyad stong): gis thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid yin te/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin/ gang de ltar chos thang / 
211a2(brgyad stong): la nges par sems shing mngon du yang mi byed/ zhum par yang mi byed par 'di ltar bdag cag gis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o// 'di ltar bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
211a3(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos 'di dag bstan par bya'o// rab tu bshad par bya'o snyam na/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par

211a5(brgyad stong): chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na'ab po chu'om rgya mtsho dag gi nang na phyogs gang chus yongasu bskor bar gyur pa ni gling zhes
211a6(brgyad stong): byo'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mI'i mtha' yongasu chad po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha'
211a7(brgyad stong): dong phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chod pa ste/ raba'i byor yongasu chad po 'dis chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chud pa yin/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi yongasu chad pa yin// rab 'byor
211a8(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi yong su chad pa gang yin po de ni zhi ba'o// 'di ni gya nom pa'o// 'di ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'di ni ci lta ba yin/ 'di ni phyini ci ma log pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sos/ 
211b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

211b3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ dus ring por ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sgribs dang / ling tog gis yongasu khebs pa'i sems can mun pas zil gyis non pa rnams shes/ 
211b4(brgyad stong): rab kyis snang bar byed cing / mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed na/ rab 'byor de ltar nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
211b5(brgyad stong): chub mngon rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du gyi snang bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
211b6(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi yongs 'dren por 'gyuraro// zhe na/ rab 'byoro 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
211b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rang bzhin gyis skye bo med pa dang / 'gog pa med par chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin
211b8(brgyad stong): gyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa/ dang 'gag pa med par chos ston te/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis
212a1(brgyad stong): skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams rang bzhin gyis
212a2(brgyad stong): skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa
212a3(brgyad stong): med da par chos ston to// rab 'byor de lta ru na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi yongasu 'dren par

212a5(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten la gzugs ni na mkha'i rte no zhe
212a6(brgyad stong): zhes chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang na mkha'i rteno zhes chos ston par 'gyur/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
212a7(brgyad stong): kyang na mkha'i rten can 'gro ba med pa 'ong ba med pa na mkha' dang mtshungs po ste/ ci ltar na mkha'i 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa ma byas pa rnam par mi 'gyur ba/ mngon par 'dus mo byas pa/ mi gan
212a8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par mi gnas pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa mi 'gags pa de bzhin du rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ma byas pa rnam por mi 'gyur bte mngon pa
212b1(brgyad stong): 'dus ma byas pa mi gnas pa yang dag par mi gnas pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
212b2(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// de bzhin du tshor po dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa doni 'ong ba 'am 'gro
212b3(brgyad stong): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi mang
212b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rten can de/ de dgra rten de las mi mda'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten dro las mi 'dra'o// rab 'byor
212b5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'dra'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byo
212b6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni skye ba med rdo ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'dra'o/ rab 'byoraro chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de lus myi 'da'o// rab 'byor
212b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi mda'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'dra'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
212b8(brgyad stong): mu med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhi ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mya ngan las
213a1(brgyad stong): 'das pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbyung du med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad
213a2(brgyad stong): ni 'ong ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
213a3(brgyad stong): mi g.yo ba'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi rten te/ de dag rten de las mi madra'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang 'gyu
213a4(brgyad stong): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi mdo'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dgra bcomo pa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / bla na med pa
213a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rten can te de dag rten de las mi mda'o// de bas na byang chub semaso dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
213a6(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos thams cad ni na mkha'i rten can te/ zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag/ 
213a7(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur ba yino// rab 'byor gyis go sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
213a8(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di su dag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
213b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab
213b2(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri shes par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
213b3(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di'i tshul bar 'gyur ba de dag gong bo nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyino
213b4(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dul ba las byung ba dben pa rang bzhin cano// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ci de lta bu'i rten
213b5(brgyad stong): can kho nar 'gyur ba dang / rten de dag nyid mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag la yang rten 'di nyid ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sems can rnams kyis rten du 'gyur/ 
213b6(brgyad stong): lugs sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa
213b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'di lta bu'i rten can du 'gyur ba dang / rten 'di dge mngon pa'i rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dog la rten 'di dag ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sos
213b8(brgyad stong): can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
214a1(brgyad stong): sems can gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag gi rten du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhal da ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag yongasu mya ngan las
214a2(brgyad stong): bzla'o// zhes go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa lagaso de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ce
214a3(brgyad stong): bka' bsngal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa dag yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes gang gis go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
214a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go tsho bgos pa'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin/ gzugs kyi don du 'brel/ 
214a5(brgyad stong): ba ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed nis dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i don du 'brel ba yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa dang 'brel
214a6(brgyad stong): yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa'i don du yang 'brel ba yong ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel ba yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel
214a7(brgyad stong): ba yang ma yin/ nyan thosangs rgyas kyi sa'i din du 'brel ba yang ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po go cha chen po dgos pa'i go cha 'di ni chos thas
214a8(brgyad stong): cad dang ma 'brel ba'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga chen po dgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa des/ 
214b1(brgyad stong): gnas gsum la re bar mi bgyi ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
214b2(brgyad stong): bka' ba stsal to// rab 'byor khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa
214b3(brgyad stong): des gnas gsum la re bar mi ba ste/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lnga ste nyan thos kyi sa 'o ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
214b4(brgyad stong): chen po go cha chen po dgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa de nyan thos sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la ro ba 'di ni gnas med cing go skabs med/ 'on kyang gang gis seMs
214b5(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po dgos nas 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid re bar bya'o/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ ni/ zab ste/ de ni sus kyang sgom par
214b6(brgyad stong): bgyi ba ma lag sa de ni gang gis kyang snyoms par mi 'gyur/ gong gis kyang sgom par mi byed/ gang gis kyang sgom par mi 'gyur/ sgom par bgyi ba yang de cung zad ma mchis/ gdod sgom bgyi ba
214b7(brgyad stong): yang ma mchiso// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chos gang yongasu grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
214b8(brgyad stong): sgom pa 'di ni na mkha' sgom pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi ni po sgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad mi sgom pa legaso/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi/ 
215a1(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma chags pa sgom pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni mtha' yas bsgom po lag so// bco ldan 'dra
215a2(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa sgom pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa sgom
215a3(brgyad stong): pa lagaso// de skad ces gsol po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bo stsol te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab
215a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'i gnas pas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
215a5(brgyad stong): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags par mi byed pa dang / 'di ltar gzhan gyis smras pa dang / rab 'byor 'di ltar byang
215a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shrI pha rol du phyin pa'i phyir mi 'breng po dang / rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshod pa
215a7(brgyad stong): lce mi 'god kun tu mi zhum mi dngang kun du mi skrag/ kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ nem nur mi byi da the tsom mi za rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing rtogs par byed mos por byed/ shes rab kyi pha
215a8(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa mthong ba dang thos par dga' bas na/ rab 'byor 'dis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dris par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar she
215b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri bshad pa la mi dngang / kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
215b2(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mi dang nga kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa grang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bye brag tu rtag
215b3(brgyad stong): po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
215b4(brgyad stong): pa bye brag tu brtogs pa yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar thams cad mkhyen po nyid la gro zhol ba'i rgyu bye brag tu brtags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
215b5(brgyad stong): bko'i bstsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' lo 'bab pa dang / rab 'byor na mkha' la phyogs pa'i rgyud kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhal po'i rgyud bye brag tu brtags pa yino// rab 'byor
215b6(brgyad stong): yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis bye brag tu brtags pa gang yin pa de ni bye brag tu brtags pa'o// dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni tshad ma med pa
215b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhal du med pa dang tshad ma med pa gang yin po de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ mngon
215b8(brgyad stong): par rtogs pa ma yin/ khong nang du chud pa ma yin/ lam ma yin lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin/ ye shes ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin 'jig pa ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ 'gribs
216a1(brgyad stong): ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin/ sgom pa ma yin/ rnam par sgom pa ma yin te/ sus kyang ma byas gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang mi 'gro/ yul gang du yang mi gnas/ phyogs
216a2(brgyad stong): glang du yang mI gnas te/ gzhan du na gzhal med pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i grangasu 'gro'o// ni mkha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhal du med pa ste/ gzhal
216a3(brgyad stong): med pa gang yin pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin tsher bas ma yin/ 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/ rnam par she
216a4(brgyad stong): pas ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yini/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ bsam gtan
216a5(brgyad stong): gyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyini pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nu so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ de bzhin du tshor/ 
216a6(brgyad stong): nyid dang 'di shos nyid dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen po nyid do/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ de bzhin du
216a7(brgyad stong): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid dong / bsam gte ni gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid dang / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
216a8(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa ni spyod bri'i lho'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs po yang gzugs na
216b1(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsuM skor ba
216b2(brgyad stong): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'do dpan spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / bcas pa dang / mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i
216b3(brgyad stong): bri rnams dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di spyod ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gting
216b4(brgyad stong): dag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni balnga dka' ba'i/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rtogs pa dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang
216b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs
216b6(brgyad stong): bya nas/ brtson pa chung ngu ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos snyan pa la gzhol bar ma mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byi na dang / 'dod pa na
216b7(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams le 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to/ lha'i bu dog de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin// lha'i bu dag
216b8(brgyad stong): kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zab pa'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phan pa 'di ni gting dpag dka' bo'o/ lha'i bu shis rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lha dka' ba/ 
217a1(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rtogs pa dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na
217a2(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso ma thag tu byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas/ ba na/ kye ma chos thob mo 'di ngas mngon par rdzogs brla sangs rgya so// snyam pas/ brtson pa chung ba la/ 
217a3(brgyad stong): thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa la gzho gro bar mi mdzad do// gang du sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs mA rgyas/ su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur su pa
217a4(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi brgya pa 'di ni chos kyi zab pa yino// nam mkha' thob pa'i phyir chos 'di za bo/ bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za bo/ chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa'i phyi ro chos 'di
217a5(brgyad stong): zab bo/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas po'i chos 'di zab pa yin/ de skad ceso bka' ba stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po/ 
217a6(brgyad stong): brgya byin dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ngo 'tshar to/ badri bar gshegs
217a7(brgyad stong): ba rmod du byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'di ni 'jig rten thos dang mi 'thun par bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi bzung ba'i slad du chos 'di bstan pa lags na/ 'jig rje dag ni 'dzin pa la spyor
217a8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shwe rab kyi pha rol du phyin brgya stong pa las lha'i le'u 'u bya ste bco lnga pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcwo lnga// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang rna
217b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyim chos bstan pa 'di ni chos thos pa thams cad dmigasu ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis / 
217b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'angs kye ma nA mkha' dang mtshungs pa se gnas thams cad dmigasu ma mchis pa'i skad du chos 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma gnyisu ma mchis pa'i slad du chos
217b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni 'tshungs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma rgol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni ngo zla ma mchis pa'i slad du mtshan nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma mngon par grub pa mchis pa'i slad du
217b4(brgyad stong): chos 'di ni gi nas ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma skye ba thams tsAng skye ba ma mchis pa'i skad du chos 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kye ma lam thams cad mi demigs
217b5(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du 'di ni lam ma mchis pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan
217b6(brgyad stong): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'phrogros pa gnas rten rab 'byor 'di ni rjesu 'thun par skyes pa la go so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
217b7(brgyad stong): gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar chos gang dang gang kho nararo sbyin pa'i chos de dang de nyid stong pa nyid lus brtsams te snron du'i srid du/ de na sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang ba
217b8(brgyad stong): brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na slong ba dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras/ lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni
218a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu 'thun par skyeso// zhes smras pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gnas rtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu 'thun par skyes te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de ni de
218a2(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyidri kyi rjes song po'o// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs phyi'i de bzhin nyid song ba yang med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'ong ba med spong ba yang mdze/ 
218a3(brgyad stong): de ltar gnas rtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes song ba'o/ gnas rten rab 'byor ni dang po nyid nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
218a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid/ de bzhin gshegs
218a5(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid do/ gnas rtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rjes song ba ste/ de bas na de
218a6(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid ma yin te/ de bzhin nyid de'i rje sa song ba'o// de ltar na gnas gartan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs phyi'i skyes pa'o// de/ 
218a7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa des gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa'o// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
218a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang rna bar rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gnas gartan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par 'gyur
218b1(brgyad stong): med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa'o/ de ltar na gnas rab 'byor yang de bzhin nyid des 'gyur ba med pa rna bar 'gyur ba med pa tu rtog pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pas de/

218b3(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med/ rna bAr 'gyur ba med/ rtog pa medadra/ rna par rtog pa med de/ gadra la yang thogs pa med/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
218b4(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dri bzhi na nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste/ gnyi su med gnyis byar med do// gnyi su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang du yang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang las
218b5(brgyad stong): kyang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ gang gi phyir de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pas des na de bzhin de ni gnyi su med pa ste/ gnyi su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyis
218b6(brgyad stong): byer med/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes te/ mu byas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par
218b7(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur/ gang gi phyir de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de bzhin nyid 'dri na gnyisu me do de gnyi su ga byar med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyisu byar med/ de ltar na
218b8(brgyad stong): gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes/ ci ltar ngo bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ 
219a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du/ gnas gtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad de thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ de bzhin nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid kyis mngon
219a2(brgyad stong): par sprul pa ste/ 'di gnyi ka yang bskal pa ma yin zhing tha mi dad pa ste/ tha dad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyiro// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skye so te ji ltar de
219a3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan mi yin pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan mo yin pa gang yin/ 
219a4(brgyad stong): pa de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid de ba nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las de bzhin de la gan+d+ha brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes

219a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin nyid de'i rje su song ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes pa zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kang de bzhin nyid rje su seng ba ste/ de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa'i

219b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin ni
219b8(brgyad stong): 'di yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa de'i tshe yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab pa ni
220a1(brgyad stong): du sa chen po 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang ltas chen po bco brgyad du 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu lda// 
220a2(brgyad stong): kun du rab tu ldog/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun du rab tu 'khrugra/ tshe mtshom rab tu che mo che mo/ 'u pheM kun du rab tu tshom tsham/ 'ur bur rab tu'u ra'ur kun du rab tu 'ur 'u ri/ gzhan yin

220a4(brgyad stong): mi skyes te/ tsho rab mo yin 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rjesu ma skye so// rgyun du zhugs pa'o 'bras bu'i rje su ma skyes// rgyun du zhugros lan cig phyir 'ong ban

220a6(brgyad stong): ltar gang gis rjesu skyo ba dang / gang rje sku skye bo'i chos de dag ni yang dag par yod pa mye yi ni/ zhing nye bar mi dmigaso/ de lta ro na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skye so de/ 
220a7(brgyad stong): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rabu 'byor shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces bka' gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo lag so// de skad ces gsol po dang

220b1(brgyad stong): nyid bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang dge slong sum brgya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol/ dge slong ma lnga brgya yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba na

220b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' 'di dag gi lam slong pa nyid dam mtshon ma med pa la smod pa'i/ smon pa med pa yin mod kyi de ltar ni yang de dag yong su thabs mkhas pa dpe mi ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'

229a4(brgyad stong): smra bar mi 'gyur gyi/ don dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smra ste dron dang mi ldan pa ma yin zhing / pha rol gyi byas pa dag dang / ma byas pa la mi lta ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtag so de dag dang
