298b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa na des gong ma bslabs par 'gyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa de dag ngas yang dog par rje su mi mtho ngo/ rab
298b8(brgyad stong): 'byor gyisau gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bslab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
299a1(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bslab par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// 
299a2(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa lnga yang gnas par bya'o zhes mi slob/ bdag la nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yod par 'gyu ro zhes mi slob ste/ de ltar slob par ni mi byed// rab 'byor yang nyan thos
299a3(brgyad stong): kyi phun sum tshogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang yang dag par shes te de la gnas pa ni ma yin no// de ltar rnam par spyod par byed kyi gnas pari ni mi byed de/ bdag gis nyon thos kyi yon tan 'di dag bshud
299a4(brgyad stong): par bya'o/ rab tu bstan par bya'o// zhes slob bo/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na lha dang ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub seMs

299a7(brgyad stong): dang ma bral ba yin/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar na spyod na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongasu mi nyams pa'i chos can du rig par bya'o// nyan thos kI sa dang rang sengs

299b1(brgyad stong): byed pa yin no snyam du sems shing de ltar shes nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin la mi spyodade/ de ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thad mkhyen

299b4(brgyad stong): pa// // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa nyid kyis kyang re shig sems can thams cad 'di ltar zil gyis gnas
299b5(brgyad stong): na gang gi rgyu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pas lta ci smras/ sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems 'jug pa de dag ni rnyed pa leg

300b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces gsol to/ kri'u shi ka yang ri ro bI ri'i rgyal po srang grangasu btsal ba
300b8(brgyad stong): tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i de'i bsod nams
301a1(brgyad stong): kyi tshad ni gzung bur mi nus/ ko'u shi ka yang gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangasu gcal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ ko'u shi ka rje su yid rang ba dang ldan
301a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bsod na mos kyi tsha dri na gzung ba mi nuso/ ko'u shi klu yang stong spyi phyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams srung grangasu gcal ba'i tshod ni gzung bar nus kyi ko'u shi ke rje su
301a3(brgyad stong): yid rang ba dngang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa'i bsed nams kyi tshwa do ni gzung bar mi nus/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa ba ra ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang gangasu gcal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nus
301a4(brgyad stong): kyi ko'u shrI ka rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung bar mi nu sr-i/ ko'u shi ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams srang grangs
301a5(brgyad stong): gaucal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjesu yi da rung ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nom sems skyed pa de'i/ 
301a6(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi tshadadri ni bzung po ri mr-i nus/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'dus la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can
301a7(brgyad stong): glang dge byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar rnaMs
301a8(brgyad stong): kyi rje su yi rung ba dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa'i bsod nas de ltar gzhal du ma mchis pa legs par mi nyin ma 'tshal ma mthong / rje suM yid rang bar mi sems pa de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis
301b1(brgyad stong): brlabs pa ra rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa 'di la rje su yid rang bar mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud
301b2(brgyad stong): kyi phyogasu gyur pa lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa 'di la rje su yid rang bar mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud

301b5(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se mos bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi
301b6(brgyad stong): sems skyedarje pa de dag ni rjesu yid rang bar bgyi ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu ma btang ba dang / chos yongasu ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongasu ma btang ba'i rigs kyi bu
301b7(brgyad stong): 'am/ rigs pa kyi bu mo de dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di la rje su yid rang bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shI ka dang
301b8(brgyad stong): bzhin no de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'om rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu ma tang ba dang / chos yongasu ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongasu ma tang ba de dag gis sems skyed pa/ 
302a1(brgyad stong): 'di dag la rje su yid rang bar bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag gis sems skyed pa 'di la rjesu
302a2(brgyad stong): yid rang bar byas na de dag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par 'gyur gyi mi mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' ba stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'du
302a3(brgyad stong): la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsil to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ rang sengs/ 
302a4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi thig pa pa drag gis sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rje su yid rang ba de dag ni shin du myur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par
302a5(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur gyi mi gnyis par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang dang gang du skye bar gyur pa de dang der bkur bstir bgyis par 'gyur
302a6(brgyad stong): bla mar bgyis par 'gyur/ rjed parla bgyis par 'gyur/ mchod par bgyis par 'gyur/ ri mir bgyis par 'gyur te/ de dag yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzungs mthong b.ro mi 'gyur te/ de dag yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par ma

302a8(brgyad stong): de dag mtho risu skye bar rig par bgyi'i/ de ci'i skad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad bde bar/ 
302b1(brgyad stong): byed pa la rjes yid rang ba'i skad du'o/ bcom ldan 'das gis 'dun pa skyed de/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rje su yid rang bar bgyis pa de dag gi sems skyed pa de dag
302b2(brgyad stong): kyang rnam par 'phel bas bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid por 'gyuraro// de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can zhes
302b3(brgyad stong): dI ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa rnams yong su mya ngan las 'di' bar bgyid par 'gyuro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ ko'u shI ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus khyod kyis tshig ci skad smras pa de de bzhin// 
302b4(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ kro'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes yid rang bar byas na/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis rigs kyi

302b8(brgyad stong): ma mthong / ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'od ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma yang darig par rje su mthong ngam/ 2
303a1(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sems sgyu ma lta bu drang sgyu ma yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
303a2(brgyad stong): 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma dang sems sgyu ma lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba gang yin pa khyod kyis ci sgyu ma 'am sim sa sgyu mo lnga bu las gzhan ni chos thams cad gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
303a3(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma 'am/ sgyu ma lta bu las

303a7(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shin du dben pa legs la/ chos gang shin du dben pa'i chos de sgom par bgyi ba ma lags te/ des ni chos
303a8(brgyad stong): gang yang thob par bgyid pa'am/ spong bar bgyi ba ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shin du dben pa la brten nas byang chub kyang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang

308a7(brgyad stong): pa nyid du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa'i slad du zhum par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rgyu 'dris
308a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la zhom par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang la yang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
308b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni grang yang dmig su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang gis chos gang zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dmigasu ma mchis so// bcom ldan
308b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'on kyang gal te de skad brjod pa dang bshad pa dang bstan pa dang / de ltar nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
308b3(brgyad stong): chen po zhum par mi 'gyur/ brag mi tshi bA ga tsha ba dang mi ldan/ kun du mi zhum yang dag par mi zhum yid phyir phyogs par mi byed/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi byed/ mi dang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag
308b4(brgyad stong): pa dang mi ldan na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bor gshegs pa ded bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
308b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas
308b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang / dbang ljon dang bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs rnams kyis rgyang ma nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyu ro/ bcom
308b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs po dang bcas pa dang skye dag
308b8(brgyad stong): bdeg po dang bcas pa dang / dbang ldan dang bcas pa dang drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs rnams 'ba' shig rgyang ma nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba 'gyur// 
309a1(brgyad stong): zad kyi rab 'byer tshangs ris kyi lha rnams tshangs pa 'dun na 'don dang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs pa chen po dang 'od chung dang / tshad med dang 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang tshad med
309a2(brgyad stong): dge dang dge rgyas dang sprin med 'od dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / mi che ba dang mi bdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang shin du mthong dung
309a3(brgyad stong): 'og min gyi lha gang dag yod pa de dag kyang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid la spyod pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang 'jig
309a4(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa dag na dro bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas
309a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de la phan 'dogs shing dgongs par
309a6(brgyad stong): mdzad de/ rab 'byor yang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag le de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
309a7(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams la phrin 'dogs shing dgongs par mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog/ 
309a8(brgyad stong): par bzung bar bya'o// de dag la bdud dam gzhan dag gi bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can ji snyed yodapa
309b1(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad bdu da sdig can du gyur la bdud sdig can de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi sde mngon par sprul kyang rab 'byor bdud sdig can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
309b2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyis dgongs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bar chad bya bar mi nuso/ rab 'byor sa yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
309b3(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bdod sdig can du gyur pa lte zhog/ rab 'byor srong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dri snyed yod
309b4(brgyad stong): ba de dag thams cad kyang bdud sdig can du gyur le/ bdu sdig can de dag re res kyong brjed kyi sde de snyed mngon par sprul kyang rab 'byor bdung sdig can de dog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
309b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dri bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bya bar mi nus/ rab 'byor byang chub ses
309b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan na bdu do sdig can rnams sra/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe thub par dka' ba yin te/ gnyis po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nges sems can
309b7(brgyad stong): yong su mu trang ba yin/ des chos thams cad stong pa nyid de rtogs pa yin te/ rnga ba 'byor chos de gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig can rnams so
309b8(brgyad stong): bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon dang ldan na bdud sdig can rnams so/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis
310a1(brgyad stong): thub par dka' ba yin te/ gnyis po gang zhe na 'di lta ste ci skad du/ smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor
310a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i bya/ 
310a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lha rnams kyi nye bar 'ong bar sems par 'gyur/ nye bar 'ongs nas kyang yongasu 'bri bar sems/ yongasu 'dri bar bya bar sems/ bsnyen bku
310a4(brgyad stong): bye bar sem so// de la spro ba yang skyed par byed/ rigs kyi bu khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis rigs kyi bu khyod de/ 
310a5(brgyad stong): lta bas na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gan so pa'i gnas pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar gnas pa de nyid kyis gnas shing de/ 
310a6(brgyad stong): lhur spyod na sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur/ sems can skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob par 'gyur/ sems can skyobs med pa rnams kyi skyabasu 'gyur/ sems can gan+da
310a7(brgyad stong): med pa rnams kyi gnas 'gyur/ sems can dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur/ sems can gling med pa rnams kyi grong du 'gyur/ sems can ljongs pa rnams kyi snang ba / 
310a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ sems can yongasu 'dren pa med pa rnaMs kyi yongasu 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur/ sems can lam las rab tu nyams pa rnaMs dang / nges par 'byu
310b1(brgyad stong): dwa med pa rnams kyi lam gyi dam pa dang nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes lha'i bu de dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la spro ba bskyed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'jig rte/ 
310b2(brgyad stong): gyi khams gzhal du med pa bgrang du med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis 'dun gyi ba yongasu bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi mdun
310b3(brgyad stong): gyis 'dun du byas nas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
310b4(brgyad stong): dpa' che ni pa shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ste/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i ming
310b5(brgyad stong): dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis ches smon cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la yod ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjid par mdzad/ 
310b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos
310b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gzhan gang dag da lta re de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skyod pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa sbed pa dag gi ming dang rus dang stobs dang / kha dog dang gzu/ 
310b8(brgyad stong): yongasu stsogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang brjod pa dang / de bzhin du rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
311a1(brgyad stong): chen po gang dag chings par spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang rus drang stobs dang / kha dog dang gzugs/

311a3(brgyad stong): k+Shi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor// 
311a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kho dag dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang chen
311a5(brgyad stong): du brjod pa ma yin/ rab 'byor 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshogs pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi ming dang rus dang stobs
311a6(brgyad stong): ding kha dog dang gzugs yongs sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang tshod du brjod do// ra bo 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' so/ 
311a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par de ma legs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongs sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos
311a8(brgyad stong): ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod par mdzad pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par sangs
311b1(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang gi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa dang yang ched du brjod pa'i gang zag byang chub sems drapa'i theg/ 
311b2(brgyad stong): pa la gnyen po'i stobs can de dag ni yod do// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ gang de ltar de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skyod pa'i rjesu slob pa'i rjes slob tshul du byang chub sems
311b3(brgyad stong): dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing rjesu slob pa'i tshul du gnas po rnams te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam sam gtogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/

311b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog gis byang chub sem sna pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i rje su slob pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa spyod cing de rjesu slob pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams
311b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po phyir mi ldog po rnams ma gtogs par sangs rgyaso bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs
311b7(brgyad stong): yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa yin/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos
311b8(brgyad stong): thams cad mi skye bo'i zhes de ltar mos la de dang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob par gyur pa dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes mos la chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob cing / non par
312a1(brgyad stong): ma gyur pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ni gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi yang mi dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs/ 
312a2(brgyad stong): yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing che dadu brjod pa yang ched du brjod do// rab 'byor yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang
312a3(brgyad stong): rus dang stobs dang kha drog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing tshad du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa de dag ni nyan thos kyi so dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te/ de dag gis ni
312a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po grang dag sangs rgyas kyis nyid la ri bar bya ste/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sa sa

312a6(brgyad stong): sgrogs pa'i chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa de dag kyang phyir ma ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi
312a7(brgyad stong): phyi rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri ba shad pa thos nas mos par byed cing rmongos por mi 'gyur/ nem nur mi byed the tsom mi prA ste/ tsi ltar de bzhin gshegs bya dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
312a8(brgyad stong): kyis bshod pa de bzhin no// zhes mos na rgyas par mnyan cing 'di snyam du bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skyong
312b1(brgyad stong): dang / gang dag de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag gi thad nas/ rgyas par nyan to snyam du sems bskyed par 'gyur// de dag gi thud nA kyang
312b2(brgyad stong): shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'od mnyan nas mos par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang shos rab kyi pha rol du byin pa 'di la mos pa na ji ltar dri bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de bzhin du mos te/ de ltar mos pos
312b3(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos bu yang byed pa mang ba yin par bstanA na/ gang dag mos par byed cing mos nas kyang de bzhin/ 
312b4(brgyad stong): nyid kyi don du gnas shing de bzhin nyid kyi don du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi don du ga nas shing de bzhin nyid kyi don du bsgrubs nas kyang / de bzhin nyid la gnas par gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
312b5(brgyad stong): la gnas par gyur nas chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gzhan dmig su ma mchis na/ bcom ldan/ 
312b6(brgyad stong): 'das de'i tshe chos gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ ga zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig chos 'di
312b7(brgyad stong): ston par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gang gi tshe de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gzha
312b8(brgyad stong): gang yang dmig su med na/ de'i tshe chos gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ gong zhig bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig/ 
313a1(brgyad stong): chos 'di ston par 'gyur/ zhes smra ba ni rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gzhan gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor re shig de bzhin nyid
313a2(brgyad stong): de nyid dmig su med na gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ste/ rab 'byor gang bla na
313a3(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'om/ mngon par rdzogs pa re 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de gang yang dmigasu
313a4(brgyad stong): me do// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni chos mi ston to// rab 'byor chos thams cad gang bstan par bya ba'i chos de yang dmigasu mode/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
313a5(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab po bcom ldan 'das gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshol ba'i byang chub sos/ 
313a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni dka' ba bgyi po lag s+ho/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid la chos gang srong gonus pa ma mchis la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu/ 
313a7(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar chos gang yang ma mchis chos sbyin po gang yang mya mchis pa dang / 'di la de zhes par mi 'gyur nem nur mi bgyid rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ba'i slad du khro donas
313a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lho rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso/ ko'u shi ka 'di skad dugang dge chos zab mo 'di lta bu bshad po la nem nur mi byedra pa dang rmongs par mi 'gyur te
313b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o zhes zer ba/ kro'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa na su zhig 'di la ne ma nur byed cing rmongs par 'gyur/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags
313b2(brgyad stong): bau rab 'byor gyis gang dang gang bshad pa de dang de ni sdong pa nyid las brtsams te bshad pas ci la yang thogs pa med do// 'di lta ste dper na bar snang la mda' 'o phongs pa ni ci la yang
313b3(brgyad stong): thogs pa med do// 'di lta ste dper na bar snang la 'di bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis chos bsten pa yang ci la yang thogs pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dang
313b4(brgyad stong): po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang yang bdag gis granas brtan rab 'byor las brtsams te 'di skad du bshad cing 'di skad du bstan pa de bzhin go shegs
313b5(brgyad stong): pras gausu nges pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos skye ba 'am chos dang rjesu 'thun pa'i chos lung bstan pas lung ston pa lags samade skad ces gsol po dang / bcom ldan 'das
313b6(brgyad stong): kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ kau shi kA gang khyod kyis de ltar bshad po de de bzhin no// ko'u shI ka de de bzhin te/ 'di skad du bshad cing 'di skad du
313b7(brgyad stong): bstan pa de ni de bzhin gshegaso pas gsungs pa'i bzhin smra ba yin no// chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos lung bstan byas lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gnas rtan rab 'byor/ 
313b8(brgyad stong): gang dang gang spobs par 'gyur ba de dang de ni ko'u shi ka stong pa nyid las brtsoms ti spob so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gnas rten rab 'byor ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo ya
314a1(brgyad stong): re shig yang dag par rje su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs na gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin bral spyod pa lto ga la yod byang chub nyid kyang re shig mi dmigs na byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa

314a3(brgyad stong): nan yang gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta gro la yod/ mi skye ba nyid kyang re shig mi dmigs na yang gang mi skye ba mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid

319a4(brgyad stong): rnams kyi byang chub ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las skyeso// kun dga'o gang dag 'das po'i dus su byung bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
319a5(brgyad stong): bcwo ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pho rol du phyin pa las skyeso// kun dga' bo gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byung ba'i de bzhin
319a6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sngo bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
319a7(brgyad stong): lus skye stsok+Sha kun dga' bo gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar bzhugs
319a8(brgyad stong): te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las skyeso/ kun dga' bo
319b1(brgyad stong): nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las skyes// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na mad pa
319b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan
319b3(brgyad stong): par bya/ gzung bar bya bcang bar bya/ klag par bya kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ bstan par bya nye bar bsngon+do par bya/ lung 'bogs par bya/ kha dron du bya bri bar bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
319b4(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya na lo 'bye ru nga bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum ste bskyed pa 'byin po/ 
319b5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams la bslab pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar gyur pa dang / 
319b6(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nges par 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang kun dga' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten nas pha rol du phyin pa drug lnga bslabs pa yin// de dag thams cad
319b7(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas pha rol du phyin pa drug las skyeso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo pha rol du phyin pa thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes
319b8(brgyad stong): te/ bla na med pa yang dag po ro rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa yin/ kun dga' bo de lta bos na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur ba ro lan gnyis
320a1(brgyad stong): khyod la yongasu gtad do rjesu gtad/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
320a2(brgyad stong): chos kyi mdzod mi zad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyis chos bshad pa/ 
320a3(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di nyid las bshad do// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag me 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dpag tu med pa'i
320a4(brgyad stong): 'khor bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogaso par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kyang 'di lta ste/ 
320a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di nyid las 'chad do// kun dga' bo gang da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs
320a6(brgyad stong): te 'tsho zhi la chos sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kun dga' bo 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di nyid las rab tu 'byid par 'gyuraro// kun dga'o de lta ba si nA
320a7(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mdzod 'di dag ni mi zad pa'i tshes kyi mdzod/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bshad par gyur wA shwe/ 
320a8(brgyad stong): chos de bshad na yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon par sum du byas por gyur na/ de ltar na yang nga'i nyan/ 
320b1(brgyad stong): thos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing rjesu bskor nas chos ston pa khyod kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur/ kun dga'o gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol
320b2(brgyad stong): du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos gcig tsam yang bshad dam/ rab tu stana? na nga'i nyon thos kyi 'khor lo bskor tsA rjesu bskor nas chos ston na khyod kyis nga mgu bar byas par 'gyur gyi sngar gyi chos bshad pa
320b3(brgyad stong): de ni ma yin// gang gis stong gsum gyi slong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byas pa ni/ kun dga'o de ji snya du sos
320b4(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bskyod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i byasod bya ba'i dngos po'i bsod nas
320b5(brgyad stong): kyi phung po de mang ba yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngango badre bar gshegs mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag de dag
320b6(brgyad stong): bris gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhal du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kun dga' bo de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
320b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la chung ngu na nyi ma gcig tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na de bsod noms ches mang du bskyed// 
320b8(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo nyi ma cig lta zhog gi chung ngu na snga dro tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo snga dro chos smon pa lta zhog/ chung ngu na tshod cig tsam 'am/ kan dga' bo chu tshod cig lta zhog/ chung ngu na yud tsam la/ kun dga' bo yud
321a1(brgyad stong): lta zhog/ thang cig gam/ kun dga' thang cig lta zhog/ chung ngun skad cig gcig tsam du yang ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsan/ 
321a2(brgyad stong): tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos stan na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' ses/ 
321a3(brgyad stong): drapa' chen po de'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pi'i gang zug thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis gnon to// kun dga'i de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bo dang ldan pa'i byang chub
321a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ni/ 
321a5(brgyad stong): dkun draga' bo gnas med skabs med/ 'di ni gnas ma yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phral mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang dge snyen
321a6(brgyad stong): dang dge ba skyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang lnga dang k+Sha dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin da na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi mu yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi
321a7(brgyad stong): mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skyong ba dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing byang chub sems kyi dpa'i tshogs kyis 'dun du byis pa
321a8(brgyad stong): mi bskyod pa rgya mtsho lta bur zab gi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs
321b1(brgyad stong): med pa dbang du gyur pa sems shin du rnam par grol ba shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bor rab rang gi don rjes thob pa srid par sbyor ba yongasu
321b2(brgyad stong): zad pa yang dag par kun shes pa so sems shin du rnam par grol ba ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdor te chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur
321b3(brgyad stong): ba de ltar rdzu 'phral mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ltar mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phral mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag slar brtul to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon
321b4(brgyad stong): mar 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yang mi snang bar gyur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
321b5(brgyad stong): chen po de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'khor bzhi po de dag lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lho ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'o ma ci dang lto 'phye chen po de dag
321b6(brgyad stong): gi mig lam du mi snang bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du 'dzad pa de brtul bar gyur pas de dog thams cad
321b7(brgyad stong): de dag gi migo lami du mi snang bar gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka' bskul pa/ kun dga'o blo de ltar chos thams cad ni mig lam du yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ chos rnas/ 
321b8(brgyad stong): la chos rnams snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi mthong / chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi shes/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni shes po mi yin mthong ba po na
322a1(brgyad stong): yin/ dgos pa byed nus pa ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo na mkha' byed pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad byed pa med pa'o// kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni rgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bas gyis
322a2(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa'o// kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po ma yin no// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos
322a3(brgyad stong): gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob/ bslab pa thams cad kyi dom pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i
322a4(brgyad stong): byang chub chen po rjesu thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog ces
322a5(brgyad stong): bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nanom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa med pa zhes bya'o mi
322a6(brgyad stong): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad la phon pa thob par byed pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba thob par byed pa'o// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis
322a7(brgyad stong): gnang zhing sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa ste/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di la bslabs shing bslab pa 'di la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnaMs
322a8(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis stog ste slar zhag kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni 'di snyam du srog gsu gyi slong chen po'i 'dzin/ 
322b1(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams 'di bteg pa 'am banag par mi dgongaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gnal du med grangs med pa'i yon tan dang ldan te/ kun dga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
322b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i cho sde rnams la chags pa med pa nyid rjesu ba ros/ kun dga' bo 'das pa dang mya 'ongs pa dang
322b3(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bslab pa ji snyed pa de snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de dag thams cad lus kun dga' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog rab ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes
322b4(brgyad stong): bya'o// ra ba ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong nu med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ kun
322b5(brgyad stong): dI ga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshod ma med pa'o// kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ kun dga'o gang sh+lo rab
322b6(brgyad stong): kyi phu rol du phyin pa'i tshad mo'am zad pa 'am/ mtha'o ma bzung bar sems pa don na mkha'i tshad bzung bar sems pa de ni nam kho'i tshad mi'im zad pa 'am/ mtha' ma bzung bar sems
322b7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyirar zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nI maH
322b8(brgyad stong): ma med pa'o// kun dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma'am/ zad pa 'am mtha' ma ni mo bshad/ kun dga' bo yang ming gi tshogs dang / tshigi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs
323a1(brgyad stong): rnams la ni tshad ma dang 'brel ba yod kyi kun dga'o' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni tshad ma dang 'brel ba med// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ming gi tshogs dang tshig chagasapa
323a2(brgyad stong): yi ge'i tshogs ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin te/ kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma dang ldan pa ma yin/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad med pa'o/ 
323a3(brgyad stong): kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'daso shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshe ma ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o/

323a5(brgyad stong): kun dga'i dben pa'i chos la dben pa dmigasu med na de'i tshad ma lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzhal du med pa'i phyir tshad ma med cing tshad med
323a6(brgyad stong): laM yin te/ kun dga'o 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gong dag byung bur gyur pa de dag kyang kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol
323a7(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad pa'am yongasu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin/ kun dga'o mo 'angs pa'i dus na de bzhin gsheg
323a8(brgyad stong): bo dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu 'byed par 'gyur yang kun
323b1(brgyad stong): dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa'am yongasu zad par 'gyur ba yin/ kun dga'o de ltar gnal du med grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
323b2(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes po de dag kyang kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yang kun dga'o shes ra

323b6(brgyad stong): ldan pa kun dgo'o rab 'byoro 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnas 'di ni zab mo zhig yin gyis de bzhin gshegs bya la bdag gri gnas 'di zhwa'o snya mo/ de nas
323b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi bas pa lags so/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
323b8(brgyad stong): shre rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zad pa ste/ 'di lta ste na mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir chos thams cad skye ba med pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems// 
324a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar mngon par sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs/

324a6(brgyad stong): mi zid pa dag sred pa mi zad pa dang len pa mi zad pa dang / srid pa mi zad pa dang / skye ba mi zad pa dang chu shi mi zung ba dang / mya ngan dang mr-i sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal las pa dang yid mi bde sa
324a7(brgyad stong): dag 'khrug pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
324a8(brgyad stong): rna bar lta ba mtha' gnyis spangs pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar rnam par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtha' dang dbus med par rna ba re lta steras
324b1(brgyad stong): 'byor gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la de ltar blta bar 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i cha so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
324b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang la lo mi zad pa mngon par smrab
324b3(brgyad stong): pa 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta zhing na de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang thad mkhyen
324b4(brgyad stong): nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni yid la byed pa 'di dang thags
324b5(brgyad stong): mkhas pa 'di la me rten pos mi shes so// ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas mi bzod pa mngon par sgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub
324b6(brgyad stong): bya ci ltar mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pas shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par
324b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir log pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang / phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni thabs mkhas pa 'di la ma rten pas phyir log go// phyir ldog go phyir ldog par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang
324b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gang su dge bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma log pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i de dag thams cad de ni shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
325a1(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di la rten nas phyir ma log go// phyir mi ldog phyir bar mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pas shrI rab
325a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pA la mngon par sgrub par bya'o// de ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrubs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par blta'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
325a3(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar rten cing 'brel bur 'byung po la rnam par blta bas chos gang yang rgyu med par 'byung bar yang dag por rjes mthong ngo // chos gang yang rtog pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zlog pa 'am/ rnam par 'gyur ba med pa
325a4(brgyad stong): shin du yang dag par rje su myi mthong // chos gang yang byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba por yang dag par rjesu mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi zad pa
325a5(brgyad stong): mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par sgrub cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba yin no// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ 
325a6(brgyad stong): pA rol+ya du byin pa mi zad pa mngon pa'i bsgrub pa sa mngon par sgrub bo la rjen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de'i tshe/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gzugs yang dag par rjes
325a7(brgyad stong): mi mthong ngo gi// chos gang de bzhin du tshor bi mA yin 'du shes mi yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yang yang dag par rjes mi mthong / ma rig pa yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / de bzhin du 'du phyi
325a8(brgyad stong): rnamams ma yin rnam par shes pa ma yin ming dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drag ma yin/ reg pa ma yin tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa ma yin/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi mi yin
325b1(brgyad stong): mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dron pa dang / sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yang yang dag par rjes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'o zhes yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan yin
325b2(brgyad stong): zhes yang dag par rjes mi mthong / chos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'am gzhan no zhes yang dag par rjesu mi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
325b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig cen shin du mya ngan gyi rdug
325b4(brgyad stong): rta dang ldan par 'gyur// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper no ma zhig pha ma 'tsho ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur po de bzhin du rab 'byor gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa sa
325b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can yod shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdud sdig can gcig cig mya
325b6(brgyad stong): dan+da gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyuraro rA mu khon te bdud sdig can mang po shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ 'on te stong go sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bedud sdig can ji snyed
325b7(brgyad stong): mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe mya ngan gyi b+hag rje dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcoM ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rab 'byor gang gi
325b8(brgyad stong): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de'i stong ge sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni bdud sdig can ji snyed yod pa de dag thad
326a1(brgyad stong): shin du mya ngan gyi rnga zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rang rang gi stan la yang nyams mi dga' bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du/ 
326a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa la gnas pas gnas pA la ni lha dang mi dring lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bdag cag gis 'di la tho rtsa mo snyam pa dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sgrog par
326a3(brgyad stong): byo'o snyam pa'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ ba ting rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de lta bas ni byang chub sems draba'i sems dpa' chen po bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
326a4(brgyad stong): porar byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'a byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pas ni sbyin pa'i pha/ 
326a5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs por 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol dri byon pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
326a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu
326a7(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa thams cad sgom pa yongasu rdzogs por 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod po des ni bdud kyi las rig par bya'o// gang cung zad 'gyu
326a8(brgyad stong): ba 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ rab tu she nas rnam par spong bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor thabs mkhos pa thams cad yongasu bzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
326b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom par bya'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinapa

326b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang dag po zhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa de dag la dri dag gi thams cad mokhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri la saM skyeso// snum du bsam par bya'o// de ltar bsams nus bya
326b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang zag rjesu brnyes pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos de dag kyang rjesu thu
326b5(brgyad stong): par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas nyin cig 'das kyi bar la thu na tshig bzhi se gol to gos pa srid tsam du yang seMs

326b8(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa 'od chung ngu na se golo tegs pa cig tsam du mngon par sgrub na bsod nams ches mang du snyedade/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog po'i sa la gnas par

327a2(brgyad stong): bskyed pa 'di skyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par rig par bya'o// gang sems bskyed po 'di nyin thog thug rjes 'jug par byed pa lnga ci smos/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' seMs

329a6(brgyad stong): pa'i phyiru shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pare rjesu rig par bya'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khoms dang / ni mkha'i khams dang / rnam pa ro zhes pa'i khams mu med
329a7(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med par rje su rig par bya'o// dge ba dang mi dge ba mu med pa'i chos bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med par rje su rig par bya'o/ 
329a8(brgyad stong): chos thams cad bsogs pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med par rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tinge 'dzin mu med po thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mo med

329b3(brgyad stong): pa mu med pa'i phyir rjesu rig par bya'o// sems kyi spyod po mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med par rjes rig par bya'o// dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos chos tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kying/ 
329b4(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa tshad med pa ru rje su rig par bya'o// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par d+he su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
329b5(brgyad stong): rjesu reg par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rabo 'byor gzugs ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du ribo 'byor tshor ba dang / 'odadu shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs
329b6(brgyad stong): po'o// gzugs ni na mkha'i dang mtshungs po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni ri rlob dang
329b7(brgyad stong): pa'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni ro rab sna tshogs dang 'tshungs pa'o// gzugs ni mu med pa dang 'tshung sa po'o// de bzhi/ 
329b8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mu med pa dang 'tshungs pa'o// gzugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer las 'byung ba dang 'chungs pa'i/ de bzhin du tshor ba/ 
330a1(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer 'byung ba dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sgra dang thams cad mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du
330a2(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sgro thams cad mu med pa dang 'tshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa dang
330a3(brgyad stong): mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni/ 
330a4(brgyad stong): sems can khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sos
330a5(brgyad stong): can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sa dang 'tshungs pa'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
330a6(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa ni sa dang 'tshungs pa'o// gzugs ni chu dong 'tshungs pa'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'ong byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu dong 'tshungs pa'o// gzugs ni mo dang mtshungs pa'o
330a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni me dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
330a8(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa ni rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnaMs dang / rnam par shes pa nin mkha' dang mtshungs po
330b1(brgyad stong): gzugs ni rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rna par shes pa dang 'tshungs pa'o// gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge/ 
330b2(brgyad stong): bi'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam so dang / rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o// gzugs ni chos
330b3(brgyad stong): thams cad bsags pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dnga'adu byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad bsags pa dang bral ba'o// gzugs ni chos thams
330b4(brgyad stong): ts+tshad ti nge 'dzin mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs bral ba ste gzu
330b5(brgyad stong): kyi ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi dri bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni bral ba ste/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo ni
330b6(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gzugs ni chos thams cad med pa'i chos nyid do/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni/ 
330b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mu med pa'i chos nyid do/ gzugs ni stong pa mu med pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni stong gsum gyi ba mu me
330b8(brgyad stong): pa'i chos nyid/ gzugs ni sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rna par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba mu med
331a1(brgyad stong): med pa'o/ gzugs ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba'o// gzugs ni
331a2(brgyad stong): dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dmigs pa'i byar du'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'di byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dang mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o// gzugs ni seng
331a3(brgyad stong): ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni 'khrug pa med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang
331a4(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes po ni 'khrug po med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par/ 
331a5(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par de ltar rje su rig par byed pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dang 'jug pa dang rtogs par byed pa
331a6(brgyad stong): dang / sems pa dang 'jal ba dang / nye bar rtogs pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / le lo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid lo byed pa dang / rlom sems thams cad rdo par
331a7(brgyad stong): skrangs pa'i yid pa dang / bdug bstod pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid pa dang / gzhan la smod pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes rnam par spangs pa yid la byed pa dang / sems can du 'du
331a8(brgyad stong): rna bar spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshig su bcad pa rna bar spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / sgrib pa lnga rna par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / phra dog dngo ser sna spangs pa'i yid la byed
331b1(brgyad stong): skye bo thams cad spangs pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis sgom par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de la yon tan thams cad yongs rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnaMs yong su rdzogs pa/ 
331b2(brgyad stong): red dka' ba ra mi 'gyuraro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las rjesu rig pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // bamo po nyi shu gsum pa// // rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi
331b3(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa 'di ci lder byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du gang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drang na tshangs
331b4(brgyad stong): bar spyad pa spyod pa des yongs btsa la ba des yongs btsal ba de bzhin du yo ngas stsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ btso
331b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de tshol ba na ci ltar yongasu btsal ba legs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
331b6(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rtag tu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu tshol ba na lus la ched che bar mi byed/ srog la mi lta rnyed pa dang bkur sti
331b7(brgyad stong): tshigasu bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs btsal bas yongasu btsal bas yongasu btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las rigs kyi bu'am
331b8(brgyad stong): shar phyogs su song shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob par 'gyur gyis// ci ltar las ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la bod pa/ 
332a1(brgyad stong): bskyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la/ 
332a2(brgyad stong): byed pa mi bskyod pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / nang ngom phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yon du ma lci bar song shig/ g.ya su
332a3(brgyad stong): mi yin shar du ma yin/ lci ru ma yin/ nub du ma yin / khyad du ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ phyogs 'tshamasu yang mi blta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci lhor bdag las mgo yos shing / 'chig tshogs las kyang ma yin
332a4(brgyad stong): ba dang ji ltar gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / ci ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig dang / gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams
332a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ tsi lasna nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnaMs las nyams par 'gyur/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni 'khor la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni/

332a7(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir ne na/ nga ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub pa ro 'dod pa'i phyiraro// zhes smra sgo pa dang / sgra des byang chub so so dang
332a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu rtag tu leg so legaso// zhes smra so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de tho saM nas/ rigs kyi khyod kyis stong da
332b1(brgyad stong): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par chos thas cad la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yong su spangs pa dang / dngos po yongasu sbyang ba dang seMs
332b2(brgyad stong): can du lta ba yongs srung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / blon po med pa dang / 
332b3(brgyad stong): mu byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med por chos rnams ston pa dag la khyod kyis bsnyen par bya gus par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi
332b4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston pa'i 'du shes pa skyed
332b5(brgyad stong): par bya zhing khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i gshes gnyen yin te/ 'di dag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang
332b6(brgyad stong): dag popar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dad de bzhin gshegs
332b7(brgyad stong): pa dang ma bral ba rnams skye bar 'gyu ro// mi kham pa rnamaso slong bar 'gyuraro// dral ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la
332b8(brgyad stong): ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'o// khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba
333a1(brgyad stong): la ches don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa'

333a3(brgyad stong): mkhas pas 'gro gas shing bsten pa drung spen par byed pa yang yo/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la mi dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na seM sa can 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste bdag ni

333a6(brgyad stong): bI'i tshul so sor rtag par bye'o/ rigs kyi bu chos rnaMs kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa mA yin/ rnam par bying ba ma yin de ci'i phyir zho na chos tha

333a8(brgyad stong): bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos sra ba'i rjes 'brang na ring bo mi thogs par shA rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan / 
333b1(brgyad stong): khyod kyis las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shi rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas pa byed cing mi sems na de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi
333b2(brgyad stong): bya ste/ gzhan du na gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yi do mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes de skad kyang thoso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
333b3(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjesu bsnun pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la baM der song ba dang / ring por mi phyin par de 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la ji snyed du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris snyam du bsams
333b4(brgyad stong): nas de phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing cho ngas 'debs te/ mya ngan byed la spro zhing 'dug ste/ mya ngan byed la skye zhing 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam du so phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag cig gi b.ro du nyin metshan 'da' bar bya'o// 
333b5(brgyad stong): nyin mtshon gnyis snga mu gsum 'am/ bzhi'am l-I 'am drug gama?/ nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed
333b6(brgyad stong): chu tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ snyam du bsam so// bze' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed po mi bskyed/ mtshan mo yid lo byed pa mi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ grang po yid la byed

333b8(brgyad stong): te/ de bo'i mya ngan gyis bu tsog pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs pararo yid la byed pa gzhan gong yang mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu dus kyang de'i
334a1(brgyad stong): tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yang la byed pa gzhan gang yang ma byung // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' son
334a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gtung zhing 'dug pa'i 'dun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig bzhugs nas leg s+ho zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshig de skad

334a4(brgyad stong): kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu btsal te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di nyid dang spo ba 'di nyid dang

334a7(brgyad stong): bcu gonyis yod pa'i 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lce logs pa skye bo mang po dang mis geng ba bar gyi tshang khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshog su bris pa lta bur blta na sdug the/ phigs par gyur pa
334a8(brgyad stong): mnyam zhing 'tshungs la/ skye bo dong khyogs kyi zhon pa dang rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa grong khyer gyi khor yug tu gzhol
334b1(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rade dag gi mda' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser los byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thang
334b2(brgyad stong): kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i shing thog gi 'bras bu tshe gr-i sau ga mthu'i ya bya la se shing skyes
334b3(brgyad stong): pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi thig gu byung bas/ mda' ya ba gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'a brel ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa/ rol mkhan mkhas
334b4(brgyad stong): pa grong khyer de gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na smre 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba drag 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na yan lag
334b5(brgyad stong): lnga dang ldan po'i rol mo sna tshigs pa rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs nas sgra 'chim zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer khaM'i dri ba de dag la rlung
334b6(brgyad stong): gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse draga' zhing dga' 'gur spyod/ grong khyer de kho ra yug tu 'obs chu rje su 'thun par 'bab
334b7(brgyad stong): pa'i chu sa yongs gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grong ha cang mi gro bas gang ba dag yod/ chu de dag nyid la sems can rnams sngon gyi las kyi rnam po smon pa las grib bo/ rin po che sna
334b8(brgyad stong): bdun rnam par bkra zhing blta na skrag pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag bzhugs nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgu ro spyod do// chu de dag thams cad kyang ud pal dang / ku mu ta dang pa
335a1(brgyad stong): ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri bzang po'i ngangad dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas na yod pa'i me/ 
335a2(brgyad stong): tog gi rigs la de na med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin rna par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ snyed mos tshad de dag re re na yang
335a3(brgyad stong): rdzing bu khor mug tu rgyung grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgyar yod// rdzing bu de dag thams cad nus rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi me tog u dpal dang / ku mu tA dang / pad ma dkar po rna par bkra shing blta zhing bstan/ 
335a4(brgyad stong): skyug po dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de dag khebs shing ud po la dang / ku mu ti dang / pad ma dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang chu zhing du shing rta'i 'khor lo rtsom ste/ dri bzang po sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por ston pa ston
335a5(brgyad stong): bir snang ba dmar po dmar por ston pa/ dmar por snang ba dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar por ston pa/ dkar por snang ba dag yod do// 'di ltar yun ring por sem rdzi bu de dag thams cad na dang dur dang / khyung khyung dang re
335a6(brgyad stong): ka ra NI ka dang / sa ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshul de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing yongasu 'dzin pa medade/ 'di ltar yun ring por sems can de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sangs
335a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi yul la gus par byed pa rjes 'gro ba'i thos pa dang / sems pa legs par rtogs pa yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las grub pa yin// de la rigs
335a8(brgyad stong): kyi bu grong khyer spos dang ldan pa'i de'i bzhi mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ kho ra yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam rnam par bkra shing blta na
335b1(brgyad stong): skyug par ba rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba zhig yod de/ ljang pa de na khang pa'i long skyod dang / nye bar long spyod pa dang / yongasu lo spyod padag rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mo// 
335b2(brgyad stong): tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / yongasu skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ bskyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang 'di lta ste/ rdzing bu bzang // 
335b3(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba dang / ma bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba brgyad brgyad yod/ yang
335b4(brgyad stong): rdzing po de dag gi ngos cig ni gser gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gnyis pa ni dngul gyi rang bzhin/ dngos gsum pa ni bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin/ ngos bzhi po ni shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'og gi sa bzhi ni kaT ka to na'i rang bzhin la gser gyi
335b5(brgyad stong): bye ma brdal pa ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang them skas them pa rin po che'i rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pos brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ thim skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu chu bo gsor
335b6(brgyad stong): gyi shing ljon pa dag skye so/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad me dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing dang dur dang / khrung khrung dang / ka raN+Da dang / sau ra sa rnams
335b7(brgyad stong): skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ me tog gi shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas rdzing bu de dag thos
335b8(brgyad stong): cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi dir phyogs shing / kho dog dang ldan dri dang ldan/ ro dang ldan rig dang ldan/ de nas bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med
336a1(brgyad stong): drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing dbang du gyur pa ste/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod/ grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gzhan dag/ 
336a2(brgyad stong): 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshil lam rje su dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas/ dbang du gyur te rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod/ yang byang chub sems dpa
336a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'bagos de dus de srid du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dag la mgur spyod par byed cing de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston to// sems
336a4(brgyad stong): can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdo mdor byang chub sems dpe'o sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gI ser gyi rkang pa dang dngul gyi rkang
336a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / semra bI dUr+ya'i rkang pa dang shel gyi rkang pa btsugs po/ shring bil bting bstan par rmongs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i gos bting ba 'phang du dpag tshad phyed yod
336a6(brgyad stong): pa bshams te/ stong gi bar snang la yangogs kyi bla ni mu tig gis bris pas brgyan pa la ci 'di legs par gnas sem snyam po/ legs par gnas pa sna tshogs pa rnam par smin pas
336a7(brgyad stong): lhan cig tu mnyam par rab tu 'dzin par byed cings phyogs de kho re yug tu yang mi tog kha dag sna tshogs lnga pa dge mngon par gtor rab tu gtor/ yang dag par rab tu gtor bar byed la/ 
336a8(brgyad stong): ci ltar yang 'di chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'phags de yang sa phyogs de yang dri dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin du bdug par/ 
336b1(brgyad stong): byed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phagros 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de ltar chos la gus par byed cing /
