336b3(brgyad stong): na gang dag nyanA pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang srog tshags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po tshogs po de dag las la la ni lung 'bogs/ la la ni kha
336b4(brgyad stong): don byed la la ni yi ge rI 'di/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas/ rtogs par byede/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
336b5(brgyad stong): byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dos kyang sngon de ltar khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha
336b6(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de ni ring po nas khyod kyi dge bo'i bshes go nyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin
336b7(brgyad stong): du 'jog pa yang dag pa ro gzeng ba sto pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yi no// rigs kyi bu des sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol po de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu tsa
336b8(brgyad stong): gyis rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par skyed par byed pas song shig dang ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur zhes gsung so// de na
337a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'dri lta ste dper na skyes
337a2(brgyad stong): bu 'dre'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/ gang dag zug rngu 'di las sgrol cing bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa zug rngu'i 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gi/ 
337a3(brgyad stong): nam ste de snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe gang dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris par byed cing chos gang thos na// 
337a4(brgyad stong): bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa slong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed/ de nas byang chub sems// 
337a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa thos// thos nas kyang chos thams cad/ 
337a6(brgyad stong): la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i/

350b5(brgyad stong): pa/ rigs kyi ba de de bzhin// de de bzhin de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs so// sgra mngon par chags pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs po byon pa/

351a4(brgyad stong): kyi ba rmi lam la chos gang yang yongasu grub par shes pa mi bde'o// rmi lam ni brdzun te yang dag pa ma lag so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi ba de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das

351b4(brgyad stong): po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho nas ma yin nu ba nas ma yin/ bang nas ma yin/ phyogs 'tshams nas ma yin/ steng dang 'og nas ma yin/ phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod

356a3(brgyad stong): 'di ni rdul che ste/ sa phyogs 'od nis rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du chos 'phags kyi lus la bag na mi rung gis/ bdag gi lus
356a4(brgyad stong): gdon mi za bar 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gau lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i bzhis yang dang yang 'khye
356a5(brgyad stong): bar 'khor zhing bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnasu zhig pa ni 'di lta bu'i gnas som/ chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin te/ 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can la la zhig pa/ 
356a6(brgyad stong): yin no snyam du bsams/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de ltar bsams nas/ mtshan rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus kun du phug nas rang gi khrag gi
356a7(brgyad stong): sa phyogs de thams cad dad chag chog gdab po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad
356a8(brgyad stong): kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de dag thams cad du chag chag btab ste/ de dag thams cad la bdud sdig can des
356b1(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i glags grang du rnyed par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dang bu ma de dag thams cad sems gzhan du gyur pa med/ de nas/ 
356b2(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du chos 'dod pa dang / ci tsAm du yi dam la brtan pa dang / ci tsam du ga/ 
356b3(brgyad stong): chesbyin pa bgos pa dang / smras dang srog ding yong snod na mas la mi lta ba dang / blan med pa yang dug par rdzogs pa'i byang nub rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de sa ste bla na med pa yang dag pa
356b4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongasu dpag tu med pa las sems can thams cad thar bor bya'o snyam du/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag
356b5(brgyad stong): par bya zhags pa ni ngo mtshar to sA mo/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis blo rlabs te/ lha'i tsin dan gyi chu dri dram pa rgya che ba
356b6(brgyad stong): bas mo gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de'i dris sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya chung bar yongasu khya'o/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'
356b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces rigs kyi legaso legs/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab po legaso/ khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang
356b8(brgyad stong): chos yongs tshol ba yang logs te/ rigs kyi bsngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag bI ba sam
357a1(brgyad stong): pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so zhes smra so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' se/ 
357a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi bstan ni bting / snga phyogs 'di phyag dar ni legs par byas/ chag chug ni le
357a3(brgyad stong): par btab/ bdag gi sa me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtong bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad cing chos kyi skyon la 'dug pa la gtor bar bya ba'i mye tog de
357a4(brgyad stong): ngag gis gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam mo// de dag nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dA ra ba 'di dag long khyod
357a5(brgyad stong): kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing ngo chos kyi khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces smras nas/ des de la
357a6(brgyad stong): lnga'i mon d+ha ra ba lha'i me tog man khale stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram par byaso/ me/ 
357a7(brgyad stong): tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'dres pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de lus langs
357a8(brgyad stong): te/ chos kyi sman gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongasu bskor cing 'dun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston to// de na ba da
357b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug tu dus byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thaphags mthong ma thag tu/ 'dig ste dper na bas mu gtan dang pol snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i
357b2(brgyad stong): rtsa ba gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta po theb/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad ma
357b3(brgyad stong): pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin / 
357b4(brgyad stong): g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam sems pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rlom pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khengs pa nyid do/ chos
357b5(brgyad stong): thams cad cig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi ba ril du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas nas
357b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// na mkha' mu med pa nyid byas shes rab kyi pha rol du byinA pa mu
357b7(brgyad stong): med po nyid do// rgya mtsham med pa nyid bris shes rab kyi pa'i lung phyin pa mu med pa nyid// dring ba sno tshogs pa ni dri bas shes rab kyi b.ro la du phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// namakha' rtog pa med pa nyid kyis
357b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtog pa med do/ gzugs mu medo pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
358a1(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin bla mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med do// 
358a2(brgyad stong): bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu meng pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
358a3(brgyad stong): pa mu med pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams mu meng pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid de/ rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam
358a4(brgyad stong): nyid do/ chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pa ga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin bla ma 'dres pa nyid de// chos thams cad dmig su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi phacom du phyin pa dmig suM med pa nyid do// 
358a5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi phar sa du phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid de// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin sa na
358a6(brgyad stong): pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab bya nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
358a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ chu chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya bas ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i
358a8(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom pa med pa'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
358b1(brgyad stong): thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
358b2(brgyad stong): 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkhwa' mu med pa nyid zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya
358b3(brgyad stong): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sa'i
358b4(brgyad stong): khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khrims dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu mem
358b5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad dmigasu med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos
358b6(brgyad stong): thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting
358b7(brgyad stong): 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpe'a'u sems dpa' chen blo rtag tu dus de lta bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin brgyad stong phrag drug bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
358b8(brgyad stong): po brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ ting 'dzin
359a1(brgyad stong): gyi sgo brgyad stong phrag drug bcu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'tshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i
359a2(brgyad stong): 'jig rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs
359a3(brgyad stong): su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/ tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / mang 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ 
359a4(brgyad stong): dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/ tshul
359a5(brgyad stong): 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chad pa yin no/ de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par gyur te/ 
359a6(brgyad stong): gar skyes pa thams cad du yang nam yang sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de
359a7(brgyad stong): ngag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni skabs
359b1(brgyad stong): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bstsal pa// kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
359b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
359b3(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag pa
359b4(brgyad stong): bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ snyan par bya/ nye bar bstan par bya/ lung 'bog par bya/ kha don du bya/ bri bir bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis glegs
359b5(brgyad stong): bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal
359b6(brgyad stong): mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur bstir bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya/ ri mor bya/ snyen
359b7(brgyad stong): bkur bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rje su bstan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// 
359b8(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lagaso// 
360a1(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal
360a2(brgyad stong): to// / kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid
360a3(brgyad stong): kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas te/ de lta bas na/ kun dga' bo da ltar nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sku 'di la ci ltar khyod kyis dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / dad pa
360a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / ri mor byas te/ kun dga' ba da ltar nga 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' ba ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur
360a5(brgyad stong): zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar ma gyur par// kun dga' bo khyod la lan gsum du yongasu gtad do// rjes su gtad de/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'jig rten
360a6(brgyad stong): ci srid du rab tu spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo
360a7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar sten pa dang / lung
360a8(brgyad stong): 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
360b1(brgyad stong): mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ 
360b2(brgyad stong): ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang / bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' / 
360b3(brgyad stong): sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dges shing de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
360b4(brgyad stong): byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang
360b5(brgyad stong): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las yongasu
360b6(brgyad stong): gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzog so// 
360b7(brgyad stong): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sa na dang / dz+nyA nA si d+hi dang // zhu chen gyi lo tshu ba ban d+he d+harma shi la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad kyis dbang phyug dam pa
360b8(brgyad stong): mnga' bdag/ bod kyi lha tsan po bkra shi sa lha lde btson gyi bkas// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sum pa shi ta dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tshu ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang
361a1(brgyad stong): 'thun par bsgrub/ slad kyis rgyag gyi mkhan po parba rit+ta chen ngo d+hi ba dAka rma Ta dz+nyAn dang / shu chen gyi lo chub dge slong rin chen bzung pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa dang gtugs na/ 
361a2(brgyad stong): bcos shing nus te gtan mi phab ba yang slad ky-i/ kyai slad gnye thang na mo cher/ baN Di ta chen po d+hi ba ka ri shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo ts+tsha 'gro ma rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis/ brgyad stong ba bshad
361a3(brgyad stong): pA'i dus su che long cig gtan la pha ba// phyi sar sgreng gtsug lag khang du/ lo rgyu ba 'gro ma rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas/ rgya gar gyi mdo gsum dang gtugs nas len gnyis gtan la phab/ slang
361a4(brgyad stong): kyis yang lo tshu ba de nyid kyis bshad pa mdzad/ cing phran tshegs kyang gtan la phrab/ dus phyis lo rgyu ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis/ kha che'i dpe dang / yul dbus kyi
361a5(brgyad stong): dpe du ma bsags nas/ gtan la phab pa lags/ yai d+harmA he du pra b+hA waM/ he dun te Shanata thA g+hA to/ he wA ded te/ Shan+ta yo ni ra d+ha e bAM b+ha taM/ ma hA sha ma Na/ 
361a6(brgyad stong): bzod pa dka' thub bzod pa dam pa dang / mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung // rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa dang / gzhan la 'tshe bar
361a7(brgyad stong): yin no// oM sarba b+hid d+he sA hA/ oM badz+ra a yu sha ye swA hA/ oM su tra tiSh+Tha badz+ra yaM swA hA/ yon mchod bkra shis par gyur cig/ dge'o dag go//
